text.10771: [21] ``pucchassu ma.m raaja tavesa attho, ya.m sa.msaya.m kuruse  bhuumipaala.
text.10772: [22] aha.m ta.m nissa.msayata.m gamemi, nayehi ~naayehi ca hetubhii  caa''ti..
text.10773: [03] tattha ^b^tavesa attho^eb^ti pucchitabbako naama tava esa attho.  ^b^ya.m sa.msaya^eb^nti ya.m kismi~ncideva ^a^V7.0134^ea^ atthe sa.msaya.m  karosi, ta.m ma.m puccha. ^b^nissa.msayata^eb^nti aha.m ta.m nissa.msayabhaava.m  gamemi. ^b^nayehii^eb^ti kaara.navacanehi. ^b^~naayehii^eb^ti ~naa.nehi.  ^b^hetubhii^eb^ti paccayehi, pa.ti~n~naamatteneva avatvaa ~naa.nena  paricchinditvaa kaara.navacanena ca tesa.m dhammaana.m samu.t.thaapakapaccayehi ca  ta.m nissa.msaya.m karissaamiiti attho.
text.10776: [21] ``pucchaami ta.m naarada etamattha.m, pu.t.tho ca me naarada maa  musaa bha.ni.
text.10777: [22] atthi nu devaa pitaro nu atthi, loko paro atthi  jano yamaahuu''ti..
text.10778: [03] tattha ^b^jano yamaahuu^eb^ti ya.m jano evamaaha -- ``atthi  devaa, atthi pitaro, atthi paro loko''ti, ta.m sabba.m atthi nu  khoti pucchati.
text.1078: [22] duurepi khitta.m pacceti, na ta.m ohaaya gacchatii''ti..
text.10781: [21] ``attheva devaa pitaro ca atthi, loko paro atthi  jano yamaahu.
text.10782: [22] kaamesu giddhaa ca naraa pamuu.lhaa, loka.m para.m na viduu  mohayuttaa''ti..
text.10783: [03] tattha ^b^attheva devaa^eb^ti mahaaraaja, devaa ca pitaro ca  atthi, yampi jano paralokamaaha, sopi attheva. ^b^na viduu^eb^ti  kaamagiddhaa pana mohamuu.lhaa janaa paraloka.m na vidanti na jaanantiiti.
text.10784: [03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa parihaasa.m karonto evamaaha --
text.10786: [21] ``atthiiti ce naarada saddahaasi, nivesana.m paraloke  mataana.m.
text.10787: [22] idheva me pa~nca sataani dehi, dassaami te paraloke  sahassa''nti..
text.10789: [03] atha na.m mahaasatto parisamajjheyeva garahanto aaha --
text.1079: [03] tattha ^b^yassa teva.mgata.m phala^eb^nti yassa tava rukkhassa  eva.mgatika.m manorama.m phala.m. ^b^ko naama so rukkho^eb^ti  citrage.n.dukassa adi.t.thapubbattaa ``rukkhaphalena tena bhavitabba''nti  ma~n~namaano eva.m pucchati.
text.10791: [21] ``dajjemu ^a^V7.0135^ea^ kho pa~nca sataani bhoto,  ja~n~naamu ce siilavanta.m vada~n~nu.m.
text.10792: [22] ludda.m ta.m bhonta.m niraye vasanta.m, ko codaye paraloke  sahassa.m..
text.10794: [21] ``idheva yo hoti adhammasiilo, paapaacaaro alaso  luddakammo.
text.10795: [22] na pa.n.ditaa tasmi.m i.na.m dadanti, na hi aagamo hoti  tathaavidhamhaa..
text.10797: [21] ``dakkha~nca ^a^P6.0246^ea^ posa.m manujaa viditvaa,  u.t.thaanaka.m siilavanta.m vada~n~nu.m.
text.10798: [22] sayameva bhogehi nimantayanti, kamma.m karitvaa puna  maaharesii''ti..
text.10799: [03] tattha ^a^M7.0139^ea^ ^b^ja~n~naamu ce^eb^ti yadi maya.m bhavanta.m  ``siilavaa esa vada~n~nuu, dhammikasama.nabraahma.naana.m imasmi.m kaale iminaa  naamatthoti jaanitvaa tassa tassa kiccassa kaarako vada~n~nuu''ti  jaaneyyaama. atha te va.d.dhiyaa pa~nca sataani dadeyyaama, tva.m pana  luddo saahasiko micchaadassana.m gahetvaa daanasaala.m viddha.msetvaa paradaaresu  aparajjhasi, ito cuto niraye uppajjissasi, eva.m ludda.m ta.m niraye  vasanta.m bhonta.m tattha gantvaa ko ``sahassa.m me dehii''ti codessati.  ^b^tathaavidhamhaa^eb^ti taadisaa purisaa dinnassa i.nassa puna aagamo  naama na hoti. ^b^dakkha^eb^nti dhanuppaadanakusala.m. ^b^puna  maaharesii^eb^ti attano kamma.m karitvaa dhana.m uppaadetvaa puna amhaaka.m  santaka.m aahareyyaasi, maa nikkammo vasiiti sayameva bhogehi  nimantayantiiti.
text.108: [03] ^b^susa"ngahitantajano^eb^ti, taata, yassa hi ra~n~no attano  antojano attano vala~njanakaparijano ca daanaadiihi asa"ngahito  hoti, tassa antonivesane suva.n.nahira~n~naadiini tesa.m  asa"ngahitamanussaana.m vasena ^a^M5.0124^ea^ nassanti, antojanaa  bahi gacchanti, tasmaa tva.m su.t.thusa"ngahitaantojano hutvaa ``ettaka.m  naama me vitta''nti saya.m attano dhana.m avekkhitvaa ``asuka.t.thaane naama  nidhi.m nidhema, asukassa i.na.m demaa''ti ida.m ubhayampi ^b^na kare  parapattiyaa,^eb^ parapattiyaapi tva.m maa kari, sabba.m attapaccakkhameva  kareyyaasiiti vadati.
text.10800: [03] iti raajaa tena niggayhamaano appa.tibhaano ahosi.  mahaajano ha.t.thatu.t.tho hutvaa ``mahiddhiko devopi ajja raajaana.m  micchaadassana.m vissajjaapessatii''ti sakalanagara.m ekakolaahala.m ahosi.  mahaasattassaanubhaavena tadaa sattayojanikaaya mithilaaya tassa  dhammadesana.m assu.nanto naama naahosi. atha mahaasatto ``aya.m raajaa  ativiya da.lha.m micchaadassana.m ga.nhi, nirayabhayena na.m santajjetvaa  micchaadi.t.thi.m vissajjaapetvaa puna devalokena assaasessaamii''ti  cintetvaa ``mahaaraaja, sace di.t.thi.m na vissajjessasi, eva.m  anantadukkha.m niraya.m gamissasii''ti vatvaa nirayakatha.m pa.t.thapesi --
text.10802: [21] ``ito cuto dakkhasi tattha raaja, kaakolasa"nghehi  vikassamaana.m.
text.10803: [27] ta.m khajjamaana.m niraye vasanta.m, kaakehi gijjhehi ca  senakehi.
text.10804: [22] sa~nchinnagatta.m ruhira.m savanta.m, ko codaye paraloke  sahassa''nti..
text.10805: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0136^ea^ ^b^kaakolasa"nghehii^eb^ti lohatu.n.dehi  kaakasa"nghehi. ^b^vikassamaana^eb^nti attaana.m aaka.d.dhiyamaana.m tattha  niraye passissasi. ^b^ta^eb^nti ta.m bhavanta.m.
text.10806: [03] ta.m ^a^P6.0247^ea^ ^a^M7.0140^ea^ pana kaakolaniraya.m  va.n.netvaa ``sacepi ettha na nibbattissasi, lokantaraniraye  nibbattissasii''ti vatvaa ta.m niraya.m dassetu.m gaathamaaha --
text.10808: [21] ``andha.mtama.m tattha na candasuuriyaa, nirayo sadaa tumulo  ghoraruupo.
text.10809: [22] saa neva rattii na divaa pa~n~naayati, tathaavidhe ko  vicare dhanatthiko''ti..
text.10810: [03] tattha ^b^andha.m tama^eb^nti mahaaraaja, yamhi lokantaraniraye  micchaadi.t.thikaa nibbattanti, tattha cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa uppattinivaara.na.m  andhatama.m. ^b^sadaa tumulo^eb^ti so nirayo nicca.m bahalandhakaaro.  ^b^ghoraruupo^eb^ti bhiisanakajaatiko. ^b^saa neva rattii^eb^ti yaa idha  ratti divaa ca, saa neva tattha pa~n~naayati. ^b^ko vicare^eb^ti ko  uddhaara.m sodhento vicarissati.
text.10811: [03] tampissa lokantaraniraya.m vitthaarena va.n.netvaa ``mahaaraaja,  micchaadi.t.thi.m avissajjento na kevala.m etadeva, a~n~nampi dukkha.m  anubhavissasii''ti dassento gaathamaaha --
text.10813: [21] ``sabalo ca saamo ca duve suvaanaa, pavaddhakaayaa  balino mahantaa.
text.10814: [22] khaadanti dantehi ayomayehi, ito pa.nunna.m  paralokapatta''nti..
text.10815: [03] tattha ^b^ito pa.nunna^eb^nti imamhaa manussalokaa cuta.m. parato  nirayesupi eseva nayo. tasmaa sabbaani taani niraya.t.thaanaani  nirayapaalaana.m upakkamehi saddhi.m he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva vitthaaretvaa taasa.m taasa.m  gaathaana.m anuttaanaani padaani va.n.netabbaani.
text.10817: [21] ``ta.m khajjamaana.m niraye vasanta.m, luddehi vaa.lehi  aghammigehi ca.
text.10818: [22] sa~nchinnagatta.m ruhira.m savanta.m, ko codaye paraloke  sahassa''nti..
text.10819: [03] tattha ^b^luddehii^eb^ti daaru.nehi. ^b^vaa.lehii^eb^ti du.t.thehi.  ^b^aghammigehii^eb^ti aghaavahehi migehi, dukkhaavahehi sunakhehiiti  attho.
text.10821: [21] ``usuuhi ^a^V7.0137^ea^ ^a^P6.0248^ea^ ^a^M7.0141^ea^  sattiihi ca sunisitaahi, hananti vijjhanti ca paccamittaa.
text.10822: [22] kaa.luupakaa.laa nirayamhi ghore, pubbe nara.m  dukka.takammakaari''nti..
text.10823: [03] tattha ^b^hananti vijjhanti caa^eb^ti jalitaaya ayapathaviya.m  paatetvaa sakalasariira.m chiddaavachidda.m karontaa paharanti ceva vijjhanti  ca. ^b^kaa.luupakaa.laa^eb^ti eva.mnaamakaa nirayapaalaa.  ^b^nirayamhii^eb^ti tasmi.m tesa~n~neva vasena kaa.luupakaa.lasa"nkhaate niraye.  ^b^dukka.takammakaari^eb^nti micchaadi.t.thivasena dukka.taana.m kammaana.m kaaraka.m.
text.10825: [21] ``ta.m ha~n~namaana.m niraye vajanta.m, kucchismi.m passasmi.m  vipphaalituudara.m.
text.10826: [22] sa~nchinnagatta.m ruhira.m savanta.m, ko codaye paraloke  sahassa''nti..
text.10827: [03] tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti ta.m bhavanta.m tattha niraye tathaa ha~n~namaana.m.  ^b^vajanta^eb^nti ito cito ca dhaavanta.m. ^b^kucchismi^eb^nti  kucchiya~nca passe ca ha~n~namaana.m vijjhiyamaananti attho.
text.10829: [21] ``sattii usuu tomarabhi.n.divaalaa, vividhaavudhaa vassanti  tattha devaa.
text.1083: [27] bahavo taadisaa rukkhaa, yassa teva.mgata.m phala.m.
text.10831: [03] tattha ^b^a"ngaaramivaccimanto^eb^ti jalitaa"ngaaraa viya  accimantaa aavudhavisesaa patanti. ^b^silaasanii^eb^ti  jalitasilaasani. ^b^vassati luddakamme^eb^ti yathaa naama deve  vassante asani patati, evameva aakaase samu.t.thaaya cicci.taayamaana.m  jalitasilaavassa.m tesa.m luddakammaana.m upari patati.
text.10833: [21] ``u.nho ca vaato nirayamhi dussaho, na tamhi sukha.m  labbhati ittarampi.
text.10834: [22] ta.m ta.m vidhaavantamalenamaatura.m, ko codaye paraloke  sahassa''nti..
text.10838: [22] patodala.t.thiihi ^a^P6.0249^ea^ sucodayanta.m, ko  codaye paraloke sahassa''nti..
text.10839: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0138^ea^ ^b^rathesu yutta^eb^nti vaarena vaara.m tesu  jalitaloharathesu yutta.m. ^b^kamanta^eb^nti akkamamaana.m.  ^b^sucodayanta^eb^nti su.t.thu codayanta.m.
text.1084: [22] duurepi khitta.m pacceti, na ma.m ohaaya gacchatii''ti..
text.10842: [22] sa~nchinnagatta.m ruhira.m savanta.m, ko codaye paraloke  sahassa''nti..
text.10843: [03] tattha ^b^tamaaruhanta^eb^nti ta.m bhavanta.m jalitaavudhapahaare asahitvaa  jalitakhurehi sa~ncita.m jalitalohapabbata.m aaruhanta.m.
text.10846: [22] suda.d.dhagatta.m kapa.na.m rudanta.m, ko codaye paraloke  sahassa''nti..
text.1085: [03] tattha ^a^V5.0188^ea^ ^a^P5.0197^ea^ ^b^samiipe gandhamaadane^eb^ti  gandhamaadanapabbate mama assamassa samiipe. ^b^yassa teva.mgata^eb^nti  yassa eva.mgata.m, ^b^ta^eb^-kaaro bya~njanasandhikaroti.
text.10851: [03] tattha ^b^ka.n.takanicitaa^eb^ti jalitaka.n.takehi citaa.  ^b^``ayomayehii''^eb^ti ida.m yehi ka.n.takehi aacitaa, te dassetu.m vutta.m.
text.10855: [03] tattha ^b^tamaaruhantii^eb^ti ta.m evaruupa.m simbalirukkha.m aaruhanti.  ^b^yamaniddesakaaribhii^eb^ti yamassa vacanakarehi, nirayapaalehiiti  attho.
text.1086: [03] iti ^a^M5.0207^ea^ saa musaavaada.m abhaasi. itaropi  saddahitvaa ``taapaso eso''ti sa~n~naaya pa.tisanthaara.m karonto gaathamaaha  --
text.10861: [22] dumagge vitaca.m gatta.m, ko ta.m yaaceyya ta.m dhana''nti..
text.10862: [03] tattha ^b^vida.d.dhakaaya^eb^nti vihi.msitakaaya.m. ^b^vitaca^eb^nti  cammama.msaana.m chiddaavachidda.m chinnataaya kovi.laarapuppha.m viya ki.msukapuppha.m  viya ca.
text.10869: [22] sa~nchinnagatta.m ruhira.m savanta.m, ko codaye paraloke  sahassa''nti..
text.10870: [03] tattha ^b^tamaaruhanta^eb^nti ta.m bhavanta.m nirayapaalaana.m aavudhapahaare  asahitvaa aaruhanta.m.
text.10873: [22] sampatita.m vetara.ni.m, ko ta.m yaaceyya ta.m dhana''nti..
text.10878: [03] tattha ^b^kharaa^eb^ti pharusaa. ^b^ayopokkharasa~nchannaa^eb^ti  ayomayehi tikhi.napariyantehi pokkharapattehi sa~nchannaa.  ^b^pattehii^eb^ti tehi pattehi saa nadii tikkhaa hutvaa sandati.
text.1088: [21] ``etuu bhava.m assamima.m adetu, pajja~nca bhakkha~nca  pa.ticcha dammi.
text.10881: [22] vetara~n~ne anaalambe, ko ta.m yaaceyya ta.m dhana''nti..
text.10883: [03] ima.m ^a^M7.0144^ea^ pana mahaasattassa nirayakatha.m sutvaa  raajaa sa.mviggahadayo mahaasatta~n~neva taa.nagavesii hutvaa aaha --
text.10885: [21] ``vedhaami rukkho viya chijjamaano, disa.m na jaanaami  pamuu.lhasa~n~no.
text.10886: [22] bhayaanutappaami mahaa ca me bhayaa, sutvaana kathaa tava  bhaasitaa ise..
text.10889: [22] andhakaareva pajjoto, tva.m nosi sara.na.m ise..
text.1089: [22] idamaasana.m atra bhava.m nisiidatu, ito bhava.m muulaphalaani  bhu~njatuu''ti..
text.10891: [21] ``attha~nca ^a^P6.0251^ea^ dhamma.m anusaasa ma.m ise,  atiitamaddhaa aparaadhita.m mayaa.
text.10892: [22] aacikkha me naarada suddhimagga.m, yathaa aha.m no niraya.m  pateyya''nti..
text.10893: [03] tattha ^b^bhayaanutappaamii^eb^ti attanaa katassa paapassa bhayena  anutappaami. ^b^mahaa ca me bhayaa^eb^ti mahanta~nca me nirayabhaya.m  uppanna.m. ^b^dipa.mvoghe^eb^ti diipa.mva oghe. ida.m vutta.m hoti --  aaditte kaale vaarimajjha.m viya bhinnanaavaana.m oghe a.n.nave pati.t.tha.m  alabhamaanaana.m diipa.m viya andhakaaragataana.m pajjoto viya ca tva.m no ise  sara.na.m bhava. ^b^atiitamaddhaa aparaadhita.m mayaa^eb^ti eka.msena mayaa  atiita.m kamma.m aparaadhita.m viraadhita.m, kusala.m atikkamitvaa akusalameva  katanti.
text.10894: [03] athassa mahaasatto visuddhimagga.m aacikkhitu.m sammaapa.tipanne  poraa.nakaraajaano udaahara.navasena dassento aaha --
text.10897: [22] usindaro caapi sivii ca raajaa, paricaarakaa  sama.nabraahma.naana.m..
text.10899: [21] ``ete ca~n~ne ca raajaano, ye saggavisaya.m gataa.
text.109: [03] ^b^aaya.m vaya^eb^nti tato uppajjanaka.m aaya~nca tesa.m tesa.m daatabba.m  vaya~nca sayameva jaaneyyaasiiti. ^b^kataakata^eb^nti sa"ngaame vaa  navakamme vaa a~n~nesu vaa kiccesu ``iminaa ida.m naama mayha.m kata.m,  iminaa na kata''nti etampi sayameva jaaneyyaasi, maa parapattiyo  hohi. ^b^nigga.nhe^eb^ti, taata, raajaa naama sandhicchedaadikaaraka.m  niggahaaraha.m aanetvaa dassita.m upaparikkhitvaa sodhetvaa poraa.nakaraajuuhi  .thapitada.n.da.m oloketvaa dosaanuruupa.m nigga.nheyya. ^b^pagga.nhe^eb^ti yo  pana paggahaaraho hoti, abhinnassa vaa parabalassa bhedetaa, bhinnassa vaa  sakabalassa aaraadhako, aladdhassa vaa rajjassa aaharako, laddhassa vaa  thaavarakaarako, yena vaa ^a^V5.0114^ea^ pana jiivita.m dinna.m hoti, evaruupa.m paggahaaraha.m  paggahetvaa mahanta.m sakkaarasammaana.m kareyya. eva.m hissa kiccesu  a~n~nepi ura.m datvaa kattabba.m karissanti.
text.1090: [03] tattha ^b^assamima^eb^nti assama.m ima.m bhava.m pavisatu.  ^b^adetuu^eb^ti yathaasannihita.m aahaara.m paribhu~njatu. ^b^pajja^eb^nti  paadabbha~njana.m. ^b^bhakkha^eb^nti madhuraphalaaphala.m. ^b^pa.ticchaa^eb^ti  pa.tigga.nha. ^b^idamaasana^eb^nti pavi.t.thakaale evamaaha.
text.10902: [21] ``annahatthaa ^a^V7.0141^ea^ ^a^M7.0145^ea^ ca te  byamhe, ghosayantu pure tava.
text.10903: [27] `ko chaato ko ca tasito, ko maala.m ko vilepana.m.
text.10906: [21] `ko panthe chattamaaneti, paadukaa ca muduu subhaa'.
text.10907: [22] iti saaya~nca paato ca, ghosayantu pure tava..
text.10909: [21] ``ji.n.na.m posa.m gavaassa~nca, maassu yu~nja yathaa pure.
text.1091: [03] tassaa pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa ka.t.thatthara.ne nisiidantiyaa  suva.n.naciirake dvidhaa gate sariira.m appa.ticchanna.m ahosi. taapaso  maatugaamasariirassa adi.t.thapubbattaa ta.m disvaa ``va.n.no eso''ti  sa~n~naaya evamaaha --
text.10911: [03] tattha ^b^ete caa^eb^ti yathaa ete ca dhatara.t.tho vessaamitto  a.t.thako yaamataggi usindaro siviiti cha raajaano a~n~ne ca dhamma.m  caritvaa saggavisaya.m gataa, eva.m tvampi adhamma.m parivajjetvaa dhamma.m cara.  ^b^ko chaato^eb^ti mahaaraaja, tava byamhe pure raajanivesane ceva  nagare ca annahatthaa purisaa ``ko chaato, ko tasito''ti tesa.m  daatukaamataaya ghosentu. ^b^ko maala^eb^nti ko maala.m icchati, ko  ^a^P6.0252^ea^ vilepana.m icchati, naanaarattaana.m vatthaana.m ya.m ya.m  icchati, ta.m ta.m ko naggo paridahissatiiti ghosentu. ^b^ko panthe  chattamaanetii^eb^ti ko panthe chatta.m dhaarayissati. ^b^paadukaa caa^eb^ti  upaahanaa ca muduu subhaa ko icchati.
text.10912: [03] ^b^ji.n.na.m posa^eb^nti yo te upa.t.thaakesu amacco vaa a~n~no vaa  pubbe katuupakaaro jaraaji.n.nakaale yathaa poraa.nakaale kamma.m kaatu.m na  sakkoti, yepi te gavaassaadayo ji.n.nataaya kamma.m kaatu.m na sakkonti,  tesu ekampi pubbe viya kammesu maa yojayi. ji.n.nakaalasmi~nhi te  taani kammaani kaatu.m na sakkonti. ^b^parihaara~ncaa^eb^ti idha  parivaaro ``parihaaro''ti vutto. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yo ca te  balii hutvaa adhikaarakato pubbe katuupakaaro hoti, tassa  jaraaji.n.nakaale yathaaporaa.naparivaara.m dadeyyaasi. asappurisaa hi  attano upakaarakaana.m upakaara.m kaatu.m samatthakaaleyeva sammaana.m karonti,  samatthakaale pana na olokenti. sappurisaa pana asamatthakaalepi  tesa.m tatheva sakkaara.m karonti, tasmaa tuvampi eva.m kareyyaasiiti.
text.10913: [03] iti ^a^M7.0146^ea^ mahaasatto ra~n~no daanakatha~nca  siilakatha~nca kathetvaa idaani yasmaa aya.m raajaa attano ^a^V7.0142^ea^  attabhaave rathena upametvaa va.n.niyamaane tussissati, tasmaassa  sabbakaamaduharathopamaaya dhamma.m desento aaha --
text.10934: [22] satipatodo dhiirassa, dhiti yogo ca rasmiyo..
text.10937: [22] icchaa lobho ca kummaggo, ujumaggo ca sa.myamo..
text.1094: [22] akkhaahi me pucchito etamattha.m, kose nu te uttama"nga.m  pavi.t.tha''nti..
text.10940: [22] pa~n~naa aako.tanii raaja, tattha attaava saarathi..
text.10943: [22] sabbakaamaduho raaja, na jaatu niraya.m vaje''ti..
text.10944: [03] tattha ^a^M7.0147^ea^ ^b^rathasa~n~naato^eb^ti mahaaraaja, tava  kaayo rathoti sa~n~naato hotu. ^b^manosaarathiko^eb^ti  manasa"nkhaatena kusalacittena saarathinaa samannaagato. ^b^lahuu^eb^ti  vigatathinamiddhataaya sallahuko. ^b^avihi.msaasaaritakkho^eb^ti  avihi.msaamayena saaritena su.t.thu parini.t.thitena akkhena samannaagato.  ^b^sa.mvibhaagapa.ticchado^eb^ti daanasa.mvibhaagamayena pa.ticchadena samannaagato.  ^b^paadasa~n~namanemiyo^eb^ti paadasa.myamamayaaya nemiyaa samannaagato.  ^b^hatthasa~n~namapakkharo^eb^ti hatthasa.myamamayena pakkharena samannaagato.  ^b^kucchisa~n~namanabbhanto^eb^ti kucchisa.myamasa"nkhaatena mitabhojanamayena  telena abbhanto. ``abbha~njitabbo naabhi hotuu''tipi paa.tho.  ^b^vaacaasa~n~namakuujano^eb^ti vaacaasa.myamena akuujano.
text.10945: [03] ^b^saccavaakyasamatta"ngo^eb^ti saccavaakyena paripu.n.naa"ngo  akha.n.daratha"ngo. ^b^apesu~n~nasusa~n~nato^eb^ti apesu~n~nena su.t.thu sa~n~nato  samussito. ^b^giraasakhilanela"ngo^eb^ti sakhilaaya sa.nhavaacaaya  niddosa"ngo ma.t.tharatha"ngo. ^b^mitabhaa.nisilesito^eb^  mitabhaa.nasa"nkhaatena silesena su.t.thu sambandho.  ^b^saddhaalobhasusa"nkhaaro^eb^ti kammaphalasaddahanasaddhaamayena ca  alobhamayena ca sundarena ala"nkaarena samannaagato.  ^b^nivaata~njalikubbaro^eb^ti siilavantaana.m nivaatamayena ceva  a~njalikammamayena ca kubbarena samannaagato.  ^b^athaddhataanatiisaako^eb^ti sakhilasammodabhaavasa"nkhaataaya athaddhataaya  anataiiso, thokanataiisoti attho. ^b^siilasa.mvaranandhano^eb^ti  akha.n.dapa~ncasiilacakkhundriyaadisa.mvarasa"nkhaataaya nandhanarajjuyaa  samannaagato.
text.10946: [03] ^b^akkodhanamanugghaatii^eb^ti akkodhanabhaavasa"nkhaatena anugghaatena  samannaagato. ^b^dhammapa.n.dara-chattako^eb^ti dasakusaladhammasa"nkhaatena  pa.n.daracchattena samannaagato. ^b^baahusaccamapaalambo^eb^ti  atthasannissitabahussutabhaavamayena apaalambena samannaagato.  ^b^.thitacittamupaadhiyo^eb^ti lokadhammehi avikampanabhaavena su.t.thu  .thitaekaggabhaavappattacittasa"nkhaatena upaadhinaa uttaratthara.nena vaa  raajaasanena samannaagato. ^b^kaala~n~nutaacittasaaro^eb^ti ``aya.m  daanassa dinnakaalo, aya.m siilassa rakkhanakaalo''ti eva.m  kaala~n~nutaasa"nkhaatena kaala.m jaanitvaa katena cittena ^a^M7.0148^ea^  kusalasaarena samannaagato. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- yathaa,  mahaaraaja, rathassa naama aa.ni.m aadi.m katvaa dabbasambhaarajaata.m parisuddha.m  saaramaya~nca icchitabba.m, eva~nhi so ratho addhaanakkhamo hoti, eva.m  tavapi kaayaratho kaala.m jaanitvaa katena cittena parisuddhena  daanaadikusalasaarena samannaagato hotuuti. ^b^vesaarajjatida.n.dako^eb^ti  parisamajjhe kathentassapi visaaradabhaavasa"nkhaatena tida.n.dena  ^a^V7.0144^ea^ samannaagato. ^b^nivaatavuttiyottako^eb^ti ovaade  pavattanasa"nkhaatena mudunaa dhurayottena samannaagato ^a^P6.0254^ea^.  mudunaa hi dhurayottena baddharatha.m sindhavaa sukha.m vahanti, eva.m tava  kaayarathopi pa.n.ditaana.m ovaadappavattitaaya aabaddho sukha.m yaatuuti attho.  ^b^anatimaanayugo lahuu^eb^ti anatimaanasa"nkhaatena lahukena yugena  samannaagato.
text.10947: [03] ^b^aliinacittasanthaaro^eb^ti yathaa ratho naama dantamayena  u.laarena santhaarena sobhati, eva.m tava kaayarathopi daanaadinaa  aliinaasa"nku.titacittasanthaaro hotu. ^b^vuddhisevii rajohato^eb^ti  yathaa ratho naama visamena raju.t.thaanamaggena gacchanto rajoki.n.no na  sobhati, samena virajena maggena gacchanto sobhati, eva.m tava  kaayarathopi pa~n~naavuddhisevitaaya samatala.m ujumagga.m pa.tipajjitvaa  hatarajo hotu. ^b^satipatodo dhiirassaa^eb^ti pa.n.ditassa tava tasmi.m  kaayarathe supati.t.thitasatipatodo hotu. ^b^dhiti yogo ca  rasmiyo^eb^ti abbocchinnaviiriyasa"nkhaataa dhiti ca hitappa.tipattiya.m  yu~njanabhaavasa"nkhaato yogo ca tava tasmi.m kaayarathe va.t.titaa thiraa  rasmiyo hontu. ^b^mano danta.m patha.m neti, samadantehi vaahibhii^eb^ti  yathaa ratho naama visamadantehi sindhavehi uppatha.m yaati, samadantehi  samasikkhitehi yutto ujupathameva anveti, eva.m manopi danta.m  nibbisevana.m kummagga.m pahaaya ujumagga.m ga.nhaati. tasmaa sudanta.m  aacaarasampanna.m citta.m tava kaayarathassa sindhavakicca.m saadhetu.  ^b^icchaalobho caa^eb^ti appattesu vatthuusu icchaa, pattesu lobhoti aya.m  icchaa ca lobho ca kummaggo naama. ku.tilo anujumaggo apaayameva  neti. dasakusalakammapathavasena pana a.t.tha"ngikamaggavasena vaa pavatto  siilasa.myamo ujumaggo naama. so tava kaayarathassa maggo hotu.
text.10948: [03] ^b^ruupe^eb^ti ^a^M7.0149^ea^ etesu manaapiyesu ruupaadiisu  kaamagu.nesu nimitta.m gahetvaa dhaavantassa tava kaayarathassa uppatha.m  pa.tipannassa raajarathassa sindhave aako.tetvaa nivaara.napatodaya.t.thi viya  pa~n~naa aako.tanii hotu. saa hi ta.m uppathagamanato nivaaretvaa uju.m  sucaritamagga.m aaropessati. ^b^tattha attaava saarathii^eb^ti tasmi.m pana  te kaayarathe a~n~no saarathi naama natthi, tava attaava saarathi hotu.  ^b^sace etena yaanenaa^eb^ti mahaaraaja, yasseta.m evaruupa.m yaana.m sace  atthi, etena yaanena. ^b^samacariyaa da.lhaa dhitii^eb^ti yassa  samacariyaa ca dhiti ca da.lhaa hoti thiraa, so etena yaanena yasmaa  esa ratho sabbakaamaduho raaja, yathaadhippete sabbakaame deti, tasmaa na  jaatu niraya.m vaje, eka.mseneta.m dhaarehi, evaruupena yaanena niraya.m na  gacchasiiti attho. iti kho, mahaaraaja, ya.m ma.m avaca ``aacikkha  me, naarada, suddhimagga.m, yathaa aha.m no niraye pateyya''nti, aya.m te  so mayaa anekapariyaayena akkhaatoti.
text.10949: [03] evamassa ^a^V7.0145^ea^ dhamma.m desetvaa micchaadi.t.thi.m jahaapetvaa  siile pati.t.thaapetvaa ``ito pa.t.thaaya paapamitte pahaaya kalyaa.namitte  upasa"nkama, nicca.m appamatto hohii''ti ovaada.m datvaa raajadhiitu gu.na.m  va.n.netvaa raajaparisaaya ^a^P6.0255^ea^ ca raajorodhaana~nca ovaada.m  datvaa mahantenaanubhaavena tesa.m passantaana~n~neva brahmaloka.m gato.
text.1095: [03] tattha ^b^supicchita^eb^nti dvinna.m uuruuna.m samaagamakaale suphusita.m  sippipu.tamukhasa.n.thaana.m. subhalakkha.nena hi asamannaagataaya ta.m .thaana.m  aavaa.tadhaatuka.m hoti, samannaagataaya abbhunnata.m sippipu.tamukhasa.n.thaana.m.  ^b^ka.nharivappakaasatii^eb^ti ubhosu passesu kaa.laka.m viya khaayati.  ^b^kose nu te uttama"nga.m pavi.t.tha^eb^nti tava uttama"nga.m li"ngasa.n.thaana.m na  pa~n~naayati, ki.m nu ta.m tava sariirasa"nkhaate kose pavi.t.thanti pucchati.
text.10950: [03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva,  pubbepi mayaa di.t.thijaala.m bhinditvaa uruvelakassapo damitoyevaa''ti  vatvaa jaataka.m samodhaanento imaa gaathaa abhaasi --
text.10956: [22] aanando saa rucaa aasi, yaa raajaana.m pasaadayi..
text.10963: [03] ^b^pa.n.du^eb^ ^a^V7.0146^ea^ ^a^M7.0151^ea^ ^b^kisiyaasi  dubbalaa^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane viharanto attano pa~n~naapaarami.m  aarabbha kathesi. ekadivasa~nhi bhikkhuu dhammasabhaaya.m katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m  ``aavuso, satthaa mahaapa~n~no puthupa~n~no gambhiirapa~n~no javanapa~n~no  haasapa~n~no tikkhapa~n~no nibbedhikapa~n~no parappavaadamaddano, attano  pa~n~naanubhaavena khattiyapa.n.ditaadiihi abhisa"nkhate sukhumapa~nhe bhinditvaa  te dametvaa nibbisevane katvaa tiisu sara.nesu ceva siilesu ca  pati.t.thaapetvaa amatagaamimagga.m pa.tipaadesii''ti. satthaa aagantvaa  ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa  ``imaaya naamaa''ti vutte ``anacchariya.m, bhikkhave, ya.m tathaagato  paramaabhisambodhippatto parappavaada.m bhinditvaa khattiyaadayo dameyya.  purimabhavasmi~nhi bodhi~naa.na.m pariyesantopi tathaagato pa~n~navaa  parappavaadamaddanoyeva. tathaa hi aha.m vidhurakaale sa.t.thiyojanubbedhe  kaa.lapabbatamuddhani pu.n.naka.m naama yakkhasenaapati.m attano ~naa.nabaleneva  dametvaa nibbisevana.m katvaa pa~ncasiilesu pati.t.thaapento attano jiivita.m  daapesi''nti vatvaa tehi yaacito atiita.m aahari.
text.10964: [03] atiite kurura.t.the indapatthanagare dhana~ncayakorabyo naama raajaa  rajja.m kaaresi. vidhurapa.n.dito naama amacco tassa  atthadhammaanusaasako ahosi. so madhurakatho mahaadhammakathiko  sakalajambudiipe raajaano hatthikantavii.naasarena paluddhahatthino viya  ^a^P6.0256^ea^ attano madhuradhammadesanaaya palobhetvaa tesa.m  sakasakarajjaani gantu.m adadamaano buddhaliilaaya mahaajanassa dhamma.m  desento mahantena yasena tasmi.m nagare pa.tivasi.
text.10965: [01] tadaa hi baaraa.nasiyampi gihisahaayakaa cattaaro  braahma.namahaasaalaa mahallakakaale kaamesu aadiinava.m disvaa himavanta.m  pavisitvaa isipabbajja.m pabbajitvaa abhi~n~naa ca samaapattiyo ca  nibbattetvaa vanamuulaphalaahaaraa tattheva cira.m vasitvaa  lo.nambilasevanatthaaya caarika.m ^a^M7.0152^ea^ caramaanaa a"ngara.t.the  ^a^V7.0147^ea^ kaalacampaanagara.m patvaa raajuyyaane vasitvaa punadivase  bhikkhaaya nagara.m pavisi.msu. tattha cattaaro sahaayakaa ku.tumbikaa tesa.m  iriyaapathesu pasiiditvaa vanditvaa bhikkhaabhaajana.m gahetvaa ekeka.m attano  nivesane nisiidaapetvaa pa.niitena aahaarena parivisitvaa pa.ti~n~na.m  gaahaapetvaa uyyaaneyeva vaasaapesu.m. te cattaaro taapasaa catunna.m  ku.tumbikaana.m gehesu nibaddha.m bhu~njitvaa divaavihaaratthaaya eko taapaso  taavati.msabhavana.m gacchati, eko naagabhavana.m, eko supa.n.nabhavana.m, eko  korabyara~n~no migaajinauyyaana.m gacchati. tesu yo devaloka.m gantvaa  divaavihaara.m karoti, so sakkassa yasa.m oloketvaa attano upa.t.thaakassa  tameva va.n.neti. yo naagabhavana.m gantvaa divaavihaara.m karoti, so  naagaraajassa sampatti.m oloketvaa attano upa.t.thaakassa tameva va.n.neti.  yo supa.n.nabhavana.m gantvaa divaavihaara.m karoti, so supa.n.naraajassa  vibhuuti.m oloketvaa attano upa.t.thaakassa tameva va.n.neti. yo  dhana~ncayakorabyaraajassa uyyaana.m gantvaa divaavihaara.m karoti, so  dhana~ncayakorabyara~n~no sirisobhagga.m oloketvaa attano upa.t.thaakassa  tameva va.n.neti.
text.10966: [03] te cattaaropi janaa ta.m tadeva .thaana.m patthetvaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani  katvaa aayupariyosaane eko sakko hutvaa nibbatti, eko saputtadaaro  naagabhavane naagaraajaa hutvaa nibbatti, eko supa.n.nabhavane  simbalivimaane supa.n.naraajaa hutvaa nibbatti. eko  dhana~ncayakorabyara~n~no aggamahesiyaa kucchimhi nibbatti. tepi  taapasaa aparihiinajjhaanaa kaala.m katvaa brahmaloke nibbatti.msu.  korabyakumaaro vu.d.dhimanvaaya pitu accayena rajje pati.t.thahitvaa dhammena  samena rajja.m kaaresi. so pana juutavittako ahosi. so  vidhurapa.n.ditassa ovaade .thatvaa daana.m deti, siila.m rakkhati, uposatha.m  upavasati.
text.10967: [03] so ekadivasa.m samaadinnuposatho ``vivekamanubruuhissaamii''ti  ^a^P6.0257^ea^ uyyaana.m gantvaa manu~n~na.t.thaane nisiiditvaa  sama.nadhamma.m akaasi. sakkopi samaadinnuposatho ``devaloke  palibodho hotii''ti manussaloke tameva uyyaana.m aagantvaa ekasmi.m  manu~n~na.t.thaane nisiiditvaa sama.nadhamma.m akaasi. varu.nanaagaraajaapi  samaadinnuposatho ``naagabhavane palibodho hotii''ti tatthevaagantvaa  ekasmi.m manu~n~na.t.thaane nisiiditvaa ^a^M7.0153^ea^ sama.nadhamma.m  akaasi. supa.n.naraajaapi samaadinnuposatho ``supa.n.nabhavane palibodho  hotii''ti tatthevaagantvaa ekasmi.m manu~n~na.t.thaane nisiiditvaa sama.nadhamma.m  akaasi. tepi cattaaro janaa saayanhasamaye saka.t.thaanehi nikkhamitvaa  ma"ngalapokkhara.nitiire samaagantvaa a~n~nama~n~na.m oloketvaa  pubbasinehavasena samaggaa sammodamaanaa hutvaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mettacitta.m  upa.t.thapetvaa madhurapa.tisanthaara.m kari.msu. tesu sakko ma"ngalasilaapa.t.te  nisiidi, itarepi attano attano yuttaasana.m ~natvaa nisiidi.msu. atha  ne sakko aaha ``maya.m cattaaropi raajaanova ^a^V7.0148^ea^, amhesu pana  kassa siila.m mahanta''nti? atha na.m varu.nanaagaraajaa aaha ``tumhaaka.m  ti.n.na.m janaana.m siilato mayha.m siila.m mahanta''nti. ``kimettha  kaara.na''nti? ``aya.m supa.n.naraajaa amhaaka.m jaataanampi ajaataanampi  paccaamittova, aha.m evaruupa.m amhaaka.m jiivitakkhayakara.m paccaamitta.m  disvaapi kodha.m na karomi, iminaa kaara.nena mama siila.m mahanta''nti  vatvaa ida.m dasakanipaate catuposathajaatake pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
text.10968: [21] ``yo kopaneyye na karoti kopa.m, na kujjhati  sappuriso kadaaci.
text.10969: [22] kuddhopi so naavikaroti kopa.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu  loke''ti.. (jaa0 1.10.24).
text.10970: [01] tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti khattiyaadiisu yo koci.  ^b^kopaneyye^eb^ti kujjhitabbayuttake puggale khantiivaadiitaapaso viya  kopa.m na karoti. ^b^kadaacii^eb^ti yo kismi~nci kaale na  kujjhateva. ^b^kuddhopii^eb^ti sace pana so sappuriso kujjhati, atha  kuddhopi ta.m kopa.m naavikaroti cuu.labodhitaapaso viya. ^b^ta.m ve  nara^eb^nti mahaaraajaano ta.m ve purisa.m samitapaapataaya loke pa.n.ditaa  ``sama.na''nti kathenti. ime ^a^P6.0258^ea^ pana gu.naa mayi  santi, tasmaa mameva siila.m mahantanti.
text.10971: [03] ta.m sutvaa supa.n.naraajaa ``aya.m naago mama aggabhakkho, yasmaa  panaaha.m evaruupa.m aggabhakkha.m disvaapi khuda.m adhivaasetvaa aahaarahetu paapa.m  na karomi, tasmaa mameva siila.m mahanta''nti vatvaa ima.m gaathamaaha --
text.10972: [21] ``uunuudaro ^a^M7.0154^ea^ yo sahate jighaccha.m,  danto tapassii mitapaanabhojano.
text.10973: [22] aahaarahetu na karoti paapa.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu  loke''ti.. (jaa0 1.10.25).
text.10974: [03] tattha ^b^danto^eb^ti indriyadamanena samannaagato.  ^b^tapassii^eb^ti tapanissitako. ^b^aahaarahetuu^eb^ti  atijighacchapi.litopi yo paapa.m laamakakamma.m na karoti  dhammasenaapatisaariputtatthero viya. aha.m panajja aahaarahetu paapa.m na  karomi, tasmaa mameva siila.m mahantanti.
text.10975: [03] tato sakko devaraajaa ``aha.m naanappakaara.m sukhapada.t.thaana.m  devalokasampatti.m pahaaya siilarakkha.natthaaya manussaloka.m aagato, tasmaa  mameva siila.m mahanta''nti vatvaa ima.m gaathamaaha --
text.10976: [21] ``khi.d.da.m ^a^V7.0149^ea^ rati.m vippajahitvaana sabba.m, na  caalika.m bhaasati ki~nci loke.
text.10977: [22] vibhuusa.t.thaanaa virato methunasmaa, ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu  loke''ti.. (jaa0 1.10.26).
text.10978: [03] tattha ^b^khi.d.da^eb^nti kaayikavaacasikakhi.d.da.m. ^b^rati^eb^nti  dibbakaamagu.narati.m. ^b^ki~ncii^eb^ti appamattakampi.  ^b^vibhuusa.t.thaanaa^eb^ti ma.msavibhuusaa chavivibhuusaati dve vibhuusaa. tattha  ajjhohara.niiyaahaaro ma.msavibhuusaa naama, maalaagandhaadiini chavivibhuusaa  naama, yena akusalacittena dhaariiyati, ta.m tassa .thaana.m, tato virato  methunasevanato ca yo pa.tivirato. ^b^ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu  loke^eb^ti aha.m ajja devaccharaayo pahaaya idhaagantvaa sama.nadhamma.m  karomi, tasmaa mameva siila.m mahantanti. eva.m sakkopi attano  siilameva va.n.neti.
text.10979: [03] ta.m sutvaa dhana~ncayaraajaa ``aha.m ajja mahanta.m pariggaha.m  so.lasasahassanaa.takitthiparipu.n.na.m antepura.m cajitvaa uyyaane sama.nadhamma.m  karomi, tasmaa mameva siila.m mahanta''nti vatvaa ima.m gaathamaaha --
text.1098: [21] ``aha.m vane muulaphalesana.m cara.m, aasaadayi.m accha.m  sughoraruupa.m.
text.10980: [21] ``pariggaha.m ^a^P6.0259^ea^ ^a^M7.0155^ea^  lobhadhamma~nca sabba.m, yo ve pari~n~naaya pariccajeti.
text.10981: [22] danta.m .thitatta.m amama.m niraasa.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu  loke''ti.. (jaa0 1.10.27).
text.10982: [03] tattha ^b^pariggaha^eb^nti naanappakaara.m vatthukaama.m.  ^b^lobhadhamma^eb^nti tasmi.m uppajjanata.nha.m. ^b^pari~n~naayaa^eb^ti  ~naatapari~n~naa, tiira.napari~n~naa, pahaanapari~n~naati imaahi tiihi pari~n~naahi  parijaanitvaa. tattha khandhaadiina.m dukkhaadisabhaavajaanana.m ~naatapari~n~naa,  tesu agu.na.m upadhaaretvaa tiira.na.m tiira.napari~n~naa, tesu dosa.m disvaa  chandaraagassaapaka.d.dhana.m pahaanapari~n~naa. yo imaahi tiihi pari~n~naahi  jaanitvaa vatthukaamakilesakaame pariccajati, cha.d.detvaa gacchati.  ^b^danta^eb^nti nibbisevana.m. ^b^.thitatta^eb^nti micchaavitakkaabhaavena  .thitasabhaava.m. ^b^amama^eb^nti ahanti mamaayanata.nhaarahita.m.  ^b^niraasa^eb^nti puttadaaraadiisu nicchandaraaga.m. ^b^ta.m ve nara^eb^nti ta.m  evaruupa.m puggala.m ``sama.na''nti vadanti.
text.10983: [03] iti te sabbepi attano attano siilameva mahantanti va.n.netvaa  sakkaadayo dhana~ncaya.m pucchi.msu ``atthi pana, mahaaraaja, koci tumhaaka.m  santike pa.n.dito, yo no ima.m ka"nkha.m vinodeyyaa''ti ^a^V7.0150^ea^.  ``aama, mahaaraajaano mama atthadhammaanusaasako mahaapa~n~no  asamadhuro vidhurapa.n.dito naama atthi, so no ima.m ka"nkha.m  vinodessati, tassa santika.m gacchaamaa''ti. atha te sabbe  ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchi.msu. atha sabbepi uyyaanaa nikkhamitvaa  dhammasabha.m gantvaa palla"nka.m ala"nkaaraapetvaa bodhisatta.m palla"nkavaramajjhe  nisiidaapetvaa pa.tisanthaara.m katvaa ekamanta.m nisinnaa ``pa.n.dita,  amhaaka.m ka"nkhaa uppannaa, ta.m no vinodehii''ti vatvaa ima.m gaathamaaha.msu  --
text.10984: [21] ``pucchaama kattaaramanomapa~n~na.m, kathaasu no viggaho  atthi jaato.
text.10985: [22] chindajja ka"nkha.m vicikicchitaani, tadajja ka"nkha.m  vitaremu sabbe''ti.. (jaa0 1.10.28).
text.10986: [03] tattha ^b^kattaara^eb^nti kattabbayuttakakaaraka.m. ^b^viggaho  atthi jaato^eb^ti eko siilaviggaho siilavivaado uppanno atthi.  ^b^chindajjaa^eb^ti amhaaka.m ta.m ^a^M7.0156^ea^ ka"nkha.m taani ca  vicikicchitaani vajirena sineru.m paharanto viya ajja chinda.  ^b^vitaremuu^eb^ti vitareyyaama.
text.10987: [03] pa.n.dito ^a^P6.0260^ea^ tesa.m katha.m sutvaa ``mahaaraajaano  tumhaaka.m siila.m nissaaya uppanna.m vivaadakatha.m sukathitadukkathita.m  jaanissaamii''ti vatvaa ima.m gaathamaaha --
text.10988: [21] ``ye pa.n.ditaa atthadasaa bhavanti, bhaasanti te yoniso  tattha kaale.
text.10989: [22] katha.m nu kathaana.m abhaasitaana.m, attha.m nayeyyu.m kusalaa  janindaa''ti.. (jaa0 1.10.29).
text.1099: [22] so ^a^P5.0198^ea^ ma.m patitvaa sahasaajjhapatto,  panujja ma.m abbahi uttama"nga.m..
text.10990: [03] tattha ^b^atthadasaa^eb^ti atthadassanasamatthaa. ^b^tattha  kaale^eb^ti tasmi.m viggahe aarocite yuttappayuttakaale te pa.n.ditaa tamattha.m  aacikkhantaa yoniso bhaasanti. ^b^attha.m nayeyyu.m kusalaa^eb^ti  kusalaa chekaapi samaanaa abhaasitaana.m kathaana.m katha.m nu attha.m ~naa.nena  nayeyyu.m upaparikkheyyu.m. ^b^janindaa^eb^ti raajaano aalapati.  tasmaa ida.m taava me vadetha.
text.10991: [21] ``katha.m have bhaasati naagaraajaa, garu.lo pana venateyyo  kimaaha.
text.10992: [22] gandhabbaraajaa pana ki.m vadeti, katha.m pana kuruuna.m  raajase.t.tho''ti.. (jaa0 1.10.30).
text.10995: [21] ``khanti.m have bhaasati naagaraajaa, appaahaara.m garu.lo  venateyyo.
text.10997: [03] tassattho -- pa.n.dita, naagaraajaa taava kopaneyyepi puggale  akuppanasa"nkhaata.m adhivaasanakhanti.m va.n.neti, garu.lo  appaahaarataasa"nkhaata.m aahaarahetu ^a^M7.0157^ea^ paapassa akara.na.m,  sakko pa~ncakaamagu.naratiina.m vippahaana.m, kururaajaa nippalibodhabhaava.m  va.n.netiiti.
text.10998: [03] atha tesa.m katha.m sutvaa mahaasatto ima.m gaathamaaha --
text.10999: [21] ``sabbaani etaani subhaasitaani, na hettha  dubbhaasitamatthi ki~nci.
text.11: [03] tesu pa.thama.m uluukaa.n.da.m bhijji. amacco eka.m nesaada.m  pakkosaapetvaa ``tva.m itthibhaava.m vaa purisabhaava.m vaa jaanaahii''ti vatvaa  tena ta.m viima.msitvaa ``puriso''ti vutte raajaana.m upasa"nkamitvaa ``putto  te, deva, jaato''ti aaha. raajaa tu.t.tho tassa bahu.m dhana.m datvaa  ``puttaka.m me saadhuka.m pa.tijagga, `vessantaro'ti cassa naama.m  karohii''ti vatvaa uyyojesi. so tathaa akaasi. tato  katipaahaccayena saalikaaa.n.da.m bhijji. sopi amacco ta.m nesaadena  viima.msaapetvaa ``itthii''ti sutvaa ra~n~no santika.m gantvaa ``dhiitaa te,  deva, jaataa''ti aaha. raajaa tu.t.tho tassapi bahu.m dhana.m datvaa ``dhiitara.m  ^a^P5.0111^ea^ me saadhuka.m pa.tijagga, `ku.n.dalinii'ti cassaa naama.m  karohii''ti vatvaa uyyojesi. sopi tathaa akaasi. puna  katipaahaccayena suvakaa.n.da.m bhijji. sopi amacco nesaadena ta.m  viima.msitvaa ``puriso''ti vutte ra~n~no santika.m gantvaa ``putto te,  deva, jaato''ti aaha. raajaa tu.t.tho tassapi bahu.m dhana.m datvaa  ``puttassa me mahantena parivaarena ma"ngala.m katvaa `jambuko'tissa naama.m  karohii''ti vatvaa uyyojesi. sopi tathaa akaasi. te tayopi  saku.naa ti.n.na.m amaccaana.m gehesu raajakumaaraparihaareneva va.d.dhanti.  raajaa ``mama putto, mama dhiitaa''ti voharati. athassa amaccaa  a~n~nama~n~na.m avahasanti ``passatha, bho, ra~n~no ^a^M5.0116^ea^  kiriya.m, tiracchaanagatepi `putto me, dhiitaa me'ti vadanto  vicaratii''ti.
text.110: [03] ^b^jaanapada^eb^nti janapadavaasiina.m attha.m saya.m attapaccakkheneva  anusaasa. ^b^adhammikaa yuttaa^eb^ti adhammikaa tattha tattha niyuttaa  aayuttakaa la~nja.m gahetvaa vinicchaya.m bhindantaa tava dhana~nca ra.t.tha~nca maa  naasayu.m. iminaa kaara.nena appamatto hutvaa sayameva anusaasa.  ^b^vegenaa^eb^ti sahasaa atuletvaa atiiretvaa. ^b^vegasaa^eb^ti  atuletvaa atiiretvaa chandaadivasena sahasaa kata.m kamma~nhi na saadhu na  sundara.m. ki.mkaara.naa? taadisa~nhi katvaa mando pacchaa  vippa.tisaaravasena idha loke apaayadukkha.m anubhavanto paraloke ca  anutappati. aya.m panettha attho ``isiinamantara.m katvaa, bharuraajaati  me suta''nti bharujaatakena (jaa0 1.2.125-126) diipetabbo  ^a^P5.0119^ea^.
text.11000: [27] yasmi~nca etaani pati.t.thitaani, araava ^a^P6.0261^ea^  naabhyaa susamohitaani.
text.11001: [22] catubbhi dhammehi sama"ngibhuuta.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.namaahu  loke''ti.. (jaa0 1.10.32).
text.11002: [03] tattha ^b^etaanii^eb^ti etaani cattaaripi gu.najaataani yasmi.m  puggale saka.tanaabhiya.m su.t.thu samohitaani araa viya pati.t.thitaani,  catuuhipetehi dhammehi samannaagata.m puggala.m pa.n.ditaa ``sama.na''nti aahu  loketi.
text.11003: [03] eva.m mahaasatto catunnampi siila.m ekasamameva akaasi. ta.m  sutvaa cattaaropi raajaano tassa tu.t.thaa thuti.m karontaa ima.m gaathamaaha.msu  --
text.11004: [21] ``tuva~nhi se.t.tho tvamanuttarosi, tva.m dhammaguu dhammaviduu  sumedho.
text.11005: [27] pa~n~naaya pa~nha.m samadhiggahetvaa, acchecchi dhiiro  vicikicchitaani.
text.11006: [03] acchecchi ka"nkha.m vicikicchitaani, cundo yathaa naagadanta.m  kharenaa''ti.. (jaa0 1.10.33).
text.11007: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0152^ea^ ^b^tvamanuttarosii^eb^ti tva.m anuttaro asi,  natthi tayaa uttaritaro naama. ^b^dhammaguu^eb^ti dhammassa gopako ceva  dhamma~n~nuu ca. ^b^dhammaviduu^eb^ti paaka.tadhammo. ^b^sumedho^eb^ti  sundarapa~n~no ^b^pa~n~naayaa^eb^ti attano pa~n~naaya amhaaka.m pa~nha.m su.t.thu  adhiga.nhitvaa ``idamettha kaara.na''nti yathaabhuuta.m ~natvaa.  ^b^acchecchii^eb^ti tva.m dhiiro amhaaka.m vicikicchitaani chindi, eva.m  chindanto ca ``chindajja ka"nkha.m vicikicchitaanii''ti ida.m amhaaka.m  aayaacana.m sampaadento acchecchi ka"nkha.m vicikicchitaani ^a^M7.0158^ea^.  ^b^cundo yathaa naagadanta.m kharenaa^eb^ti yathaa dantakaaro  kakacena hatthidanta.m chindeyya, eva.m chindiiti attho.
text.11008: [03] eva.m te cattaaropi raajaano tassa pa~nhabyaakara.nena tu.t.thamaanasaa  ahesu.m. atha na.m sakko dibbadukuulena puujesi, garu.lo suva.n.namaalaaya,  varu.no naagaraajaa ma.ninaa, dhana~ncayaraajaa gavasahassaadiihi puujesi.  tenevaaha --
text.1101: [21] ``svaaya.m ^a^V5.0189^ea^ ^a^M5.0208^ea^ va.no khajjati  ka.n.duvaayati, sabba~nca kaala.m na labhaami saata.m.
text.11010: [22] pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena tu.t.tho, dadaami te dhammapuujaaya  dhiira..
text.11012: [22] pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena tu.t.tho, dadaami te dhammapuujaaya  dhiira..
text.11013: [21] ``ma.ni.m anaggha.m rucira.m pabhassara.m, ka.n.thaavasatta.m  ma.nibhuusita.m me.
text.11014: [22] pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena tu.t.tho, dadaami te dhammapuujaaya  dhiira..
text.11015: [21] ``gava.m sahassa.m usabha~nca naaga.m, aaja~n~nayutte ca rathe  dasa ime.
text.11016: [22] pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena tu.t.tho, dadaami te gaamavaraani  so.lasaa''ti.. (jaa0 1.10.34-37).
text.11017: [03] eva.m sakkaadayo ^a^P6.0262^ea^ mahaasatta.m puujetvaa saka.t.thaanameva  agami.msu.
text.1102: [22] paho bhava.m ka.n.dumima.m vinetu.m, kuruta.m bhava.m yaacito  braahma.nattha''nti..
text.11020: [03] tesu ^a^V7.0153^ea^ ^a^M7.0159^ea^ naagaraajassa bhariyaa  vimalaadevii naama. saa tassa giivaaya pi.landhanama.ni.m apassantii  pucchi ``deva, kaha.m pana te ma.nii''ti? ``bhadde, candabraahma.naputtassa  vidhurapa.n.ditassa dhammakatha.m sutvaa pasannacitto aha.m tena ma.ninaa ta.m  puujesi.m. na kevala~nca ahameva, sakkopi ta.m dibbadukuulena puujesi,  supa.n.naraajaa suva.n.namaalaaya, dhana~ncayaraajaa gavassasahassaadiihi  puujesii''ti. ``dhammakathiko so, devaa''ti. ``bhadde, ki.m vadesi,  jambudiipatale buddhuppaado viya pavattati, sakalajambudiipe ekasataraajaano  tassa madhuradhammakathaaya bajjhitvaa hatthikantavii.naasarena  paluddhamattavaara.naa viya attano attano rajjaani gantu.m na icchanti,  evaruupo so madhuradhammakathiko''ti tassa gu.na.m va.n.nesi. saa  vidhurapa.n.ditassa gu.nakatha.m sutvaa tassa dhammakatha.m sotukaamaa hutvaa  cintesi ``sacaaha.m vakkhaami `deva, tassa dhammakatha.m sotukaamaa, idha  na.m aanehii'ti, na meta.m aanessati. ya.mnuunaaha.m `tassa me hadaye  doha.lo uppanno'ti gilaanaalaya.m kareyya''nti. saa tathaa katvaa  siragabbha.m pavisitvaa attano paricaarikaana.m sa~n~na.m datvaa sirisayane  nipajji. naagaraajaa upa.t.thaanavelaaya ta.m apassanto ``kaha.m vimalaa''ti  paricaarikaayo pucchitvaa ``gilaanaa, devaa''ti vutte u.t.thaayaasanaa  tassaa santika.m gantvaa sayanapasse nisiiditvaa sariira.m parimajjanto  pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
text.11022: [21] ``pa.n.du kisiyaasi dubbalaa, va.n.naruupa.m na tavedisa.m pure.
text.11023: [22] vimale akkhaahi pucchitaa, kiidisii tuyha.m  sariiravedanaa''ti..
text.11024: [03] tattha ^b^pa.n.duu^eb^ti pa.n.dupalaasava.n.naa. ^b^kisiyaa^eb^ti kisaa.  ^b^dubbalaa^eb^ti appathaamaa. ^b^va.n.naruupa.m na tavedisa.m pure^eb^ti  tava va.n.nasa"nkhaata.m ruupa.m pure edisa.m na hoti, niddosa.m anavajja.m, ta.m  idaani parivattitvaa amanu~n~nasabhaava.m jaata.m. ^b^vimale^eb^ti ta.m  aalapati.
text.11027: [21] ``dhammo ^a^P6.0263^ea^ manujesu maatiina.m, doha.lo  naama janinda vuccati.
text.11029: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0154^ea^ ^b^dhammo^eb^ti sabhaavo. ^b^maatiina^eb^nti  itthiina.m. ^b^janindaa^eb^ti naagajanassa inda. ^b^dhammaaha.ta.m  naagaku~njara, vidhurassa hadayaabhipatthaye^eb^ti naagase.t.tha, aha.m dhammena samena  asaahasikakammena aaha.ta.m vidhurassa hadaya.m abhipatthayaami, ta.m me  labhamaanaaya jiivita.m atthi, alabhamaanaaya idheva mara.nanti tassa pa~n~na.m  sandhaayevamaaha --
text.1103: [03] tattha ^b^aasaadayi^eb^nti gha.t.tesi.m, aagacchanta.m disvaa le.d.dunaa  paharinti attho. ^b^patitvaa^eb^ti upadhaavitvaa.  ^b^sahasaajjhappatto^eb^ti mama.m sahasaa ajjhappatto sampatto.  ^b^panujjaa^eb^ti atha ma.m potetvaa. ^b^abbahii^eb^ti mukhena mama  uttama"nga.m lu~ncitvaa pakkaami, tato pa.t.thaaya imasmi.m .thaane va.no jaato.  ^b^svaaya^eb^nti so aya.m tato pa.t.thaaya mayha.m va.no khajjati ceva  ka.n.duva~nca karoti, tappaccayaa saaha.m sabbakaala.m kaayikacetasikasukha.m na  labhaami. ^b^paho^eb^ti pahu samattho. ^b^braahma.nattha^eb^nti bhava.m mayaa  yaacito ima.m braahma.nassa attha.m karotu, ida.m me dukkha.m haraahiiti vadati.
text.11032: [21] ``canda.m kho tva.m doha.laayasi, suuriya.m vaa atha vaapi  maaluta.m.
text.11033: [22] dullabha~nhi vidhurassa dassana.m, ko vidhuramidha  maanayissatii''ti..
text.11034: [03] tattha ^b^dullabha~nhi vidhurassa dassana^eb^nti asamadhurassa  vidhurassa dassanameva dullabha.m. tassa hi sakalajambudiipe raajaano  dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m paccupa.t.thaapetvaa vicaranti, passitumpi na.m  koci na labhati, ta.m ko idha aanayissatiiti vadati.
text.11035: [03] saa tassa vacana.m sutvaa ``alabhamaanaaya me idheva mara.na''nti  parivattitvaa pi.t.thi.m datvaa saa.lakaka.n.nena mukha.m pidahitvaa nipajji.  naagaraajaa anattamano sirigabbha.m pavisitvaa sayanapi.t.the nisinno  ``vimalaa vidhurapa.n.ditassa hadayama.msa.m aaharaapetii''ti sa~n~nii hutvaa  ``pa.n.ditassa hadaya.m alabhantiyaa vimalaaya jiivita.m natthi, katha.m nu  kho tassa hadayama.msa.m labhissaamii''ti cintesi. athassa dhiitaa  irandhatii naama naagaka~n~naa sabbaala"nkaarapa.tima.n.ditaa mahantena  sirivilaasena pitu upa.t.thaana.m aagantvaa pitara.m vanditvaa ekamanta.m  .thitaa, saa tassa indriyavikaara.m disvaa ``taata, ativiya  domanassappattosi, ki.m nu kho kaara.na''nti pucchantii ima.m gaathamaaha  --
text.11037: [21] ``ki.m ^a^M7.0161^ea^ nu taata tuva.m pajjhaayasi,  paduma.m hatthagata.mva te mukha.m.
text.11038: [22] ki.m nu dummanaruuposi ^a^P6.0264^ea^ issara, maa  tva.m soci amittataapanaa''ti..
text.11039: [03] tattha ^b^pajjhaayasii^eb^ti punappuna.m cintesi.  ^b^hatthagata^eb^nti hatthena parimaddita.m paduma.m viya te mukha.m jaata.m.  ^b^issaraa^eb^ti pa~ncayojanasatikassa mandiranaagabhavanassa, saamiiti.
text.1104: [03] so tassaa musaavaada.m ``sabhaavo''ti saddahitvaa ``sace te eva.m  sukha.m hoti, karissaamii''ti ta.m padesa.m oloketvaa anantara.m gaathamaaha  --
text.11040: [03] dhiitu vacana.m sutvaa naagaraajaa tamattha.m aarocento aaha --
text.11042: [21] ``maataa ^a^V7.0155^ea^ hi tava irandhati, vidhurassa  hadaya.m dhaniyati.
text.11043: [22] dullabha~nhi vidhurassa dassana.m, ko vidhuramidha  maanayissatii''ti..
text.11045: [03] atha na.m naagaraajaa ``amma, mama santike vidhura.m aanetu.m  samattho natthi, tva.m maatu jiivita.m dehi, vidhura.m aanetu.m samattha.m bhattaara.m  pariyesaahii''ti uyyojento upa.d.dhagaathamaaha --
text.11049: [03] iti so kilesaabhiratabhaavena dhiitu ananucchavika.m katha.m kathesi.  tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.11050: [22] ``pituno ca saa sutvaana vaakya.m, ratti.m nikkhamma  avassuti.m carii''ti..
text.11051: [03] tattha ^b^avassuti^eb^nti bhikkhave, saa naagamaa.navikaa pitu  vacana.m sutvaa pitara.m assaasetvaa maatu santika.m gantvaa tampi  assaasetvaa attano sirigabbha.m gantvaa sabbaala"nkaarehi attaana.m  ala"nkaritvaa eka.m kusumbharattavattha.m nivaasetvaa eka.m eka.mse katvaa tameva  ratti.m udaka.m dvidhaa katvaa naagabhavanato nikkhamma ^a^M7.0162^ea^  himavantappadese samuddatiire .thita.m sa.t.thiyojanubbedha.m ekagghana.m kaa.lapabbata.m  naama a~njanagiri.m gantvaa avassuti.m cari kilesaavassuti.m  bhattupariyesana.m cariiti attho.
text.11052: [03] carantii ^a^P6.0265^ea^ ca yaani himavante  va.n.nagandhasampannaani pupphaani, taani aaharitvaa sakalapabbata.m  ma.niagghiya.m viya ala"nkaritvaa uparitale pupphasanthaara.m katvaa  manoramenaakaarena naccitvaa madhuragiita.m gaayantii sattama.m gaathamaaha --
text.11054: [21] ``ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca naage, ke kimpurise caapi  maanuse.
text.11055: [22] ke pa.n.dite sabbakaamadade, diigharatta.m bhattaa me  bhavissatii''ti..
text.11056: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0156^ea^ ^b^ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca naage^eb^ti ko  gandhabbo vaa rakkhaso vaa naago vaa. ^b^ke pa.n.dite  sabbakaamadade^eb^ti ko etesu gandhabbaadiisu pa.n.dito sabbakaama.m daatu.m  samattho, so vidhurassa hadayama.msadoha.liniyaa mama maatu manoratha.m  matthaka.m paapetvaa mayha.m diigharatta.m bhattaa bhavissatiiti.
text.11057: [03] tasmi.m kha.ne vessava.namahaaraajassa bhaagineyyo pu.n.nako naama  yakkhasenaapati tigaavutappamaa.na.m manomayasindhava.m abhiruyha  kaa.lapabbatamatthakena yakkhasamaagama.m gacchanto ta.m taaya giitasadda.m  assosi. anantare attabhaave anubhuutapubbaaya itthiyaa giitasaddo tassa  chaviaadiini chinditvaa a.t.thimi~nja.m aahacca a.t.thaasi. so taaya  pa.tibaddhacitto hutvaa nivattitvaa sindhavapi.t.the nisinnova ``bhadde, aha.m  mama pa~n~naaya dhammena samena vidhurassa hadaya.m aanetu.m samatthomhi, tva.m  maa cintayii''ti ta.m assaasento a.t.thama.m gaathamaaha --
text.11059: [21] ``assaasa hessaami te pati, bhattaa te hessaami  anindalocane.
text.1106: [21] ``gambhiiraruupo te va.no salohito, apuutiko va.nagandho  mahaa ca.
text.11060: [22] pa~n~naa hi mama.m tathaavidhaa, assaasa hessasi bhariyaa  mamaa''ti..
text.11062: [03] atha na.m irandhatii ``tena hi ehi, gacchaama me pitu  santika''nti aanesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.11065: [22] ehi ^a^P6.0266^ea^ gacchaama pitu mamantike,  esova te etamattha.m pavakkhatii''ti..
text.11066: [03] tattha ^b^pubbapathaanugatenaa^eb^ti anantare attabhaave  bhuutapubbasaamike tasmi.m pubbapatheneva anugatena. ^b^ehi gacchaamaa^eb^ti  bhikkhave, so yakkhasenaapati eva.m vatvaa ``ima.m assapi.t.thi.m aaropetvaa  nessaamii''ti pabbatamatthakaa otaritvaa tassaa gaha.nattha.m hattha.m pasaaresi.  saa attano hattha.m ga.nhitu.m adatvaa tena pasaaritahattha.m saya.m gahetvaa  ``saami, naaha.m anaathaa, mayha.m pitaa varu.no naama naagaraajaa, maataa  vimalaa naama devii, ehi mama pitu santika.m gacchaama, eso eva te  yathaa amhaaka.m ma"ngalakiriyaaya bhavitabba.m, eva.m etamattha.m pavakkhatii''ti  avacaasi.
text.11067: [03] eva.m ^a^V7.0157^ea^ vatvaa saa yakkha.m gahetvaa pitu santika.m  agamaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.1107: [22] karomi te ki~nci kasaayayoga.m, yathaa bhava.m paramasukhii  bhaveyyaa''ti..
text.11071: [03] tattha ^b^pitusantikupaagamii^eb^ti attano pituno naagara~n~no  santika.m upaagami.
text.11072: [03] pu.n.nakopi yakkho pa.tiharitvaa naagaraajassa santika.m gantvaa  irandhati.m yaacanto aaha --
text.11074: [21] ``naagavara vaco su.nohi me, patiruupa.m pa.tipajja su"nkiya.m.
text.11075: [22] patthemi aha.m irandhati.m, taaya sama"ngi.m karohi ma.m tuva.m..
text.1108: [03] tattha ^b^salohito^eb^ti rattobhaaso. ^b^apuutiko^eb^ti  puutima.msarahito. ^b^va.nagandho^eb^ti thoka.m duggandho.  ^b^kasaayayoga^eb^nti aha.m keci rukkhakasaaye gahetvaa tava eka.m  kasaayayoga.m karomiiti.

text.111: [03] ^b^maa te adhisare mu~nca, subaa.lhamadhikopita^eb^nti, taata,  tava hadaya.m kusala.m adhisaritvaa atikkamitvaa pavatte paresa.m  akusalakamme su.t.thu baa.lha.m adhikopita.m kujjhaapita.m hutvaa maa mu~nca, maa  pati.t.thaayatuuti attho. ida.m ^a^M5.0125^ea^ vutta.m hoti -- taata,  yadaa te vinicchaye .thitassa iminaa puriso vaa hato sandhi vaa  chinnoti cora.m dassenti, tadaa te paresa.m vacanehi su.t.thu kopitampi  hadaya.m kodhavasena maa mu~nca, apariggahetvaa maa da.n.da.m pa.nehi.  ki.mkaara.naa? acorampi hi ``coro''ti gahetvaa aanenti, tasmaa  akujjhitvaa ubhinna.m attapaccatthikaana.m katha.m sutvaa su.t.thu sodhetvaa  attapaccakkhena tassa corabhaava.m ~natvaa pave.niyaa .thapitada.n.davasena kattabba.m  karohi. ra~n~naa hi uppannepi kodhe hadaya.m siitala.m akatvaa kamma.m na  kaatabba.m. yadaa panassa hadaya.m nibbuta.m hoti muduka.m, tadaa  vinicchayakamma.m kaatabba.m. pharuse hi citte pakkuthite udake  mukhanimitta.m viya kaara.na.m na pa~n~naayati. ^b^kodhasaa hii^eb^ti, taata,  kodhena hi bahuuni phiitaani raajakulaani akulabhaava.m gataani  mahaavinaasameva pattaaniiti. imassa panatthassa diipanattha.m  khantivaadijaataka- (jaa0 1.4.49 aadayo)  naa.likeraraajavatthusahassabaahuajjunavatthuaadiini kathetabbaani.

text.11163: [03] iti so vessava.nena ananu~n~naato gantu.m avisahitvaa ta.m  anujaanaapetu.m etaa ettakaa gaathaa kathesi. vessava.no pana tassa katha.m  na su.naati. ki.mkaara.naa? dvinna.m devaputtaana.m vimaanaa.d.da.m  paricchindatiiti. pu.n.nako attano vacanassa assutabhaava.m ~natvaa  jinakadevaputtassa ^a^P6.0271^ea^ santike a.t.thaasi. vessava.no  a.d.da.m vinicchinitvaa paraajita.m anu.t.thaapetvaa itara.m ``gaccha tva.m, tava  vimaane vasaahii''ti aaha. pu.n.nako ``gaccha tva''nti vuttakkha.neyeva  ``mayha.m maatulena mama pesitabhaava.m jaanaathaa''ti katipayadevaputte  sakkhi.m katvaa he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva sindhava.m aaharaapetvaa abhiruyha pakkaami.  tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --

text.11199: [03] tattha ^a^M7.0172^ea^ ^b^oruyhupaagacchi sabha.m kuruuna^eb^nti  bhikkhave, so pu.n.nako assapi.t.thito oruyha assa.m adissamaanaruupa.m  .thapetvaa maa.navakava.n.nena kuruuna.m sabha.m upagato. ^b^ekasata^eb^nti  ekasataraajaano achambhiito hutvaa ``ko niidhaa''tiaadiini vadanto  juutena avhettha. ^b^ko niidhaa^eb^ti ko nu imasmi.m raajasamaagame.  ^b^ra~n~na^eb^nti raajuuna.m antare. ^b^varamaabhijetii^eb^ti amhaaka.m santaka.m  se.t.tharatana.m abhijeti, ``aha.m jinaamii''ti vattu.m ussahati.  ^b^kamaabhijeyyaamaa^eb^ti ka.m vaa maya.m jineyyaama. ^b^varaddhanenaa^eb^ti  uttamadhanena. ^b^kamanuttara^eb^nti jinanto ca katara.m raajaana.m anuttara.m  ratanavara.m jinaama. ^b^ko vaapi no jetii^eb^ti atha vaa ko naama  raajaa amhe varadhanena jeti. iti so catuuhi padehi korabyameva  gha.t.teti.
text.112: [03] ^b^maa, taata, issaromhiiti, anatthaaya pataarayii^eb^ti, taata,  ``aha.m pathavissaro''ti maa mahaajana.m kaayaduccaritaadianatthaaya  pataarayi maa otaarayi, yathaa ta.m anattha.m samaadaaya vattati, maa  evamakaasiiti attho. ^b^maa te aasii^eb^ti, taata, tava vijite  manussajaatikaana.m vaa tiracchaanajaatikaana.m vaa itthipurisaana.m  ^b^dukhudrayo^eb^ dukkhuppatti maa aasi. yathaa hi adhammikaraajuuna.m  ^a^V5.0115^ea^ vijite manussaa kaayaduccaritaadiini katvaa niraye uppajjanti, tava  ra.t.thavaasiina.m ta.m dukkha.m yathaa na hoti, tathaa karohiiti attho.
text.11200: [03] atha raajaa ``mayaa ito pubbe eva.m suuro hutvaa kathento naama  na di.t.thapubbo, ko nu kho eso''ti cintetvaa pucchanto gaathamaaha --

text.11209: [03] tattha ^b^anuunanaamo^eb^ti na uunanaamo. iminaa attano  pu.n.nakanaamameva pa.ticchanna.m katvaa katheti. ^b^iti mavhayantii^eb^ti  iti ma.m avhayanti pakkosanti ^a^M7.0173^ea^. ^b^a"ngesuu^eb^ti  a"ngara.t.the kaalacampaanagare vasanti. ^b^akkhena devasmii^eb^ti deva,  juutakii.lanatthena idha anuppattosmi.

text.11400: [22] ajesi yakkho naraviirase.t.tha.m, tatthappanaado tumulo  babhuuvaa''ti..
text.11401: [03] tattha ^b^paavisu^eb^nti juutasaala.m pavisi.msu. ^b^viccina^eb^nti  raajaa catuviisatiyaa aayesu vicinanto kali.m paraajayaggaaha.m aggahesi.  ^b^ka.ta.m aggahii^eb^ti pu.n.nako naama yakkho jayaggaaha.m ga.nhi.  ^b^te tattha juute ubhaye samaagate^eb^ti te tattha juute samaagataa ubho  juuta.m kii.li.msuuti attho. ^b^ra~n~na^eb^nti atha tesa.m ekasataraajuuna.m  sakaase avasesaana~nca sakhiina.m majjhe so yakkho naraviirase.t.tha.m raajaana.m  ajesi. ^b^tatthappanaado tumulo babhuuvaa^eb^ti tasmi.m juutama.n.dale  ``ra~n~no paraajitabhaava.m jaanaatha, jita.m me, jita.m me''ti mahanto saddo  ahosi.
text.11402: [03] raajaa paraajito anattamano ahosi. atha na.m samassaasento  pu.n.nako gaathamaaha --
text.11404: [21] ``jayo ^a^P6.0283^ea^ ^a^M7.0184^ea^  mahaaraaja paraajayo ca, aayuuhata.m a~n~natarassa hoti.
text.11405: [22] janinda jiinosi varaddhanena, jito ca me  khippamavaakarohii''ti..
text.11406: [03] tattha ^b^aayuuhata^eb^nti dvinna.m vaayaamamaanaana.m a~n~natarassa eva  hoti, tasmaa ``paraajitomhii''ti ^a^V7.0176^ea^ maa cintayi.  ^b^jiinosii^eb^ti parihiinosi. ^b^varaddhanenaa^eb^ti paramadhanena.  ^b^khippamavaakarohii^eb^ti khippa.m me jaya.m dhana.m dehiiti.
text.11407: [03] atha na.m raajaa ``ga.nha, taataa''ti vadanto gaathamaaha --
text.11409: [21] ``hatthii gavaassaa ma.niku.n.dalaa ca, ya~ncaapi mayha.m  ratana.m pathabyaa.
text.1141: [22] teyeva pucchesi mamassama.m ta.m, te ta.m nayissanti mama.m  sakaase''ti..
text.11410: [22] ga.nhaahi kaccaana vara.m dhanaana.m, aadaaya yenicchasi tena  gacchaa''ti..
text.11413: [21] ``hatthii gavaassaa ma.niku.n.dalaa ca, ya~ncaapi tuyha.m  ratana.m pathabyaa.
text.11414: [22] tesa.m varo vidhuro naama kattaa, so me jito ta.m me  avaakarohii''ti..
text.11415: [03] tattha ^b^so me jito ta.m me^eb^ti mayaa hi tava vijite uttama.m  ratana.m jita.m, so ca sabbaratanaana.m varo vidhuro, tasmaa, deva, so  mayaa jito naama hoti, ta.m me dehiiti.
text.11418: [21] ``attaa ca me so sara.na.m gatii ca, diipo ca le.no ca  paraaya.no ca.
text.11419: [22] asantuleyyo mama so dhanena, paa.nena me saadiso esa  kattaa''ti..
text.1142: [03] tattha ^b^raajiisayo^eb^ti, samma, mayaa na sakkaa ciraayitu.m,  a~n~ne pana saadhusabhaavaa raajisayo ca braahma.nisayo ca anumagge mama  assamamaggapasse vasanti, aha.m tesa.m aacikkhitvaa gamissaami, tva.m te  puccheyyaasi, te ta.m mama santika.m nayissantiiti.
text.11420: [03] tattha ^b^attaa ca me so^eb^ti so mayha.m attaa ca, mayaa ca  ``attaana.m .thapetvaa sesa.m dassaamii''ti vutta.m, tasmaa ta.m maa ga.nhi. na  kevala~nca attaava ^a^M7.0185^ea^, atha kho me so sara.na~nca gati  ca diipo ca le.no ca paraaya.no ca. ^b^asantuleyyo mama so  dhanenaa^eb^ti sattavidhena ratanena saddhi.m na tuletabboti.
text.11423: [21] ``cira.m vivaado mama tuyha~ncassa, kaama~nca pucchaama  tameva gantvaa.
text.11424: [22] esova ^a^P6.0284^ea^ no vivaratu etamattha.m, ya.m  vakkhatii hotu kathaa ubhinna''nti..
text.11425: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0177^ea^ ^b^vivaratu etamattha^eb^nti ``so tava  attaa vaa na vaa''ti etamattha.m esova pakaasetu. ^b^hotu kathaa  ubhinna^eb^nti ya.m so vakkhati, saayeva no ubhinna.m kathaa hotu, ta.m  pamaa.na.m hotuuti attho.
text.11428: [21] ``addhaa hi sacca.m bha.nasi, na ca maa.nava saahasa.m.
text.11429: [22] tameva gantvaa pucchaama, tena tussaamubho janaa''ti..
text.1143: [03] eva.m saa attano palaayanuupaaya.m katvaa pa.n.nasaalato nikkhamitvaa  ta.m olokentameva ``tva.m nivattaa''ti vatvaa aagamanamaggeneva amaccaana.m  santika.m agamaasi. te ta.m gahetvaa khandhaavaara.m gantvaa anupubbena  baaraa.nasi.m paapu.ni.msu. sakkopi ta.m divasameva tussitvaa sakalara.t.the deva.m  vassaapesi, tato subhikkha.m janapada.m ahosi. isisi"ngataapasassapi  taaya pakkantamattaaya eva kaaye .daaho uppajji. so kampanto  pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa vaakaciira.m paarupitvaa ^a^V5.0192^ea^ socanto nipajji.  bodhisatto saaya.m aagantvaa putta.m apassanto ``kaha.m nu kho gato''ti  kaaja.m otaaretvaa pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa ta.m nipannaka.m disvaa ``taata,  ki.m karosii''ti pi.t.thi.m parimajjanto tisso gaathaa abhaasi --
text.11430: [03] tattha ^b^na ca maa.nava saahasa^eb^nti mayha.m pasayha  saahasikavacana.m na ca bha.nasi.
text.11431: [03] eva.m vatvaa raajaa ekasataraajaano pu.n.naka~nca gahetvaa tu.t.thamaanaso  vegena dhammasabha.m agamaasi. pa.n.ditopi aasanaa oruyha raajaana.m  vanditvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. atha pu.n.nako mahaasatta.m aamantetvaa  ``pa.n.dita, `tva.m dhamme .thito jiivitahetupi musaavaada.m na bha.nasii'ti  kittisaddo te sakalaloke phu.to, aha.m pana te ajja dhamme .thitabhaava.m  jaanissaamii''ti vatvaa gaathamaaha --
text.11433: [21] ``sacca.m nu devaa vidahuu kuruuna.m, dhamme .thita.m vidhura.m  naamamacca.m.
text.11434: [22] daasosi ra~n~no uda vaasi ~naati, vidhuroti sa"nkhaa  katamaasi loke''ti..
text.11435: [03] tattha ^b^sacca.m nu devaa vidahuu kuruuna.m, dhamme .thita.m vidhura.m  naamamacca^eb^nti ``kuruuna.m ra.t.the vidhuro naama amacco dhamme .thito  jiivitahetupi musaavaada.m na ^a^M7.0186^ea^ bha.natii''ti eva.m devaa  vidahuu vidahanti kathenti pakaasenti, eva.m vidahamaanaa te devaa sacca.m  nu vidahanti, udaahu abhuutavaadaayeveteti. ^b^vidhuroti sa"nkhaa  katamaasi loke^eb^ti yaa esaa tava ``vidhuro''ti loke sa"nkhaa  pa~n~natti, saa katamaa aasi, tva.m pakaasehi, ki.m nu ra~n~no daaso  niicatarajaatiko, udaahu samo vaa uttaritaro vaa ~naatiiti ida.m taava me  aacikkha, daasosi ra~n~no, uda vaasi ~naatiiti.
text.11436: [03] atha mahaasatto ``aya.m ma.m eva.m pucchati, aha.m kho paneta.m  `ra~n~no ~naatii'tipi `ra~n~no uttaritaro'tipi `ra~n~no na ki~nci  homii'tipi sa~n~naapetu.m sakkomi, eva.m santepi imasmi.m loke  ^a^V7.0178^ea^ saccasamo avassayo ^a^P6.0285^ea^ naama natthi,  saccameva kathetu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa ``maa.nava, nevaaha.m ra~n~no ~naati,  na uttaritaro, catunna.m pana daasaana.m a~n~nataro''ti dassetu.m gaathaadvayamaaha  --
text.11438: [21] ``aamaayadaasaapi bhavanti heke, dhanena kiitaapi bhavanti  daasaa.
text.11439: [22] sayampi heke upayanti daasaa, bhayaa pa.nunnaapi bhavanti  daasaa..
text.11441: [21] ``ete naraana.m caturova daasaa, addhaa hi yonito  ahampi jaato.
text.11442: [27] bhavo ca ra~n~no abhavo ca ra~n~no, daasaaha.m devassa  parampi gantvaa.
text.11444: [03] tattha ^b^aamaayadaasaa^eb^ti daasiyaa kucchimhi jaatadaasaa.  ^b^sayampi heke upayanti daasaa^eb^ti ye keci upa.t.thaakajaatikaa, sabbe  te saya.m daasabhaava.m upagataa daasaa naama. ^b^bhayaa pa.nunnaa^eb^ti  raajabhayena vaa corabhayena vaa attano vasana.t.thaanato pa.nunnaa karamaraa  hutvaa paravisaya.m gataapi daasaayeva naama. ^b^addhaa hi yonito  ahampi jaato^eb^ti maa.nava, eka.mseneva ahampi catuusu daasayoniisu  ekato saya.m daasayonito nibbattadaaso. ^b^bhavo ca ra~n~no abhavo  ca ra~n~no^eb^ti ra~n~no ^a^M7.0187^ea^ vu.d.dhi vaa hotu avu.d.dhi vaa,  na sakkaa mayaa musaa bhaasitu.m. ^b^parampii^eb^ti duura.m gantvaapi aha.m  devassa daasoyeva. ^b^dajjaa^eb^ti ma.m raajaa jayadhanena kha.n.detvaa tuyha.m  dento dhammena sabhaavena dadeyyaati.
text.11445: [03] ta.m sutvaa pu.n.nako ha.t.thatu.t.tho puna appho.tetvaa gaathamaaha --
text.11447: [21] ``aya.m dutiiyo vijayo mamajja, pu.t.tho hi kattaa  vivarettha pa~nha.m.
text.11448: [22] adhammaruupo vata raajase.t.tho, subhaasita.m naanujaanaasi  mayha''nti..
text.11449: [03] tattha ^b^raajase.t.tho^eb^ti aya.m raajase.t.tho adhammaruupo vata.  ^b^subhaasita^eb^nti vidhurapa.n.ditena sukathita.m suvinicchita.m.  ^b^naanujaanaasi mayha^eb^nti idaaneta.m vidhurapa.n.dita.m mayha.m kasmaa  naanujaanaasi, kimattha.m na desiiti vadati.
text.1145: [21] ``na te ka.t.thaani bhinnaani, na te udakamaabhata.m.
text.11450: [03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa anattamano hutvaa ``pa.n.dito maadisa.m  yasadaayaka.m anoloketvaa idaani di.t.tha.m ^a^V7.0179^ea^ maa.navaka.m  oloketii''ti mahaasattassa kujjhitvaa ``maa.nava, sace so daaso me  bhaveyya, ta.m gahetvaa gacchaa''ti vatvaa gaathamaaha --
text.11452: [21] ``eva.m ^a^P6.0286^ea^ ce no so vivarettha pa~nha.m,  daasohamasmi na ca khosmi ~naati.
text.11453: [22] ga.nhaahi kaccaana vara.m dhanaana.m, aadaaya yenicchasi tena  gacchaa''ti..
text.11454: [03] tattha ^b^eva.m ce no so vivarettha pa~nha^eb^nti sace so  amhaaka.m pa~nha.m ``daasohamasmi, na ca khosmi ~naatii''ti eva.m vivari  ettha parisama.n.dale, atha ki.m acchasi, sakalaloke dhanaana.m vara.m eta.m  ga.nha, gahetvaa ca pana yena icchasi, tena gacchaati.
text.11457: [03] eva~nca ^a^M7.0188^ea^ pana vatvaa raajaa cintesi  ``pa.n.dita.m gahetvaa maa.navo yathaaruci gamissati, tassa gatakaalato  pa.t.thaaya mayha.m madhuradhammakathaa dullabhaa bhavissati, ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m attano  .thaane .thapetvaa ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiidapetvaa gharaavaasapa~nha.m  puccheyya''nti. atha na.m raajaa evamaaha ``pa.n.dita, tumhaaka.m gatakaale  mama madhuradhammakathaa dullabhaa bhavissati, ala"nkatadhammaasane  nisiidaapetvaa attano .thaane .thatvaa mayha.m gharaavaasapa~nha.m kathethaa''ti.  so ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiiditvaa ra~n~naa  pa~nha.m pu.t.tho vissajjesi. tatraaya.m pa~nho --
text.1146: [22] aggiipi te na haapito, ki.m nu mandova jhaayasi..
text.11460: [22] khemaa vutti katha.m assa, katha.m nu assa sa"ngaho..
text.11463: [22] asmaa lokaa para.m loka.m, katha.m pecca na socatii''ti..
text.11464: [03] tattha ^b^khemaa vutti katha.m assaa^eb^ti katha.m gharaavaasa.m vasantassa  gaha.t.thassa khemaa nibbhayaa vutti bhaveyya. ^b^katha.m nu assa  sa"ngaho^eb^ti catubbidho sa"ngahavatthusa"nkhaato sa"ngaho tassa katha.m bhaveyya  ^a^V7.0180^ea^. ^b^abyaabajjha^eb^nti niddukkhataa. ^b^saccavaadii  caa^eb^ti katha.m nu maa.navo saccavaadii naama bhaveyya. ^b^peccaa^eb^ti  paraloka.m gantvaa.
text.11465: [03] ta.m sutvaa pa.n.dito ra~n~no pa~nha.m kathesi. tamattha.m pakaasento  satthaa aaha --
text.11471: [22] na seve lokaayatika.m, neta.m pa~n~naaya va.d.dhana.m..
text.1148: [21] ``bhinnaani ka.t.thaani huto ca aggi, tapaniipi te  samitaa brahmacaarii.
text.11483: [22] khemaa vutti siyaa eva.m, eva.m nu assa sa"ngaho..
text.11486: [22] asmaa lokaa para.m loka.m, eva.m pecca na socatii''ti..
text.11487: [03] tattha ^b^ta.m tatthaa^eb^ti bhikkhave, ta.m raajaana.m tattha dhammasabhaaya.m  ~naa.nagatiyaa ^b^gatimaa,^eb^ abbocchinnaviiriyena ^b^dhitimaa,^eb^  bhuurisamaaya vipulaaya pa~n~naaya ^b^matimaa,^eb^ sa.nhasukhumatthadassinaa  ~naa.nena ^b^atthadassimaa,^eb^ paricchinditvaa jaanana~naa.nasa"nkhaataaya  pa~n~naaya sabbadhammaana.m ^b^sa"nkhaataa,^eb^ vidhurapa.n.dito eta.m ``na  saadhaara.nadaarassaa''tiaadivacana.m abravi. tattha yo paresa.m daaresu  aparajjhati ^a^V7.0181^ea^, so saadhaara.nadaaro naama, taadiso na assa  bhaveyya. ^b^na bhu~nje saadumekako^eb^ti saadurasa.m pa.niitabhojana.m a~n~nesa.m  adatvaa ekakova na bhu~njeyya. ^b^lokaayatika^eb^nti anatthanissita.m  saggamaggaana.m adaayaka.m aniyyaanika.m vita.n.dasallaapa.m lokaayatikavaada.m na  seveyya. ^b^neta.m pa~n~naaya va.d.dhana^eb^nti na hi eta.m lokaayatika.m  pa~n~naaya va.d.dhana.m. ^b^siilavaa^eb^ti akha.n.dehi pa~ncahi siilehi  samannaagato. ^b^vattasampanno^eb^ti gharaavaasavattena vaa raajavattena vaa  samannaagato. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti kusaladhammesu appamatto.  ^b^nivaatavuttii^eb^ti atimaana.m akatvaa niicavutti  ovaadaanusaasanipa.ticchako. ^b^atthaddho^eb^ti thaddhamacchariyavirahito.  ^b^surato^eb^ti soraccena samannaagato. ^b^sakhilo^eb^ti  pemaniiyavacano. ^b^muduu^eb^ti kaayavaacaacittehi apharuso.
text.11488: [03] ^b^sa"ngahetaa ca mittaana^eb^nti kalyaa.namittaana.m sa"ngahakaro.  daanaadiisu yo yena sa"ngaha.m icchati, tassa teneva sa"ngaahako.  ^b^sa.mvibhaagii^eb^ti dhammikasama.nabraahma.naana~nceva  kapa.naddhikava.nibbakayaacakaadiina~nca sa.mvibhaagakaro. ^b^vidhaanavaa^eb^ti  ``imasmi.m kaale kasitu.m va.t.tati, imasmi.m kaale vapitu.m va.t.tatii''ti eva.m  sabbakiccesu vidhaanasampanno. ^b^tappeyyaa^eb^ti gahitagahitabhaajanaani  ^a^M7.0190^ea^ puuretvaa dadamaano tappeyya. ^b^dhammakaamo^eb^ti  pave.nidhammampi sucaritadhammampi kaamayamaano patthayamaano.  ^b^sutaadhaaro^eb^ti sutassa aadhaarabhuuto. ^b^paripucchako^eb^ti  dhammikasama.nabraahma.ne upasa"nkamitvaa ``ki.m, bhante,  kusala''ntiaadivacanehi paripucchanasiilo. ^b^sakkacca^eb^nti gaaravena.  ^b^eva.m nu assa sa"ngaho^eb^ti sa"ngahopissa eva.m kato naama bhaveyya.  ^b^saccavaadii^eb^ti eva.m pa.tipannoyeva sabhaavavaadii naama siyaa.
text.11489: [03] eva.m mahaasatto ra~n~no gharaavaasapa~nha.m kathetvaa palla"nkaa oruyha  raajaana.m vandi. raajaapissa mahaasakkaara.m katvaa ekasataraajuuhi parivuto  attano nivesanameva gato.
text.1149: [22] pii.tha~nca mayha.m udaka~nca hoti, ramasi tuva.m brahmabhuuto  puratthaa..
text.11492: [03] mahaasatto ^a^P6.0288^ea^ pana pa.tinivatto. atha na.m  pu.n.nako aaha --
text.11494: [21] ``ehi daani gamissaama, dinno no issarena me.
text.11496: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0182^ea^ ^b^dinno no^eb^ti ettha ^b^no^eb^ti  nipaatamatta.m, tva.m issarena mayha.m dinnoti attho. ^b^sanantano^eb^ti  mama attha.m pa.tipajjantena hi tayaa attano saamikassa attho pa.tipanno  hoti. ya~nceta.m saamikassa atthakara.na.m naama, esa dhammo sanantano  poraa.nakapa.n.ditaana.m sabhaavoti.
text.115: [03] eva.m ^a^P5.0120^ea^ ku.n.daliniipi ekaadasahi gaathaahi  dhamma.m desesi. raajaa tu.t.tho amacce aamantetvaa pucchi -- ``bhonto!  amaccaa mama dhiitaaya ku.n.daliniyaa eva.m kathayamaanaaya kena kattabba.m  kicca.m kata''nti. bha.n.daagaarikena, devaati. ``tena hissaa  bha.n.daagaarika.t.thaana.m dammii''ti ku.n.dalini.m .thaanantare .thapesi. saa tato  pa.t.thaaya bha.n.daagaarika.t.thaane .thatvaa pitu kamma.m akaasiiti.
text.11500: [22] tiiha~nca ta.m vaasayemu agaare, yenaddhunaa anusaasemu  putte''ti..
text.11501: [03] tattha ^b^tayaahamasmii^eb^ti tayaa laddhohamasmiiti jaanaami,  labhantena ca na a~n~nathaa laddho. ^b^dinnohamasmi tava issarenaa^eb^ti  mama issarena ra~n~naa ^a^M7.0191^ea^ aha.m tava dinno. ^b^tiiha.m  caa^eb^ti maa.nava, aha.m tava bahuupakaaro, raajaana.m anoloketvaa saccameva  kathesi.m, tenaaha.m tayaa laddho, tva.m me mahantagu.nabhaava.m jaanaahi, maya.m  tii.nipi divasaani attano agaare vaasemu, tasmaa yenaddhunaa yattakena  kaalena maya.m puttaadaare anusaasemu, ta.m kaala.m adhivaasehiiti.
text.11502: [03] ta.m sutvaa pu.n.nako ``sacca.m pa.n.dito aaha, bahuupakaaro esa  mama, `sattaahampi a.d.dhamaasampi nisiidaahii'ti vutte  adhivaasetabbamevaa''ti cintetvaa gaathamaaha --
text.11504: [21] ``ta.m me tathaa hotu vasemu tiiha.m, kuruta.m bhavajja gharesu  kicca.m.
text.11505: [22] anusaasata.m puttadaare bhavajja, yathaa tayii pecca sukhii  bhaveyyaa''ti..
text.11506: [03] tattha ^b^ta.m me^eb^ti ya.m tva.m vadesi, sabba.m ta.m mama tathaa hotu.  ^b^bhavajjaa^eb^ti bhava.m ajja pa.t.thaaya tiiha.m anusaasatu. ^b^tayii  peccaa^eb^ti yathaa tayi gate pacchaa tava puttadaaro sukhii bhaveyya, eva.m  anusaasatu.
text.11507: [03] eva.m vatvaa pu.n.nako mahaasattena saddhi.myeva tassa nivesana.m  paavisi. tamattha.m ^a^P6.0289^ea^ pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.11509: [21] ``saadhuuti vatvaana pahuutakaamo, pakkaami yakkho vidhurena  saddhi.m.
text.11511: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0183^ea^ ^b^pahuutakaamo^eb^ti mahaabhogo.  ^b^ku~njaraaja~n~nahayaanuci.n.na^eb^nti ku~njarehi ca aaja~n~nahayehi ca  anuci.n.na.m paripu.n.na.m. ^b^ariyase.t.tho^eb^ti aacaaraariyesu uttamo  pu.n.nako yakkho pa.n.ditassa antepura.m paavisi.
text.11512: [03] mahaasattassa pana ti.n.na.m utuuna.m atthaaya tayo paasaadaa ahesu.m.  tesu eko ko~nco naama, eko mayuuro naama, eko piyaketo naama.  te sandhaaya aya.m gaathaa vuttaa --
text.11514: [21] ``ko~nca.m ^a^M7.0192^ea^ mayuura~nca piya~nca keta.m,  upaagamii tattha surammaruupa.m.
text.11516: [03]  tattha ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti tesu tiisu paasaadesu yattha tasmi.m samaye  attanaa vasati, ta.m surammaruupa.m paasaada.m pu.n.naka.m aadaaya upaagami.
text.11517: [03] so upagantvaa ca pana ala"nkatapaasaadassa sattamaaya bhuumiyaa  sayanagabbha~nceva mahaatala~nca sajjaapetvaa sirisayana.m pa~n~naapetvaa sabba.m  annapaanaadividhi.m upa.t.thapetvaa devaka~n~naayo viya pa~ncasataa itthiyo  ``imaa te paadaparicaarikaa hontu, anukka.n.thanto idha vasaahii''ti  tassa niyyaadetvaa attano vasana.t.thaana.m gato. tassa gatakaale taa  itthiyo naanaatuuriyaani gahetvaa pu.n.nakassa paricariyaaya naccaadiini  pa.t.thapesu.m. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.1152: [22] na me tuva.m aalapasii mamajja, na.t.tha.m nu ki.m cetasika~nca  dukkha''nti..

text.11708: [21] ``yo deti sayana.m vattha.m, yaana.m aavasatha.m ghara.m.
text.11713: [03] tattha ^b^kumbhampa~njali.m kariyaa, caa.ta~ncaapi padakkhi.na^eb^nti  vuddhi.m paccaasiisanto puriso udakapuurita.m kumbha.m disvaa tassa a~njali.m  kareyya, caa.ta~nca saku.na.m padakkhi.na.m kareyya. a~njali.m vaa padakkhi.na.m  vaa karontassa te ki~nci daatu.m na sakkonti. ^b^kimevaa^eb^ti yo  pana sabbakaamaana.m daataa dhiiro ca, ta.m raajaana.m ki.mkaara.naa na namasseyya.  raajaayeva hi namassitabbo ca aaraadhetabbo ca.  ^b^pajjunnorivaa^eb^ti megho viya. ^b^esayyo raajavasatii^eb^ti ayyo  yaa aya.m mayaa kathitaa, esaa raajavasati naama raajasevakaana.m  anusaasanii. ^b^yathaa^eb^ti yaaya raajavasatiyaa vattamaano naro  raajaana.m aaraadheti, raajuuna~nca santikaa puuja.m labhati, saa esaati.

text.11747: [03] eva.m vatvaa mahaasatto raajaana.m vanditvaa ra~n~no orodhe ca  puttadaare ca raajaparisa~nca ovaditvaa tesu sakabhaavena sa.n.thaatu.m  asakku.nitvaa mahaavirava.m viravantesuyeva raajanivesanaa nikkhami.  sakalanagaravaasinopi ``pa.n.dito kira maa.navena saddhi.m gamissati,  etha, passissaama na''nti mantayitvaa raaja"nga.neyeva na.m passi.msu.  atha ne mahaasatto assaasetvaa ``tumhe maa cintayittha, sabbe  sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, sariira.m addhuva.m, yaso naama vipattipariyosaano,  apica tumhe daanaadiisu pu~n~nesu appamattaa hothaa''ti tesa.m ovaada.m datvaa  nivattaapetvaa attano gehaabhimukho paayaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne  dhammapaalakumaaro bhaatikaga.naparivuto ``pitu paccuggamana.m  karissaamii''ti nikkhanto nivesanadvaareyeva pitu sammukho ahosi.  mahaasatto ta.m disvaa sakabhaavena sa.n.thaatu.m asakkonto upaguyha ure  nipajjaapetvaa nivesana.m paavisi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --

text.11808: [03] tattha ^b^saakhaasu selesu asajjamaano^eb^ti pu.n.nako kira  cintesi ``duura.m agantvaava ima.m himavantappadese rukkhesu pabbatesu ca  pothetvaa maaretvaa hadayama.msa.m aadaaya ka.levara.m pabbatantare ^a^P6.0303^ea^  cha.d.detvaa naagabhavanameva gamissaamii''ti. so rukkhe ca  pabbate ca apariharitvaa tesa.m majjheneva assa.m pesesi.  mahaasattassaanubhaavena rukkhaapi pabbataapi sariirato ubhosu passesu  ratanamatta.m pa.tikkamanti. so ``mato vaa, no vaa''ti parivattitvaa  mahaasattassa mukha.m olokento ka~ncanaadaasamiva vippasanna.m disvaa  ``aya.m eva.m na maratii''ti punapi sakalahimavantappadese rukkhe ca  pabbate ca tikkhattu.m pothento pesesi ^a^M7.0209^ea^. eva.m  pothentopi tatheva rukkhapabbataa duurameva pa.tikkamantiyeva. mahaasatto  pana kilantakaayo ahosi. atha pu.n.nako ``aya.m neva marati,  idaani vaatakkhandhe cu.n.navicu.n.na.m karissaamii''ti kodhaabhibhuuto sattama.m  vaatakkhandha.m pakkhandi. bodhisattassaanubhaavena vaatakkhandho dvidhaa  hutvaa bodhisattassa okaasa.m akaasi. tato verambhavaatehi paharaapesi,  verambhavaataapi satasahassaasanisaddo viya hutvaa bodhisattassa okaasa.m  ada.msu. so pu.n.nako tassa antaraayaabhaava.m passanto ta.m aadaaya  kaa.lapabbata.m agamaasi. tena vutta.m --

text.11837: [03]  eva.m pakkanditvaa ca pana te sabbepi sakalanagaravaasiihi saddhi.m  roditvaa raajadvaara.m agama.msu. raajaa mahanta.m paridevasadda.m sutvaa  siihapa~njara.m vivaritvaa ``tumhe kasmaa paridevathaa''ti pucchi. athassa  te ``deva, so kira maa.navo na braahma.no, yakkho pana braahma.nava.n.nena  aagantvaa pa.n.dita.m aadaaya gato, tena vinaa ^a^P6.0304^ea^ amhaaka.m  jiivita.m natthi. sace so ito sattame divase naagamissati,  saka.tasatehi saka.tasahassehi ca daaruuni sa"nka.d.dhitvaa sabbe maya.m aggi.m  ujjaaletvaa pavisissaamaa''ti imamattha.m aarocentaa ima.m gaathamaaha.msu --

text.11841: [03] sammaasambuddhassa parinibbutakaalepi ``maya.m aggi.m pavisitvaa  marissaamaa''ti vattaaro naama naahesu.m. aho subhaasita.m mahaasatte  naagarehiiti. raajaa tesa.m katha.m sutvaa ``tumhe maa cintayittha, maa  ^a^M7.0211^ea^ socittha, maa paridevittha, madhurakatho pa.n.dito  maa.nava.m dhammakathaaya palobhetvaa attano paadesu paatetvaa  sakalanagaravaasiina.m assumukha.m haasayanto na cirasseva  aagamissatii''ti assaasento gaathamaaha --
