text.11849: [03] pu.n.nakopi mahaasatta.m kaa.laagirimatthake .thapetvaa ``imasmi.m  jiivamaane mayha.m vu.d.dhi naama natthi, ima.m maaretvaa hadayama.msa.m gahetvaa  naagabhavana.m gantvaa vimalaaya datvaa irandhati.m gahetvaa devaloka.m  gamissaamii''ti cintesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.11851: [21] ``so tattha gantvaana vicintayanto, uccaavacaa cetanakaa  bhavanti.
text.11852: [22] nayimassa jiivena mamatthi ki~nci, hantvaanima.m  hadayamaanayissa''nti..
text.11853: [03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ti so pu.n.nako. ^b^tattha gantvaanaa^eb^ti  gantvaa tattha kaa.laagirimatthake .thito. ^b^uccaavacaa cetanakaa  bhavantii^eb^ti kha.ne kha.ne uppajjamaanaa ^a^M7.0212^ea^ cetanaa  uccaapi avacaapi uppajjanti. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m  mametassa jiivitadaanacetanaapi uppajjeyyaati. imassa ^a^P6.0305^ea^  pana jiivitena tahi.m naagabhavane mama appamattakampi ki~nci  kicca.m natthi, idhevima.m maaretvaa assa hadaya.m aanayissaamiiti  sanni.t.thaanamakaasiiti attho.
text.11854: [03] tato puna cintesi ``ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m sahatthena amaaretvaa  bheravaruupadassanena jiivitakkhaya.m paapeyya''nti. so bheravayakkharuupa.m  nimminitvaa mahaasatta.m tajjento aagantvaa ta.m paatetvaa daa.thaana.m antare  katvaa khaaditukaamo viya ahosi, mahaasattassa lomaha.msanamattampi  naahosi. tato siiharuupena mattamahaahatthiruupena ca aagantvaa daa.thaahi  ceva dantehi ca vijjhitukaamo viya ahosi. tathaapi abhaayantassa  ekado.nikanaavappamaa.na.m mahanta.m sappava.n.na.m nimminitvaa assasanto  passasanto ``susuu''ti sadda.m karonto aagantvaa mahaasattassa  sakalasariira.m ve.thetvaa matthake pha.na.m katvaa a.t.thaasi, tassa saarajjamattampi  naahosi. atha ``na.m pabbatamatthake .thapetvaa paatetvaa ^a^V7.0203^ea^  cu.n.navicu.n.na.m karissaamii''ti mahaavaata.m samu.t.thaapesi. so tassa  kesaggamattampi caaletu.m naasakkhi. atha na.m tattheva pabbatamatthake  .thapetvaa hatthii viya khajjuurirukkha.m pabbata.m aparaapara.m caalesi, tathaapi  na.m .thita.t.thaanato kesaggamattampi caaletu.m naasakkhi.
text.11855: [03] tato ``saddasantaasenassa hadayaphaalana.m katvaa maaressaamii''ti  antopabbata.m pavisitvaa pathavi~nca nabha~nca ekaninnaada.m karonto  mahaanaada.m nadi, evampissa saarajjamattampi naahosi. jaanaati hi  mahaasatto ``yakkhasiihahatthinaagaraajavesehi aagatopi mahaavaatavu.t.thi.m  samu.t.thaapakopi pabbatacalana.m karontopi antopabbata.m pavisitvaa naada.m  vissajjentopi maa.navoyeva, na a~n~no''ti. tato pu.n.nako cintesi  ``naaha.m ima.m baahirupakkamena maaretu.m sakkomi, sahattheneva na.m  maaressaamii''ti. tato yakkho mahaasatta.m pabbatamuddhani .thapetvaa  pabbatapaada.m gantvaa ma.nikkhandhe pa.n.dusutta.m pavesento viya pabbata.m  pavisitvaa taasento vagganto antopabbatena uggantvaa mahaasatta.m paade  da.lha.m ^a^M7.0213^ea^ gahetvaa parivattetvaa adhosira.m katvaa  anaalambe aakaase vissajjesi. tena vutta.m --
text.11857: [21] ``so ^a^P6.0306^ea^ tattha gantvaa pabbatantarasmi.m,  anto pavisitvaana padu.t.thacitto.
text.11859: [03] tattha ^b^so tattha gantvaa^eb^ti so pu.n.nako pabbatamatthakaa  pabbatapaada.m gantvaa tattha pabbatantare .thatvaa tassa anto pavisitvaa  pabbatamatthake .thitassa he.t.thaa pa~n~naayamaano asa.mvute bhuumipadese dhaaresiiti.  na aaditova dhaaresi, tattha pana ta.m khipitvaa pannarasayojanamatta.m  bha.t.thakaale pabbatamuddhani .thitova hattha.m va.d.dhetvaa adhosira.m bhassanta.m  paadesu gahetvaa adhosirameva ukkhipitvaa mukha.m olokento ``na  maratii''ti ~natvaa dutiyampi khipitvaa ti.msayojanamatta.m bha.t.thakaale tatheva  ukkhipitvaa puna tassa mukha.m olokento jiivantameva disvaa cintesi  ``sace idaani sa.t.thiyojanamatta.m bhassitvaa na marissati, paadesu na.m  gahetvaa pabbatamuddhani pothetvaa maaressaamii''ti atha na.m tatiyampi  khipitvaa sa.t.thiyojanamatta.m bha.t.thakaale hattha.m va.d.dhetvaa paadesu gahetvaa  ukkhipi. tato mahaasatto cintesi ``aya.m ma.m pa.thama.m  pannarasayojana.t.thaana.m khipi, dutiyampi ti.msayojana.m, tatiyampi  sa.t.thiyojana.m, idaani puna ma.m na khipissati, ukkhipantoyeva  pabbatamuddhani paharitvaa maaressati, yaava ma.m ukkhipitvaa pabbatamuddhani  na potheti, taava na.m adhosiro hutvaa olambantova maara.nakaara.na.m  pucchissaamii''ti. eva.m cintetvaa ^a^V7.0204^ea^ ca pana so  achambhito asantasanto tathaa akaasi. tena vutta.m ``dhaarayi  kaatiyaano''ti, tikkhattu.m khipitvaa dhaarayiiti attho.
text.1186: [21] ``dantaa ^a^M5.0214^ea^ ca tassa bhusadassaneyyaa,  suddhaa samaa sa"nkhavaruupapannaa.
text.11861: [21] ``so lambamaano narake papaate, mahabbhaye lomaha.mse  vidugge.
text.11862: [22] asantasanto kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tho, iccabravi pu.n.naka.m naama  yakkha.m..
text.11865: [22] accaahita.m kamma.m karosi ludra.m, bhaave ca te kusala.m  natthi ki~nci..
text.11867: [21] ``ya.m ma.m papaatasmi.m papaatumicchasi, ko nu tavattho  mara.nena mayha.m.
text.11868: [22] amaanusasseva tavajja va.n.no, aacikkha me tva.m  katamaasi devataati..
text.11869: [03] tattha ^b^so lambamaano^eb^ti so kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tho tatiyavaare  lambamaano. ^b^ariyaavakaaso^eb^ti ruupena ariyasadiso devava.n.no  hutvaa carasi. ^b^asa~n~nato^eb^ti kaayaadiihi asa~n~nato ^a^P6.0307^ea^  dussiilo. ^b^accaahita^eb^nti hitaatikkanta.m, atiahita.m  vaa. ^b^bhaave ca te^eb^ti tava citte appamattakampi kusala.m natthi.  ^b^amaanusasseva tavajja va.n.no^eb^ti ajja tava ida.m kaara.na.m  amaanusasseva. ^b^katamaasi devataa^eb^ti yakkhaana.m antare  katarayakkho naama tva.m.
text.1187: [22] mano pasaadenti vivariyamaanaa, na hi nuuna so  saakamakhaadi tehi..
text.11872: [21] ``yadi te suto pu.n.nako naama yakkho, ra~n~no  kuverassa hi so sajibbo.
text.11873: [22] bhuumindharo varu.no naama naago, brahaa sucii  va.n.nabaluupapanno..
text.11875: [21] ``tassaanuja.m dhiitara.m kaamayaami, irandhatii naama saa  naagaka~n~naa.
text.11876: [22] tassaa sumajjhaaya piyaaya hetu, pataarayi.m tuyha vadhaaya  dhiiraa''ti..
text.11877: [03] tattha ^b^sajibbo^eb^ti sajiivo amacco. ^b^brahaa^eb^ti  aarohapari.naahasampanno u.t.thaapitaka~ncanaruupasadiso.  ^b^va.n.nabaluupapanno^eb^ti sariirava.n.nena ca kaayabalena ca upagato.  ^b^tassaanuja^eb^nti tassa anujaata.m dhiitara.m. ^b^pataarayi^eb^nti citta.m  pavattesi.m, sanni.t.thaanamakaasinti attho.
text.11878: [03] ta.m ^a^V7.0205^ea^ ^a^M7.0215^ea^ sutvaa mahaasatto ``aya.m  loko duggahitena nassati, naagamaa.navika.m patthentassa mama mara.nena  ki.m payojana.m, tathato kaara.na.m jaanissaamii''ti cintetvaa gaathamaaha --
text.11880: [21] ``maa heva tva.m yakkha ahosi muu.lho, na.t.thaa bahuu  duggahiitena loke.
text.11881: [22] ki.m te sumajjhaaya piyaaya kicca.m, mara.nena me i"ngha  su.nomi sabba''nti..
text.11882: [03] ta.m sutvaa tassa aacikkhanto pu.n.nako aaha --
text.11885: [22] ta.m yaacamaana.m sasuro avoca, yathaa mama~n~ni.msu  sukaamaniita.m..
text.11887: [21] ``dajjemu kho te sutanu.m sunetta.m, sucimhita.m  candanalittagatta.m.
text.11888: [27] sace tuva.m hadaya.m pa.n.ditassa, dhammena laddhaa idha  maaharesi.
text.11889: [22] etena ^a^P6.0308^ea^ vittena kumaari labbhaa, na~n~na.m  dhana.m uttari patthayaama..
text.1189: [21] ``akakkasa.m agga.lita.m muhu.m mudu.m, uju.m anuddhata.m  acapalamassa bhaasita.m.
text.11891: [21] ``eva.m na muu.lhosmi su.nohi katte, na caapi me  duggahitatthi ki~nci.
text.11892: [22] hadayena te dhammaladdhena naagaa, irandhati.m naagaka~n~na.m  dadanti..
text.11894: [21] ``tasmaa aha.m tuyha.m vadhaaya yutto, eva.m mamattho mara.nena  tuyha.m.
text.11895: [22] idheva ta.m narake paatayitvaa, hantvaana ta.m  hadayamaanayissa''nti..
text.11896: [03] tattha ^b^dhiitukaamo^eb^ti dhiitara.m kaamemi patthemi, dhiitu atthaaya  vicaraami. ^b^~naatibhatohamasmii^eb^ti tasmaa tassa ~naatibhatako naama  aha.m amhi. ^b^ta^eb^nti ^a^M7.0216^ea^ ta.m naagaka~n~na.m.  ^b^yaacamaana^eb^nti yaacanta.m ma.m. ^b^yathaa ma^eb^nti yasmaa ma.m.  ^b^a~n~ni.msuu^eb^ti jaani.msu. ^b^sukaamaniita^eb^nti su.t.thu esa kaamena  niitoti sukaamaniito, ta.m sukaamaniita.m. tasmaa sasuro ^b^`dajjemu  kho te''^eb^tiaadimavoca. tattha ^b^dajjemuu^eb^ti dadeyyaama.  ^b^sutanu^eb^nti sundarasariira.m. ^b^idha maaharesii^eb^ti idha naagabhavane  dhammena laddhaa aahareyyaasiiti.
text.11897: [03] tassa ta.m katha.m sutvaa mahaasatto cintesi ``vimalaaya mama  hadayena kicca.m natthi, varu.nanaagaraajena mama dhammakatha.m sutvaa ma.ninaa  ma.m puujetvaa tattha gatena mama dhammakathikabhaavo va.n.nito ^a^V7.0206^ea^  bhavissati, tato vimalaaya mama dhammakathaaya doha.lo uppanno  bhavissati, varu.nena duggahita.m gahetvaa pu.n.nako aa.natto bhavissati,  svaaya.m attanaa duggahitena ma.m maaretu.m evaruupa.m dukkha.m paapesi, mama  pa.n.ditabhaavo .thaanuppattikaara.nacintanasamatthataa imasmi.m ma.m maarente ki.m  karissati, handaaha.m sa~n~naapessaami na''nti. cintetvaa ca pana  ``maa.nava, saadhunaradhamma.m naama jaanaami, yaavaaha.m na maraami, taava ma.m  pabbatamuddhani nisiidaapetvaa saadhunaradhamma.m naama su.nohi, pacchaa ya.m  icchasi, ta.m kareyyaasii''ti vatvaa saadhunaradhamma.m va.n.netvaa attano  jiivita.m aaharaapento so adhosiro olambantova gaathamaaha --
text.11899: [21] ``khippa.m mama.m uddhara kaatiyaana, hadayena me yadi te  atthi kicca.m.
text.1190: [22] ruda.m ^a^P5.0204^ea^ manu~n~na.m karaviikasussara.m,  hadaya"ngama.m ra~njayateva me mano..
text.11900: [22] ye ^a^P6.0309^ea^ kecime saadhunarassa dhammaa,  sabbeva te paatukaromi ajjaa''ti..
text.11901: [03] ta.m sutvaa pu.n.nako ``aya.m pa.n.ditena devamanussaana.m  akathitapubbo dhammo bhavissati, khippameva na.m uddharitvaa saadhunaradhamma.m  su.nissaamii''ti cintetvaa mahaasatta.m ukkhipitvaa pabbatamuddhani  nisiidaapesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.11903: [21] ``so pu.n.nako kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m, nagamuddhani khippa.m  pati.t.thapetvaa.
text.11906: [21] ``samuddha.to ^a^M7.0217^ea^ mesi tuva.m papaataa,  hadayena te ajja mamatthi kicca.m.
text.11907: [22] ye kecime saadhunarassa dhammaa, sabbeva me paatukarohi  ajjaa''ti..
text.11908: [03] tattha ^b^assatthamaasiina^eb^nti laddhassaasa.m hutvaa nisinna.m.  ^b^samekkhiyaanaa^eb^ti disvaa. ^b^saadhunarassa dhammaa^eb^ti narassa  saadhudhammaa, sundaradhammaati attho.
text.11911: [21] ``samuddha.to tyasmi aha.m papaataa, hadayena me yadi te  atthi kicca.m.
text.11912: [22] ye kecime saadhunarassa dhammaa, sabbeva te paatukaromi  ajjaa''ti..
text.11914: [03] atha ^a^V7.0207^ea^ na.m mahaasatto ``kili.t.thagattomhi, nhaayaami  taavaa''ti aaha. yakkhopi ``saadhuu''ti nhaanodaka.m aaharitvaa  nhaatakaale mahaasattassa dibbadussagandhamaalaadiini datvaa  ala"nkatappa.tiyattakaale dibbabhojana.m adaasi. atha mahaasatto  bhuttabhojano kaa.laagirimatthaka.m ala"nkaaraapetvaa aasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa  ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiiditvaa buddhaliilaaya saadhunaradhamma.m desento  gaathamaaha --
text.11916: [21] ``yaataanuyaayii ca bhavaahi maa.nava, alla~nca paa.ni.m  parivajjayassu.
text.11917: [22] maa ^a^P6.0310^ea^ cassu mittesu kadaaci dubbhii,  maa ca vasa.m asatiina.m nigacche''ti..
text.11918: [03] tattha ^b^alla~nca paa.ni.m parivajjayassuu^eb^ti alla.m tinta.m paa.ni.m  maa dahi maa jhaapehi.
text.11919: [03] yakkho sa.mkhittena bhaasite cattaaro saadhunaradhamme bujjhitu.m  asakkonto vitthaarena pucchanto gaathamaaha --
text.11921: [21] ``katha.m ^a^M7.0218^ea^ nu yaata.m anuyaayi hoti,  alla~nca paa.ni.m dahate katha.m so.
text.11922: [22] asatii ca kaa ko pana mittadubbho, akkhaahi me  pucchito etamattha''nti..
text.11925: [21] ``asanthuta.m nopi ca di.t.thapubba.m, yo aasanenaapi  nimantayeyya.
text.11926: [22] tasseva attha.m puriso kareyya, yaataanuyaayiiti tamaahu  pa.n.ditaa..
text.11929: [22] na tassa paapa.m manasaapi cintaye, adubbhapaa.ni.m dahate  mittadubbho..
text.1193: [03] icchaami bho ta.m punadeva da.t.thu.m, mitto hi me maa.navohu puratthaa..
text.11932: [22] na tassa saakha.m bha~njeyya, mittadubbho hi paapako..
text.11934: [21] ``pu.n.nampi cema.m pathavi.m dhanena, dajjitthiyaa puriso  sammataaya.
text.11935: [22] laddhaa kha.na.m atima~n~neyya tampi, taasa.m vasa.m asatiina.m na  gacche..
text.11939: [26] asatii ca saa so pana mittadubbho,
text.11941: [03] tattha ^a^P6.0311^ea^ ^b^asanthuta^eb^nti ekaahadviihampi  ekato avutthapubba.m. ^b^yo aasanenaapii^eb^ti yo evaruupa.m puggala.m  aasanamattenapi nimantayeyya, pageva annapaanaadiihi. ^b^tassevaa^eb^ti  tassa pubbakaarissa attha.m puriso karoteva. ^b^yaataanuyaayii^eb^ti  pubbakaaritaaya yaatassa puggalassa anuyaayii ^a^M7.0219^ea^.  pa.thama.m karonto hi yaayii naama, pacchaa karonto anuyaayii naamaati  eva.m pa.n.ditaa kathenti. aya.m devaraaja, pa.thamo saadhunaradhammo.  ^b^adubbhapaa.ni^eb^nti adubbhaka.m attano bhu~njanahatthameva dahanto hi  mittadubbhii naama hoti. iti allahatthassa ajjhaapana.m naama aya.m  dutiyo saadhunaradhammo. ^b^na tassaa^eb^ti tassa saakha.m vaa patta.m vaa  na bha~njeyya. ki.mkaara.naa? mittadubbho hi paapako. iti  paribhuttacchaayassa acetanassa rukkhassapi paapa.m karonto mittadubbhii  naama hoti, kima"nga.m pana manussabhuutassaati. eva.m mittesu adubbhana.m  naama aya.m tatiyo saadhunaradhammo. ^b^dajjitthiyaa^eb^ti dadeyya  itthiyaa. ^b^sammataayaa^eb^ti ``ahameva tassaa piyo, na a~n~no,  ma~n~neva saa icchatii''ti eva.m su.t.thu mataaya. ^b^laddhaa kha.na^eb^nti  aticaarassa okaasa.m labhitvaa. ^b^asatiina^eb^nti  asaddhammasamannaagataana.m itthiina.m. iti maatugaama.m nissaaya paapassa  akara.na.m naama aya.m catuttho saadhunaradhammo. ^b^so dhammiko  hohii^eb^ti devaraaja, so tva.m imehi catuuhi saadhunaradhammehi yutto  hohiiti.
text.11942: [03] eva.m mahaasatto yakkhassa cattaaro saadhunaradhamme buddhaliilaaya  kathesi.
text.11945: [03] te dhamme su.nantoyeva pu.n.nako sallakkhesi ``catuusupi .thaanesu  pa.n.dito attano jiivitameva yaacati, aya.m kho mayha.m pubbe  asanthutasseva sakkaaramakaasi, ahamassa nivesane tiiha.m mahanta.m yasa.m  anubhavanto vasi.m, aha~ncima.m paapakamma.m karonto maatugaama.m nissaaya  karomi, sabbathaapi ahameva mittadubbhii. sace pa.n.dita.m aparajjhaami,  na saadhunaradhamme vattissaami ^a^V7.0209^ea^ naama, tasmaa ki.m me  naagamaa.navikaaya, indapatthanagaravaasiina.m assumukhaani haasento ima.m  vegena tattha netvaa dhammasabhaaya.m otaaressaamii''ti cintetvaa gaathamaaha  --
text.11947: [21] ``avasi.m ^a^M7.0220^ea^ aha.m tuyha tiiha.m agaare,  annena paanena upa.t.thitosmi.
text.11948: [22] mitto mamaasii visajjaamaha.m ta.m, kaama.m ghara.m uttamapa~n~na  gaccha..
text.1195: [21] ``susandhi sabbattha vima.t.thima.m va.na.m, puthuu sujaata.m  kharapattasannibha.m.
text.11950: [21] api ^a^P6.0312^ea^ haayatu naagakulaa attho,  alampi me naagaka~n~naaya hotu.
text.11951: [22] so tva.m sakeneva subhaasitena, muttosi me ajja vadhaaya  pa~n~naa''ti..
text.11952: [03] tattha ^b^upa.t.thitosmii^eb^ti tayaa upa.t.thitosmi. ^b^visajjaamaha.m  ta^eb^nti vissajjemi aha.m ta.m. ^b^kaama^eb^nti eka.msena.  ^b^vadhaayaa^eb^ti vadhato. ^b^pa~n~naa^eb^ti pa~n~navanta.
text.11953: [03] atha na.m mahaasatto ``maa.nava, tva.m taava ma.m attano ghara.m maa  pesehi, naagabhavanameva ma.m nehii''ti vadanto gaathamaaha --
text.11955: [21] ``handa tuva.m yakkha mamampi nehi, sasura.m te attha.m  mayi carassu.
text.11956: [22] maya~nca naagaadhipati.m vimaana.m, dakkhemu naagassa  adi.t.thapubba''nti..
text.11957: [03] tattha ^b^handaa^eb^ti vavassaggatthe nipaato. ^b^sasura.m te  attha.m mayi carassuu^eb^ti tava sasurassa santaka.m attha.m mayi cara maa  naasehi. ^b^naagaadhipati.m vimaana^eb^nti ahampi naagaadhipati~nca  vimaana~ncassa adi.t.thapubba.m passeyya.m.
text.1196: [22] teneva ma.m uttariyaana maa.navo, vivarita.m uuru.m jaghanena  pi.layi..
text.11960: [21] ``ya.m ve narassa ahitaaya assa, na ta.m pa~n~no arahati  dassanaaya.
text.11961: [22] atha kena va.n.nena amittagaama.m, tuvamicchasi uttamapa~n~na  gantu''nti..
text.11965: [21] ``addhaa ^a^V7.0210^ea^ pajaanaami ahampi eta.m, na ta.m  pa~n~no arahati dassanaaya.
text.11966: [22] paapa~nca me natthi kata.m kuhi~nci, tasmaa na sa"nke  mara.naagamaayaa''ti..
text.11968: [03] apica ^a^P6.0313^ea^, devaraaja, taadiso yakkho kakkha.lo  mayaa dhammakathaaya palobhetvaa mudukato, idaaneva ma.m ``ala.m me  naagamaa.navikaaya, attano ghara.m yaahii''ti vadesi, naagaraajassa  mudukara.na.m mama bhaaro, nehiyeva ma.m tatthaati. tassa ta.m vacana.m sutvaa  pu.n.nako ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa tu.t.thacitto aaha --
text.11970: [21] ``handa ca .thaana.m atulaanubhaava.m, mayaa saha dakkhasi  ehi katte.
text.11971: [22] yatthacchati naccagiitehi naago, raajaa yathaa vessava.no  na.li~n~na.m..
text.11973: [21] ``na.m naagaka~n~naa carita.m ga.nena, nikii.lita.m niccamaho  ca ratti.m.
text.11977: [21] ``annena paanena upetaruupa.m, naccehi giitehi ca vaaditehi.
text.11979: [03] tattha ^b^handa caa^eb^ti nipaatamattameva. ^b^.thaana^eb^nti  naagaraajassa vasana.t.thaana.m. ^b^na.li~n~na^eb^nti na.liniya.m naama  raajadhaaniya.m. ^b^carita.m ga.nenaa^eb^ti ta.m naagaka~n~naana.m ga.nena carita.m.  ^b^nikii.lita^eb^nti nicca.m aho ca ratti~nca naagaka~n~naahi  kii.litaanukii.lita.m.
text.11980: [03] eva~nca ^a^M7.0222^ea^ pana vatvaa pu.n.nako mahaasatta.m  assapi.t.tha.m aaropetvaa tattha nesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --

text.12: [03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa cintesi -- ``ime amaccaa etesa.m mama puttaana.m  pa~n~naasampada.m na jaananti, paaka.ta.m nesa.m karissaamii''ti. atheka.m  amacca.m vessantarassa santika.m pesesi -- ``tumhaaka.m pitaa pa~nha.m  pucchitukaamo, kadaa kira aagantvaa pucchatuu''ti. so amacco gantvaa  vessantara.m ^a^V5.0106^ea^ vanditvaa ta.m saasana.m aarocesi. ta.m sutvaa vessantaro  attano pa.tijaggaka.m amacca.m pakkositvaa ``mayha.m kira pitaa ma.m pa~nha.m  pucchitukaamo, tassa idhaagatassa sakkaara.m kaatu.m va.t.tati, kadaa  aagacchatuu''ti pucchi. amacco ``ito sattame divase tava pitaa  aagacchatuu''ti aaha. ta.m sutvaa vessantaro ``pitaa me ito sattame  divase aagacchatuu''ti vatvaa uyyojesi. so aagantvaa ra~n~no  aacikkhi. raajaa sattame divase nagare bheri.m caraapetvaa puttassa  nivesana.m agamaasi. vessantaro ra~n~no mahanta.m sakkaara.m kaaresi,  antamaso daasakammakaaraanampi sakkaara.m kaaresi. raajaa  vessantarasaku.nassa gehe bhu~njitvaa mahanta.m yasa.m anubhavitvaa saka.m  nivesana.m aagantvaa raaja"nga.ne mahanta.m ma.n.dapa.m kaaraapetvaa nagare bheri.m  caraapetvaa ala"nkatama.n.dapamajjhe mahaajanaparivaaro nisiiditvaa  ``vessantara.m ^a^P5.0112^ea^ aanetuu''ti amaccassa santika.m  pesesi. amacco vessantara.m suva.n.napii.the nisiidaapetvaa aanesi.  vessantarasaku.no pitu a"nke nisiiditvaa pitaraa saha kii.litvaa gantvaa  tattheva suva.n.napii.the nisiidi. atha na.m raajaa mahaajanamajjhe raajadhamma.m  pucchanto pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --

text.12054: [03] tattha ^b^jaanaasii^eb^ti sace tayaa daanaanubhaavena ta.m laddha.m, eva.m  sante jaanaasi naama pu~n~naana.m phala~nca pu~n~naphalena nibbatta.m upapatti~nca.  ^b^tasmaa hii^eb^ti yasmaa pu~n~nehi tayaa ida.m laddha.m, tasmaa.  ^b^puna maavasesii^eb^ti punapi yathaa ima.m naagabhavana.m ajjhaavasasi, eva.m  dhamma.m cara.

text.12165: [03] imaasa.m gaathaana.m attho he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
text.12166: [03] mahaasattassa ^a^M7.0232^ea^ vacana.m sutvaa atirekatara.m tu.t.thaa  vimalaa mahaasatta.m gahetvaa sahassagandhodakagha.tehi nhaapetvaa nhaanakaale  mahaasattassa dibbadussadibbagandhamaalaadiini datvaa ala"nkatappa.tiyattakaale  dibbabhojana.m bhojesi. mahaasatto bhuttabhojano ala"nkataasana.m  pa~n~naapetvaa ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiiditvaa buddhaliilaaya dhamma.m desesi.  tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.1217: [22] na caapi te muulaphalaani bhu~nje, yaava na passaami ta.m  brahmacaari.m..
text.12174: [21] ``ubhopi ^a^V7.0220^ea^ te attamane viditvaa, mahoraga.m  naagaka~n~na~nca dhiiro.
text.12175: [22] achambhii abhiito alomaha.t.tho, iccabravi varu.na.m  naagaraajaana.m..
text.12177: [21] ``maa rodhayi naaga aayaahamasmi, yena tavattho ida.m  sariira.m.
text.12178: [22] hadayena ma.msena karohi kicca.m, saya.m karissaami  yathaamati te''ti..
text.12179: [03] tattha ^b^achambhii^eb^ti nikkampo. ^b^alomaha.t.tho^eb^ti bhayena  aha.t.thalomo. ^b^iccabravii^eb^ti viima.msanavasena iti abravi. ^b^maa  rodhayii^eb^ti ``mittadubbhikamma.m karomii''ti maa bhaayi, ``katha.m nu  kho ima.m idaani maaressaamii''ti vaa maa cintayi. ^b^naagaa^eb^ti  varu.na.m aalapati. ^b^aayaahamasmii^eb^ti aayo aha.m asmi, ayameva  vaa paa.tho. ^b^saya.m karissaamii^eb^ti sace tva.m ``imassa santike  idaani dhammo me suto''ti ma.m maaretu.m na visahasi, ahameva yathaa tava  ajjhaasayo, tathaa saya.m karissaamiiti.
text.12182: [21] ``pa~n~naa have hadaya.m pa.n.ditaana.m, te tyamha pa~n~naaya maya.m  sutu.t.thaa.
text.12183: [22] anuunanaamo labhatajja daara.m, ajjeva ta.m kuruyo  paapayaatuu''ti..
text.12184: [03] tattha ^b^te tyamhaa^eb^ti te maya.m tava pa~n~naaya sutu.t.thaa.  ^b^anuunanaamo^eb^ti sampu.n.nanaamo pu.n.nako yakkhasenaapati.  ^b^labhatajja daara^eb^nti labhatu ajja daara.m, dadaami assa dhiitara.m  irandhati.m. ^b^paapayaatuu^eb^ti ajjeva ta.m kurura.t.tha.m pu.n.nako paapetu.
text.12185: [03] eva~nca ^a^P6.0323^ea^ pana vatvaa varu.no naagaraajaa  irandhati.m pu.n.nakassa adaasi. so ta.m labhitvaa tu.t.thacitto mahaasattena  saddhi.m sallapi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.12187: [21] ``sa pu.n.nako attamano udaggo, irandhati.m naagaka~n~na.m  labhitvaa.
text.12188: [22] ha.t.thena bhaavena patiitaruupo, iccabravi kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m..
text.1219: [21] ``addhaa pajaanaasi tuvampi taata, yassa.m disa.m vasate  brahmacaarii.
text.12190: [21] ``bhariyaaya ma.m tva.m akari sama"ngi.m, aha~nca te vidhura  karomi kicca.m.
text.12191: [22] ida~nca te ma.niratana.m dadaami, ajjeva ta.m kuruyo  paapayaamii''ti..
text.12192: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0221^ea^ ^b^ma.niratana^eb^nti pa.n.dita, aha.m tava  gu.nesu pasanno arahaami tava anucchavika.m kicca.m kaatu.m, tasmaa ima~nca  te cakkavattiparibhoga.m ma.niratana.m demi, ajjeva ta.m indapattha.m paapemiiti.
text.12193: [03] atha mahaasatto tassa thuti.m karonto itara.m gaathamaaha --
text.12195: [21] ``ajeyyamesaa tava hotu metti, bhariyaaya kaccaana  piyaaya saddhi.m.
text.12196: [22] aanandi vitto sumano patiito, datvaa ma.ni.m ma~nca  nayindapattha''nti..
text.12197: [03] tattha ^a^M7.0234^ea^ ^b^ajeyyamesaa^eb^ti esaa tava  bhariyaaya saddhi.m piyasa.mvaasametti ajeyyaa hotu. ``aanandi  vitto''tiaadiihi piitisama"ngibhaavamevassa vadati.  ^b^nayindapattha^eb^nti naya indapattha.m.
text.12198: [03] ta.m sutvaa pu.n.nako tathaa akaasi. tena vutta.m --
text.122: [03] eva.m raajaa mahaasatta.m pa~nha.m pucchanto a~n~nesa.m pucchitaniyaamena  apucchitvaa visesetvaa pucchi. athassa pa.n.dito ``tena hi,  mahaaraaja, ohitasoto su.naahi, sabba.m te kathessaamii''ti pasaaritahatthe  sahassatthavika.m .thapento viya dhammadesana.m aarabhi --
text.1220: [22] ta.m ma.m disa.m paapaya taata khippa.m, maa te aha.m  amarimassamamhi..
text.12200: [21] ``sa pu.n.nako kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m, nisiidayii purato  aasanasmi.m.
text.12203: [21] ``mano manussassa yathaapi gacche, tatopissa khippatara.m  ahosi.
text.12204: [22] sa pu.n.nako kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m, upaanayii nagara.m indapattha.m..
text.12207: [21] ``etindapattha.m ^a^P6.0324^ea^ nagara.m padissati,  rammaani ca ambavanaani bhaagaso.
text.12208: [22] aha~nca bhariyaaya sama"ngibhuuto, tuva~nca pattosi saka.m  niketa''nti..
text.12209: [03] tattha ^b^yathaapi gacche^eb^ti mano naama ki~ncaapi na gacchati,  duure aaramma.na.m ga.nhanto pana gatoti vuccati, tasmaa manassa  aaramma.naggaha.natopi khippatara.m tassa manomayasindhavassa gamana.m  ahosiiti evamettha attho da.t.thabbo. ^b^etindapattha^eb^nti assapi.t.the  nisinnoyevassa dassento evamaaha. ^b^saka.m niketa^eb^nti tva~nca  attano nivesana.m sampattoti aaha.
text.12210: [03] tasmi.m pana divase paccuusakaale raajaa supina.m addasa. evaruupo  supino ahosi -- ra~n~no nivesanadvaare pa~n~naakkhandho siilamayasaakho  pa~ncagorasaphalo ala"nkatahatthigavaassapa.ticchanno mahaarukkho  ^a^V7.0222^ea^ .thito. mahaajano tassa sakkaara.m katvaa a~njali.m paggayha  namassamaano ^a^M7.0235^ea^ a.t.thaasi. atheko ka.nhapuriso  pharuso rattasaa.takanivattho rattapupphaka.n.nadharo aavudhahattho aagantvaa  mahaajanassa paridevantasseva ta.m rukkha.m samuula.m chinditvaa aaka.d.dhanto  aadaaya gantvaa puna ta.m aaharitvaa pakati.t.thaaneyeva .thapetvaa pakkaamiiti.  raajaa ta.m supina.m parigga.nhanto ``mahaarukkho viya na a~n~no koci,  vidhurapa.n.dito. mahaajanassa paridevantasseva ta.m samuula.m chinditvaa  aadaaya gatapuriso viya na a~n~no koci, pa.n.dita.m gahetvaa gatamaa.navo.  puna ta.m aaharitvaa pakati.t.thaaneyeva .thapetvaa gato viya so maa.navo  puna ta.m pa.n.dita.m aanetvaa dhammasabhaaya dvaare .thapetvaa pakkamissati.  addhaa ajja maya.m pa.n.dita.m passissaamaa''ti sanni.t.thaana.m katvaa  somanassapatto sakalanagara.m ala"nkaaraapetvaa dhammasabha.m sajjaapetvaa  ala"nkataratanama.n.dape dhammaasana.m pa~n~naapetvaa  ekasataraajaamaccaga.nanagaravaasijaanapadaparivuto ``ajja tumhe pa.n.dita.m  passissatha, maa socitthaa''ti mahaajana.m assaasetvaa pa.n.ditassa  aagamana.m olokento dhammasabhaaya.m nisiidi. amaccaadayopi  nisiidi.msu. tasmi.m kha.ne pu.n.nakopi pa.n.dita.m otaaretvaa dhammasabhaaya  dvaare parisamajjheyeva .thapetvaa irandhati.m aadaaya devanagarameva gato.  tamattha.m ^a^P6.0325^ea^ pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.12212: [21] ``na pu.n.nako kuruuna.m kattuse.t.tha.m, oropiya dhammasabhaaya  majjhe.
text.12215: [21] ``ta.m disvaa raajaa paramappatiito, u.t.thaaya baahaahi  palissajitvaa.
text.12217: [03] tattha ^b^anomava.n.no^eb^ti ahiinava.n.no uttamava.n.no.  ^b^avikampaya^eb^nti bhikkhave, so raajaa pa.n.dita.m palissajitvaa  mahaajanamajjhe avikampanto anoliiyantoyeva hatthe gahetvaa attano  abhimukha.m katvaa ala"nkatadhammaasane nisiidaapesi.
text.12218: [03] atha ^a^M7.0236^ea^ raajaa tena saddhi.m sammoditvaa  madhurapa.tisanthaara.m karonto gaathamaaha --
text.12220: [21] ``tva.m no vinetaasi ratha.mva naddha.m, nandanti ta.m kuruyo  dassanena.
text.12221: [22] akkhaahi me pucchito etamattha.m, katha.m pamokkho ahu  maa.navassaa''ti..
text.12222: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0223^ea^ ^b^naddha^eb^nti yathaa naddha.m ratha.m saarathi  vineti, eva.m tva.m amhaaka.m kaara.nena nayena hitakiriyaasu vinetaa.  ^b^nandanti ta^eb^nti ta.m disvaava ime kurura.t.thavaasino tava dassanena  nandanti. ^b^maa.navassaa^eb^ti maa.navassa santikaa katha.m tava  pamokkho ahosi? yo vaa ta.m mu~ncantassa maa.navassa pamokkho, so  kena kaara.nena ahosiiti attho.
text.12225: [21] ``ya.m maa.navotyaabhivadii janinda, na so manusso  naraviirase.t.tha.
text.12226: [22] yadi te suto pu.n.nako naama yakkho, ra~n~no kuverassa  hi so sajibbo..
text.12228: [21] ``bhuumindharo varu.no naama naago, brahaa sucii  va.n.nabaluupapanno.
text.12229: [22] tassaanuja.m dhiitara.m kaamayaano, irandhatii naama saa  naagaka~n~naa..
text.1223: [22] ta.m ma.m vana.m paapaya taata khippa.m, puraa te paa.na.m vijahaami  assame''ti..
text.12231: [21] ``tassaa ^a^P6.0326^ea^ sumajjhaaya piyaaya hetu,  pataarayittha mara.naaya mayha.m.
text.12232: [22] so ceva bhariyaaya sama"ngibhuuto, aha~nca anu~n~naato  ma.ni ca laddho''ti..
text.12233: [03] tattha ^b^ya.m maa.navotyaabhivadii^eb^ti janinda ya.m tva.m  ``maa.navo''ti abhivadasi. ^b^bhuumindharo^eb^ti  bhuumindharanaagabhavanavaasii. ^b^saa naagaka~n~naa^eb^ti ya.m naagaka~n~na.m so  patthayamaano mama mara.naaya pataarayi citta.m pavattesi, saa naagaka~n~naa  ^a^M7.0237^ea^ irandhatii naama. ^b^piyaaya hetuu^eb^ti mahaaraaja,  so hi naagaraajaa catupposathikapa~nhavissajjane pasanno ma.m ma.ninaa  puujetvaa naagabhavana.m gato vimalaaya naama deviyaa ta.m ma.ni.m adisvaa  ``deva, kuhi.m ma.nii''ti pucchito mama dhammakathikabhaava.m va.n.nesi.  saa mayha.m dhammakatha.m sotukaamaa hutvaa mama hadaye doha.la.m uppaadesi.  naagaraajaa duggahitena pana dhiitara.m irandhati.m aaha -- ``maataa, te  vidhurassa hadayama.mse doha.linii, tassa hadayama.msa.m aaharitu.m samattha.m  saamika.m pariyesaahii''ti. saa pariyesantii vessava.nassa bhaagineyya.m  pu.n.naka.m naama yakkha.m disvaa ta.m attani pa.tibaddhacitta.m ~natvaa pitu  santika.m nesi. atha na.m so ``vidhurapa.n.ditassa hadayama.msa.m aaharitu.m  sakkonto irandhati.m labhissasii''ti aaha. pu.n.nako vepullapabbatato  cakkavattiparibhoga.m ma.niratana.m aaharitvaa tumhehi saddhi.m juuta.m kii.litvaa  ma.m jinitvaa labhi. aha~nca mama nivesane tiiha.m vasaapetvaa mahanta.m  sakkaara.m akaasi.m. sopi ma.m assavaaladhi.m gaahaapetvaa himavante  rukkhesu ca pabbatesu ca pothetvaa maaretu.m asakkonto sattame vaatakkhandhe  verambhavaatamukhe ca pakkhanditvaa anupubbena sa.t.thiyojanubbedhe  ^a^V7.0224^ea^ kaa.laagirimatthake .thapetvaa siihavesaadivasena ida~ncida~nca  ruupa.m katvaapi maaretu.m asakkonto mayaa attano maara.nakaara.na.m pu.t.tho  aacikkhi. athassaaha.m saadhunaradhamme kathesi.m. ta.m sutvaa pasannacitto  ma.m idha aanetukaamo ahosi.
text.12234: [03] athaaha.m ta.m aadaaya naagabhavana.m gantvaa naagara~n~no ca vimalaaya ca  dhamma.m desesi.m. tato naagaraajaa ca vimalaa ca sabbanaagaparisaa ca  pasiidi.msu. naagaraajaa tattha mayaa chaaha.m vutthakaale irandhati.m  pu.n.nakassa ^a^P6.0327^ea^ adaasi. so ta.m labhitvaa pasannacitto  hutvaa ma.m ma.niratanena puujetvaa naagaraajena aa.natto manomayasindhava.m  aaropetvaa saya.m majjhimaasane nisiiditvaa irandhati.m pacchimaasane  nisiidaapetvaa ma.m purimaasane nisiidaapetvaa idhaagantvaa parisamajjhe  otaaretvaa irandhati.m aadaaya attano nagarameva gato. eva.m, mahaaraaja,  so pu.n.nako tassaa sumajjhaaya piyaaya hetu pataarayittha mara.naaya mayha.m.  atheva.m ma.m nissaaya so ceva bhariyaaya sama"ngibhuuto, mama dhammakatha.m  sutvaa pasannena naagaraajena aha~nca anu~n~naato, tassa pu.n.nakassa  santikaa aya.m sabbakaamadado cakkavattiparibhogama.ni ca laddho, ga.nhatha,  deva, ima.m ma.ninti ra~n~no ratana.m adaasi.
text.12235: [03] tato ^a^M7.0238^ea^ raajaa paccuusakaale attanaa di.t.thasupina.m  nagaravaasiina.m kathetukaamo ``bhonto, nagaravaasino ajja mayaa  di.t.thasupina.m su.naathaa''ti vatvaa aaha --
text.12237: [21] ``rukkho hi mayha.m padvaare sujaato, pa~n~naakkhandho  siilamayassa saakhaa.
text.12238: [22] atthe ca dhamme ca .thito nipaako, gavapphalo  hatthigavaassachanno..
text.1224: [03] tattha ^b^idhaagamaa^eb^ti, taata, ima.m assamapada.m aagato.  ^b^sudassaneyyo^eb^ti su.t.thu dassaneyyo. ^b^sutanuu^eb^ti su.t.thu tanuko  naatikiso naatithuulo ^a^M5.0216^ea^. ^b^vinetii^eb^ti attano  sariirappabhaaya assamapada.m ekobhaasa.m viya vineti puureti.  ^b^suka.nhaka.nhacchadanehi bhoto^eb^ti, taata, tassa bhoto suka.nhehi  ka.nhacchadanehi bhamarava.n.nehi kesehi suka.nhasiisa.m sumajjitama.nimaya.m  viya khaayati. ^b^amassuujaato^eb^ti na taavassa massu jaayati,  taru.noyeva. ^b^apuraa.nava.n.nii^eb^ti acirapabbajito.  ^b^aadhaararuupa~nca panassa ka.n.the^eb^ti ka.n.the ca panassa amhaaka.m  bhikkhaabhaajana.t.thapana.m pattaadhaarasadisa.m pi.landhana.m atthiiti muttaahaara.m  sandhaaya vadati. ^b^ga.n.daa^eb^ti thane sandhaayaaha. ^b^ure  sujaataa^eb^ti uramhi sujaataa. ``urato''tipi paa.tho.  ^b^pabhassaraa^eb^ti pabhaasampannaa. ``pabhaasare''tipi paa.tho,  obhaasantiiti attho.
text.12241: [22] so no aya.m aagato sanniketa.m, rukkhassimassaapaciti.m  karotha..
text.12243: [21] ``ye keci vittaa mama paccayena, sabbeva te paatukarontu  ajja.
text.12246: [21] ``ye keci baddhaa mama atthi ra.t.the, sabbeva te bandhanaa  mocayantu.
text.12247: [22] yathevaya.m bandhanasmaa pamutto, evamete mu~ncare bandhanasmaa..
text.1225: [03] ^b^bhusadassaneyya^eb^nti ativiya dassaniiya.m.  ^b^ku~ncitaggaa^eb^ti siihaku.n.dala.m sandhaaya vadati. ^b^sutta~ncaa^eb^ti  ya.m tassa ja.taabandhanasutta.m, tampi jotati pabha.m mu~ncati.  ^b^``sa.myamaani catasso''^eb^ti iminaa ma.nisuva.n.napavaa.larajatamayaani  cattaari pi.landhanaani dasseti ^a^P5.0206^ea^. ^b^taa  pi.msare^eb^ti taani pi.landhanaani paavusamhi pavu.t.the deve tiri.tisa"nghaa  viya viravanti. ^b^mikhala^eb^nti mekhala.m, ayameva vaa paa.tho. ida.m  nivatthaka~ncanaciiraka.m sandhaayaaha. ^b^na santhare^eb^ti na vaake. ida.m  vutta.m hoti -- taata, yathaa maya.m ti.namaya.m vaa vaakamaya.m vaa ciiraka.m  dhaarema, na tathaa so, so pana suva.n.naciiraka.m dhaaretiiti.  ^b^akhiilakaanii^eb^ti atacaani nippa.n.naani.  ^b^ka.tisamohitaanii^eb^ti ka.tiya.m baddhaani. ^b^niccakii.la.m  karontii^eb^ti agha.t.titaanipi niccakaala.m kii.laayanti. ^b^ha.m,  taataa^eb^ti hambho, taata. ^b^ki.m rukkhaphalaani taanii^eb^ti taani  tassa maa.navassa suttaaru.lhaani ka.tiya.m baddhaani katararukkhaphalaani  naamaati ma.nisa"nghaa.ti.m sandhaayaaha.
text.12251: [22] amajjapaa majjarahaa pivantu, pu.n.naahi thaalaahi  palissutaahi..
text.12253: [21] ``mahaapatha.m nicca samavhayantu, tibba~nca rakkha.m vidahantu  ra.t.the.
text.12255: [03] tattha ^a^M7.0239^ea^ ^b^siilamayassa saakhaa^eb^ti etassa  rukkhassa siilamayaa saakhaa. ^b^atthe ca dhammecaa^eb^ti vaddhiya~nca  sabhaave ca. ^b^.thito nipaako^eb^ti so pa~n~naamayarukkho pati.t.thito.  ^b^gavapphalo^eb^ti pa~ncavidhagorasaphalo. ^b^hatthigavaassachanno^eb^ti  ala"nkatahatthigavaassehi sa~nchanno. ^b^naccagiitatuuriyaabhinaadite^eb^ti  atha tassa rukkhassa puuja.m karontena mahaajanena tasmi.m rukkhe etehi  naccaadiihi abhinaadite. ^b^ucchijja sena.m puriso ahaasii^eb^ti eko  ka.nhapuriso aagantvaa ta.m rukkha.m ucchijja parivaaretvaa .thita.m sena.m  palaapetvaa ahaasi gahetvaa gato. puna so rukkho aagantvaa amhaaka.m  nivesanadvaarayeva .thito. so no aya.m rukkhasadiso pa.n.dito  sanniketa.m aagato. idaani sabbeva tumhe rukkhassa imassa apaciti.m  karotha, mahaasakkaara.m pavattetha.
text.12256: [03] ^b^mama paccayenaa^eb^ti ambho, amaccaa ye keci ma.m nissaaya  laddhena yasena ^b^vittaa^eb^ tu.t.thacittaa, te sabbe attano vitta.m  paatukarontu. ^b^tibbaanii^eb^ti bahalaani mahantaani.  ^b^upaayanaanii^eb^ti pa.n.naakaare. ^b^ye kecii^eb^ti antamaso  kii.lanatthaaya baddhe migapakkhino upaadaaya. ^b^mu~ncare^eb^ti mu~ncantu.  ^b^unna"ngalaa maasamima.m karontuu^eb^ti ima.m maasa.m kasanana"ngalaani  ussaapetvaa ekamante .thapetvaa nagare bheri.m caraapetvaa sabbeva manussaa  mahaacha.na.m karontu. ^b^bhakkhayantuu^eb^ti bhu~njantu. ^b^amajjapaa^eb^ti  ettha ^b^aeb^-kaaro nipaatamatta.m, majjapaa purisaa majjarahaa attano  attano aapaana.t.thaanesu nisinnaa pivantuuti attho. ^b^pu.n.naahi  thaalaahii^eb^ti pu.n.nehi thaalehi. ^b^palissutaahii^eb^ti atipu.n.nattaa  paggharamaanehi. ^b^mahaapatha.m nicca samavhayantuu^eb^ti antonagare  ala"nkatamahaapatha.m raajamagga.m nissaaya .thitaa vesiyaa niccakaala.m  kilesavasena kilesatthika.m jana.m avhayantuuti attho. ^b^tibba^eb^nti  gaa.lha.m. ^b^yathaa^eb^ti yathaa rakkhassa susa.mvihitattaa unna"ngalaa hutvaa  rukkhassimassa apaciti.m karontaa a~n~nama~n~na.m na vihe.thayeyyu.m, eva.m  rakkha.m sa.mvidahantuuti attho.
text.12259: [21] ``orodhaa ^a^V7.0226^ea^ ca kumaaraa ca, vesiyaanaa ca  braahma.naa.
text.1226: [03] ^b^ja.taa^eb^ti ja.taama.n.dalaakaarena baddharatanamissakakesava.t.tiyo  sandhaayaaha. ^b^vellitaggaa^eb^ti ku~ncitaggaa. ^b^dvedhaasiro^eb^ti  tassa siisa.m dvedhaa katvaa baddhaana.m ja.taana.m vasena su.t.thu vibhattaruupa.m.  ^b^tathaa^eb^ti yathaa tassa maa.navassa ja.taa, tathaa tumhehi mama na  baddhaa, aho vata mamapi tathaa assuuti patthento aaha.  ^b^upetaruupaa^eb^ti upetasabhaavaa. ^b^vaatasamerita.mvaa^eb^ti ^a^M5.0217^ea^  yathaa naama niiluppala.m vaatena samiirita.m, tatheva aya.m imasmi.m  vanasa.n.de assamo sa.mvaati. ^b^netaadiso^eb^ti, taata, yaadiso  ^a^V5.0196^ea^ mama kaaye pa"nko, netaadiso tassa sariire. so hi dassaniiyo ceva  sugandho ca. ^b^aggagimhe^eb^ti vasantasamaye.
text.1227: [03] ^b^nihantii^eb^ti paharati. ^b^ki.m rukkhaphala.m nu kho ta^eb^nti  katararukkhassa nu kho ta.m phala.m. ^b^sa"nkhavaruupapannaa^eb^ti  sudhotasa"nkhapa.tibhaagaa. ^b^na hi nuuna so saakamakhaadi tehii^eb^ti  na nuuna so maa.navo maya.m viya tehi dantehi rukkhapa.n.naani ceva  muulaphalaaphalaani ca khaadi. amhaaka~nhi taani khaadantaana.m sabalaa  pa.n.nava.n.naa dantaati diipeti.
text.12270: [03] tattha ^b^abhihaarayu^eb^nti eva.m ra~n~naa aa.nattaa mahaacha.na.m  pa.tiyaadetvaa sabbe satte bandhanaa mocetvaa ete sabbe orodhaadayo  naanappakaara.m pa.n.naakaara.m sajjitvaa tena saddhi.m anna~nca paana~nca  pa.n.ditassa pesesu.m. ^b^pa.n.ditamaagate^eb^ti pa.n.dite aagate ta.m pa.n.dita.m  disvaa bahujano pasanno ahosi.
text.12271: [03] cha.no maasena osaana.m agamaasi. tato mahaasatto buddhakicca.m  saadhento viya mahaajanassa dhamma.m desento raajaana~nca anusaasanto  daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa aayupariyosaane  saggaparaaya.no ahosi. raajaana.m aadi.m katvaa sabbepi nagaravaasino  pa.n.ditassovaade .thatvaa daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa aayupariyosaane  saggapura.m puurayi.msu.
text.12272: [03] satthaa ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva,  pubbepi tathaagato pa~n~naasampanno upaayakusaloyevaa''ti vatvaa jaataka.m  samodhaanesi -- ``tadaa pa.n.ditassa maataapitaro mahaaraajakulaani  ahesu.m, je.t.thabhariyaa raahulamaataa, je.t.thaputto raahulo, vimalaa uppalava.n.naa,  varu.nanaagaraajaa saariputto, supa.n.naraajaa moggallaano, sakko anuruddho,  dhana~ncayakorabyaraajaa aanando, pu.n.nako channo, parisaa buddhaparisaa,  vidhurapa.n.dito pana ahameva sammaasambuddho ahosi''nti.
text.12276: [03] ^b^phussatii^eb^ ^a^V7.0227^ea^ ^a^P6.0479^ea^ ^a^M7.0241^ea^  ^b^varava.n.naabhe^eb^ti ida.m satthaa kapilavatthu.m upanissaaya  nigrodhaaraame viharanto pokkharavassa.m aarabbha kathesi. yadaa hi  satthaa pavattitavaradhammacakko anukkamena raajagaha.m gantvaa tattha hemanta.m  viitinaametvaa udaayittherena maggadesakena  viisatisahassakhii.naasavaparivuto pa.thamagamanena kapilavatthu.m agamaasi,  tadaa sakyaraajaano ``maya.m amhaaka.m ~naatise.t.tha.m passissaamaa''ti  sannipatitvaa bhagavato vasana.t.thaana.m viima.msamaanaa ``nigrodhasakkassaaraamo  rama.niiyo''ti sallakkhetvaa tattha sabba.m pa.tijagganavidhi.m katvaa  gandhapupphaadihatthaa paccuggamana.m karontaa sabbaala"nkaarappa.tima.n.dite  daharadahare naagaradaarake ca naagaradaarikaayo ca pa.thama.m pahi.ni.msu, tato  raajakumaare ca raajakumaarikaayo ca. tesa.m antaraa saama.m  gandhapupphacu.n.naadiihi satthaara.m puujetvaa bhagavanta.m gahetvaa nigrodhaaraamameva  agami.msu. tattha bhagavaa viisatisahassakhii.naasavaparivuto  pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisiidi. tadaa hi saakiyaa maanajaatikaa  maanatthaddhaa. te ``aya.m siddhatthakumaaro amhehi daharataro, amhaaka.m  kani.t.tho bhaagineyyo putto nattaa''ti cintetvaa daharadahare raajakumaare ca  raajakumaarikaayo ca aaha.msu ``tumhe bhagavanta.m vandatha, maya.m tumhaaka.m  pi.t.thito nisiidissaamaa''ti.
text.12277: [03] tesu eva.m avanditvaa nisinnesu bhagavaa tesa.m ajjhaasaya.m  oloketvaa ``na ma.m ~naatayo vandanti, handa idaaneva  vandaapessaamii''ti abhi~n~naapaadaka.m catutthajjhaana.m samaapajjitvaa tato  vu.t.thaaya aakaasa.m abbhuggantvaa tesa.m siise paadapa.msu.m okiramaano viya  ka.n.dambarukkhamuule yamakapaa.tihaariyasadisa.m paa.tihaariya.m akaasi.  raajaa suddhodano ta.m acchariya.m disvaa aaha ``bhante, tumhaaka.m  jaatadivase kaa.ladevalassa vandanattha.m upaniitaana.m vo paade parivattitvaa  braahma.nassa matthake .thite disvaa aha.m tumhaaka.m paade vandi.m, aya.m me  pa.thamavandanaa. punapi vappama"ngaladivase jambucchaayaaya sirisayane  nisinnaana.m vo jambucchaayaaya aparivattana.m ^a^M7.0242^ea^ disvaapi  aha.m tumhaaka.m paade vandi.m, aya.m me dutiyavandanaa. idaani ima.m  adi.t.thapubba.m paa.tihaariya.m ^a^V7.0228^ea^ disvaapi tumhaaka.m paade vandaami,  aya.m me tatiyavandanaa''ti. ra~n~naa pana vandite avanditvaa .thaatu.m  samattho naama ekasaakiyopi naahosi, sabbe vandi.msuyeva.
text.12278: [03] iti bhagavaa ~naatayo vandaapetvaa aakaasato otaritvaa  pa~n~nattavarabuddhaasane nisiidi. nisinne ca bhagavati sikhaapatto  ~naatisamaagamo ahosi, sabbe ekaggacittaa hutvaa nisiidi.msu. tato  mahaamegho u.t.thahitvaa pokkharavassa.m vassi, tambava.n.na.m udaka.m he.t.thaa  viravanta.m gacchati. ye temetukaamaa, te tementi. atemetukaamassa  ^a^P6.0480^ea^ sariire ekabindumattampi na patati. ta.m disvaa  sabbe acchariyabbhutacittajaataa ahesu.m. ``aho acchariya.m aho  abbhuta.m aho buddhaana.m mahaanubhaavataa, yesa.m ~naatisamaagame evaruupa.m  pokkharavassa.m vassii''ti bhikkhuu katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m. ta.m sutvaa satthaa  ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva, pubbepi mama ~naatisamaagame mahaamegho  pokkharavassa.m vassiyevaa''ti vatvaa tehi yaacito atiita.m aahari.
text.12279: [03] atiite sivira.t.the jetuttaranagare sivimahaaraajaa naama rajja.m  kaarento sa~njaya.m naama putta.m pa.tilabhi. so tassa vayappattassa  maddaraajadhiitara.m phussati.m naama raajaka~n~na.m aanetvaa rajja.m niyyaadetvaa  phussati.m aggamahesi.m akaasi. tassaa aya.m pubbayogo -- ito  ekanavutikappe vipassii naama satthaa loke udapaadi. tasmi.m  bandhumatinagara.m nissaaya kheme migadaaye viharante eko raajaa ra~n~no  bandhumassa anagghena candanasaarena saddhi.m satasahassagghanika.m  suva.n.namaala.m pesesi. ra~n~no pana dve dhiitaro ahesu.m. so ta.m  pa.n.naakaara.m taasa.m daatukaamo hutvaa candanasaara.m je.t.thikaaya adaasi,  suva.n.namaala.m kani.t.thaaya adaasi. taa ubhopi ``na maya.m ima.m attano  sariire pi.landhissaama, satthaarameva puujessaamaa''ti cintetvaa raajaana.m  aaha.msu ``taata, candanasaarena ca suva.n.namaalaaya ca dasabala.m  puujessaamaa''ti. ta.m sutvaa raajaa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchi. je.t.thikaa  sukhumacandanacu.n.na.m kaaretvaa suva.n.nasamugga.m puuretvaa ga.nhaapesi.  kani.t.thabhaginii pana suva.n.namaala.m uracchadamaala.m kaaraapetvaa ^a^M7.0243^ea^  suva.n.nasamuggena ga.nhaapesi. taa ubhopi migadaayavihaara.m  gantvaa je.t.thikaa candanacu.n.nena dasabalassa suva.n.nava.n.na.m sariira.m puujetvaa  sesacu.n.naani gandhaku.tiya.m vikiritvaa ``bhante, anaagate tumhaadisassa  buddhassa maataa bhaveyya''nti patthana.m akaasi. kani.t.thabhaginiipi  tathaagatassa suva.n.nava.na.m sariira.m suva.n.namaalaaya katena uracchadena puujetvaa  ``bhante, yaava arahattappatti, taava ida.m pasaadhana.m mama sariiraa maa  vigata.m hotuu''ti patthana.m akaasi. satthaapi taasa.m anumodana.m akaasi.
text.1228: [03] ^b^akakkasa^eb^nti, taata, tassa bhaasita.m apharusa.m aga.lita.m,  punappuna.m vadantassaapi madhurataaya ^b^muhu.m mudu.m,^eb^ apamussataaya  ^b^uju.m,^eb^ avikkhittataaya ^b^anuddha.ta.m,^eb^ pati.t.thitataaya ^b^acapala.m.  ruda^eb^nti bhaasamaanassa sarasa"nkhaata.m rudampi manohara.m karaviikassa  viya sussara.m sumadhura.m. ^b^ra~njayatevaa^eb^ti mama mano ra~njatiyeva.  ^b^bindussaro^eb^ti pi.n.ditassaro. ^b^maa.navohuu^eb^ti so hi  maa.navo puratthaa mama mitto ahu.
text.12280: [03] taa ubhopi yaavataayuka.m ^a^P6.0481^ea^ .thatvaa devaloke  nibbatti.msu. taasu je.t.thabhaginii devalokato manussaloka.m ^a^V7.0229^ea^,  manussalokato devaloka.m sa.msarantii ekanavutikappaavasaane amhaaka.m  buddhuppaadakaale buddhamaataa mahaamaayaadevii naama ahosi.  kani.t.thabhaginiipi tatheva sa.msarantii kassapadasabalassa kaale kikissa  ra~n~no dhiitaa hutvaa nibbatti. saa cittakammakataaya viya  uracchadamaalaaya ala"nkatena urena jaatattaa uracchadaa naama kumaarikaa  hutvaa so.lasavassikakaale satthu bhattaanumodana.m sutvaa sotaapattiphale  pati.t.thaaya aparabhaage bhattaanumodana.m su.nanteneva pitaraa sotaapattiphala.m  pattadivaseyeva arahatta.m patvaa pabbajitvaa parinibbaayi. kikiraajaapi  a~n~naa satta dhiitaro labhi. taasa.m naamaani --
text.12282: [22] dhammaa ceva sudhammaa ca, sa"nghadaasii ca sattamii''ti..
text.12286: [03] taasu ^a^M7.0244^ea^ phussatii sudhammaa naama hutvaa  daanaadiini pu~n~naani katvaa vipassisammaasambuddhassa kataaya  candanacu.n.napuujaaya phalena rattacandanarasaparipphositena viya sariirena  jaatattaa phussatii naama kumaarikaa hutvaa devesu ca manussesu ca  sa.msarantii aparabhaage sakkassa devara~n~no aggamahesii hutvaa nibbatti.  athassaa yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa pa~ncasu pubbanimittesu uppannesu sakko  devaraajaa tassaa parikkhii.naayukata.m ~natvaa mahantena yasena ta.m aadaaya  nandanavanuyyaana.m gantvaa tattha ta.m ala"nkatasayanapi.t.the nisinna.m saya.m  sayanapasse nisiiditvaa etadavoca ``bhadde phussati, te dasa vare  dammi, te ga.nhassuu''ti vadanto imasmi.m gaathaasahassapa.tima.n.dite  mahaavessantarajaatake pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
text.12289: [22] pathabyaa caarupubba"ngi, ya.m tuyha.m manaso piya''nti..
text.1229: [03] ^b^susandhi sabbattha vima.t.thima.m va.na^eb^nti taata tassa maa.navassa  uuruuna.m antare eka.m va.na.m atthi, ta.m susandhi suphusita.m  sippipu.tamukhasadisa.m, sabbattha vima.t.tha.m samantato ma.t.tha.m. ^b^puthuu^eb^ti  mahanta.m. ^b^sujaata^eb^nti susa.n.thita.m. ^b^kharapattasannibha^eb^nti  ^a^P5.0207^ea^ supupphitapadumamaku.lasannibha.m. ^b^uttariyaanaa^eb^ti  uttaritvaa avattharitvaa. ^b^pi.layii^eb^ti pii.lesi. ^b^tapantii^eb^ti  tassa maa.navassa sariirato niccharantaa suva.n.nava.n.nara.msiyo jalanti  obhaasanti virocanti ca. ^b^baahaa^eb^ti baahaapissa muduu.  ^b^a~njanalomasaadisaa^eb^ti a~njanasadisehi lomehi samannaagataa.  ^b^vicitrava.t.ta"ngulikaassa sobhare^eb^ti hatthaapissa varalakkha.navicitraahi  pavaala"nkurasadisaahi va.t.ta"nguliihi samannaagataa sobhanti.
text.12290: [03] evamesaa ^a^P6.0482^ea^ mahaavessantaradhammadesanaa devaloke  pati.t.thaapitaa naama hoti.
text.12291: [03] tattha ^a^V7.0230^ea^ ^b^phussatii^eb^ti ta.m naamenaalapati.  ^b^varava.n.naabhe^eb^ti varaaya va.n.naabhaaya samannaagate. ^b^dasadhaa^eb^ti  dasavidhe. ^b^pathabyaa^eb^ti pathaviya.m gahetabbe katvaa ^b^varassu^eb^  ga.nhassuuti vadati. ^b^caarupubba"ngii^eb^ti caarunaa pubba"ngena  varalakkha.nena samannaagate. ^b^ya.m tuyha.m manaso piya^eb^nti ya.m ya.m tava  manasaa piya.m, ta.m ta.m dasahi ko.t.thaasehi ga.nhaahiiti vadati.
text.12292: [03] saa attano cavanadhammata.m ajaanantii pamattaa hutvaa  dutiyagaathamaaha --
text.12294: [21] ``devaraaja namo tyatthu, ki.m paapa.m pakata.m mayaa.
text.12296: [03] tattha ^b^namo tyatthuu^eb^ti namo te atthu. ^b^ki.m paapa^eb^nti  ki.m mayaa tava santike paapa.m pakatanti pucchati. ^b^dhara.niiruha^eb^nti  rukkha.m.
text.12297: [03] athassaa pamattabhaava.m ~natvaa sakko dve gaathaa abhaasi --
text.12299: [21] ``na ceva te kata.m paapa.m, na ca me tvamasi appiyaa.
text.1230: [03] ^b^akakkasa"ngo^eb^ti kacchupii.lakaadirahitaa"ngapacca"ngo.  ^b^ramaya.m upa.t.thahii^eb^ti ma.m ramayanto upa.t.thahi paricari.  ^b^tuuluupanibhaa^eb^ti mudubhaavassa upamaa.  ^b^suva.n.nakambutalava.t.tasucchavii^eb^ti suva.n.namaya.m aadaasatala.m viya va.t.taa  ca succhavi ca, parima.n.dalatalaa ceva sundaracchavi caati attho.  ^b^samphusitvaa^eb^ti su.t.thu phusitvaa attano hatthasamphassa.m mama sariire  pharaapetvaa. ^b^ito gato^eb^ti mama ^a^M5.0218^ea^  olokentasseva ito gato. ^b^tena ma.m dahantii^eb^ti tena tassa  hatthasamphassena idaani ma.m dahanti. tathaa hi tassa gatakaalato  pa.t.thaaya mama sariire .daaho u.t.thito, tenamhi domanassappatto nipannoti.
text.12300: [22] pu~n~na~nca te parikkhii.na.m, yena teva.m vadaamaha.m..
text.12303: [22] pa.tigga.nhaahi me ete, vare dasa pavecchato''ti..
text.12304: [03] tattha ^b^yena teva^eb^nti yena te eva.m vadaami. ^b^tuyha.m  vinaabhaavo^eb^ti tava amhehi saddhi.m viyogo bhavissati.  ^b^pavecchato^eb^ti dadamaanassa.
text.12305: [03] saa sakkassa vacana.m sutvaa nicchayena attano mara.na.m ~natvaa vara.m  ga.nhantii aaha --
text.1231: [03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V5.0197^ea^ ^b^nuuna so khaarividha^eb^nti, taata, nuuna so maa.navo na  khaaribhaara.m ukkhipitvaa vicari. ^b^khilaanii^eb^ti kilaani,  ``ayameva vaa paa.tho. ^b^sokhya^eb^nti sukha.m.  ^b^maaluvapa.n.nasanthataa viki.n.naruupaavaa^eb^ti, taata, aya.m tava  maaluvapa.n.nasanthataa ajja mayaa ca tena ca a~n~nama~n~na.m  paraamasanaali"nganavasena parivattantehi viki.n.naa viya aakulabyaakulaa  jaataa. ^b^punappuna.m pa.n.naku.ti.m vajaamaa^eb^ti, taata, aha~nca so ca  abhiramitvaa kilantaruupaa pa.n.nasaalato nikkhamitvaa udaka.m pavisitvaa  ramitvaa vigatadarathaa punappuna.m imameva ku.ti.m pavisaamaati vadati.
text.12317: [22] kucchi anunnato assa, caapa.mva likhita.m sama.m..
text.12319: [21] ``thanaa ^a^P6.0483^ea^ me nappapateyyu.m, palitaa na  santu vaasava.
text.1232: [03] ^b^na majja mantaa^eb^ti ajja mama tassa gatakaalato pa.t.thaaya neva  mantaa pa.tibhanti na upa.t.thahanti na ruccanti. ^b^na aggihutta.m napi  ya~n~natanta^eb^nti mahaabrahmuno aaraadhanatthaaya  kattabbahomavidhuupanaadiya~n~nakiriyaapi me na pa.tibhaati na upa.t.thaati na  ruccati. ^b^na caapi te^eb^ti tayaa aabhatamuulaphalaaphalaanipi na  bhu~njaami. ^b^yassa.m disa^eb^nti yassa.m disaaya.m. ^b^vana^eb^nti  tassa maa.navassa assama.m parivaaretvaa .thitavananti.
text.12320: [22] kaaye rajo na limpetha, vajjha~ncaapi pamocaye..
text.12327: [03] tattha ^b^siviraajassaa^eb^ti saa sakalajambudiipatala.m olokentii  attano anucchavika.m sivira~n~no nivesana.m disvaa tattha aggamahesibhaava.m  patthentii evamaaha. ^b^yathaa migii^eb^ti ekavassikaa hi migapotikaa  niilanettaa hoti, tenevamaaha. ^b^tatthapassa^eb^nti tatthapi iminaava  naamena ^a^M7.0246^ea^ assa.m. ^b^labhethaa^eb^ti labheyya.m.  ^b^varada^eb^nti  ala"nkatasiisaakkhiyugalahadayama.msarudhirasetacchattaputtadaaresu  yaacitayaacitassa varabha.n.dassa daayaka.m. ^b^kucchii^eb^ti  ``majjhima"nga''nti vutta.m saruupato dasseti. ^b^likhita^eb^nti yathaa  chekena dhanukaarena sammaa likhita.m dhanu anunnatamajjha.m tulaava.t.ta.m sama.m  hoti, evaruupo me kucchi bhaveyya.
text.12328: [03] ^b^nappapateyyu^eb^nti patitvaa lambaa na bhaveyyu.m. ^b^palitaa  na santu vaasavaa^eb^ti vaasava devase.t.tha, palitaanipi me sirasmi.m na  santu maa pa~n~naayi.msu. ``palitaani siroruhaa''tipi paa.tho.  ^b^vajjha~ncaapii^eb^ti kibbisakaaraka.m raajaaparaadhika.m vajjhappattacora.m  attano balena mocetu.m samatthaa bhaveyya.m. iminaa attano issariyabhaava.m  diipeti. ^b^bhuutamaagadhava.n.nite^eb^ti bhojanakaalaadiisu thutivasena  ^a^V7.0232^ea^ kaala.m aarocentehi suutehi ceva maagadhakehi ca va.n.nite.  ^b^citragga.lerughusite^eb^ti pa~nca"ngikatuuriyasaddasadisa.m manorama.m rava.m  ravantehi sattaratanavicittehi dvaarakavaa.tehi ugghosite.  ^b^suraama.msapabodhane^eb^ti ``pivatha, khaadathaa''ti suraama.msehi  pabodhiyamaanajane evaruupe siviraajassa nivesane tassa aggamahesii  bhaveyyanti ime dasa vare ga.nhi.
text.12329: [03] tattha siviraajassa aggamahesibhaavo pa.thamo varo, niilanettataa  dutiyo, niilabhamukataa tatiyo, phussatiiti naama.m catuttho,  puttapa.tilaabho pa~ncamo, anunnatakucchitaa cha.t.tho, alambatthanataa sattamo,  apalitabhaavo a.t.thamo, sukhumacchavibhaavo navamo,  vajjhappamocanasamatthataa dasamo varoti.
text.1233: [03] tasseva.m vilapantassa ta.m vilaapa.m sutvaa mahaasatto ``ekaaya  itthiyaa imassa siila.m bhinna.m bhavissatii''ti ~natvaa ta.m ovadanto cha  gaathaayo abhaasi --
text.12332: [21] ``ye te dasa varaa dinnaa, mayaa sabba"ngasobhane.
text.12333: [22] siviraajassa vijite, sabbe te lacchasii vare''ti..
text.12334: [03] athassaa sakko devaraajaa phussatiyaa dasa vare adaasi, datvaa  ca pana ``bhadde phussati, tava sabbe te samijjhantuu''ti vatvaa  anumodi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.12338: [03] tattha ^b^anumoditthaa^eb^ti ``sabbe te lacchasi vare''ti eva.m  vare datvaa pamuddito tu.t.thamaanaso ahosiiti attho.
text.12341: [03] iti saa vare gahetvaa tato cutaa maddara~n~no aggamahesiyaa  kucchimhi nibbatti. jaayamaanaa ca candanacu.n.napariki.n.nena viya  sariirena jaataa. tenassaa naamaggaha.nadivase ``phussatii''tveva  ^a^V7.0233^ea^ naama.m kari.msu. saa mahantena parivaarena va.d.dhitvaa  so.lasavassakaale uttamaruupadharaa ahosi. atha na.m sivimahaaraajaa  puttassa sa~njayakumaarassa atthaaya aanetvaa tassa chatta.m ussaapetvaa  so.lasanna.m itthisahassaana.m je.t.thika.m katvaa aggamahesi.t.thaane .thapesi. tena  vutta.m --
text.12344: [03] saa sa~njayassa piyaa manaapaa ahosi. atha na.m sakko  aavajjamaano ``mayaa phussatiyaa dinnavaresu nava varaa samiddhaa''ti  disvaa ``eko pana puttavaro na taava samijjhati, tampissaa  samijjhaapessaamii''ti cintesi. tadaa mahaasatto taavati.msadevaloke  vasati, aayu cassa parikkhii.na.m ahosi. ta.m ~natvaa sakko tassa  santika.m gantvaa ``maarisa, tayaa manussaloka.m gantu.m va.t.tati, tattha  sivira~n~no aggamahesiyaa kucchimhi pa.tisandhi.m ga.nhitu.m va.t.tatii''ti  vatvaa tassa ceva a~n~nesa~nca cavanadhammaana.m sa.t.thisahassaana.m devaputtaana.m  pa.ti~n~na.m gahetvaa saka.t.thaanameva gato. mahaasattopi tato cavitvaa  tatthupapanno, sesadevaputtaapi sa.t.thisahassaana.m amaccaana.m gehesu nibbatti.msu.  mahaasatte kucchigate phussatii doha.linii hutvaa catuusu nagaradvaaresu  nagaramajjhe ^a^M7.0248^ea^ raajanivesanadvaare caati chasu .thaanesu  cha daanasaalaayo kaaraapetvaa devasika.m cha satasahassaani vissajjetvaa  mahaadaana.m daatukaamaa ahosi.
text.12345: [03] raajaa tassaa doha.la.m sutvaa nemittake braahma.ne pakkosaapetvaa  pucchi. nemittakaa -- ``mahaaraaja, deviyaa kucchimhi daanaabhirato  satto uppanno, daanena titti.m na gamissatii''ti vadi.msu. ta.m sutvaa  raajaa tu.t.thamaanaso hutvaa cha daanasaalaayo kaaraapetvaa vuttappakaara.m daana.m  pa.t.thapesi. bodhisattassa ^a^P6.0485^ea^ pa.tisandhiggaha.nakaalato  pa.t.thaaya ra~n~no aayassa pamaa.na.m naama naahosi. tassa pu~n~naanubhaavena  sakalajambudiiparaajaano pa.n.naakaara.m pahi.ni.msu. devii mahantena  parivaarena gabbha.m dhaarentii dasamaase paripu.n.ne nagara.m da.t.thukaamaa hutvaa  ra~n~no aarocesi. raajaa nagara.m devanagara.m viya ala"nkaaraapetvaa devi.m  rathavara.m aaropetvaa nagara.m padakkhi.na.m kaaresi. tassaa vessaana.m  viithiyaa vemajjha.m sampattakaale kammajavaataa cali.msu. atha amaccaa  ra~n~no aarocesu.m. ta.m sutvaa vessaviithiya.myeva tassaa suutighara.m  kaaraapetvaa vaasa.m ga.nhaapesi. saa tattha putta.m vijaayi. tena vutta.m --
text.12347: [22] vessaana.m viithiyaa majjhe, janesi phussatii mama''nti..  (cariyaa0 1.76).
text.12348: [03] mahaasatto maatu kucchito nikkhantoyeva visado hutvaa  akkhiini ummiiletvaa nikkhami. nikkhantoyeva ca maatu hattha.m  pasaaretvaa ``amma, daana.m dassaami, atthi ki~nci te dhana''nti aaha.  athassa maataa ``taata, yathaaajjhaasayena daana.m dehii''ti  pasaaritahatthe sahassatthavika.m .thapesi. mahaasatto hi uma"ngajaatake  imasmi.m jaatake pacchimattabhaaveti tiisu .thaanesu jaatamatteyeva maataraa  saddhi.m kathesi. athassa naamaggaha.nadivase vessaviithiya.m jaatattaa  ``vessantaro''ti naama.m kari.msu.
text.12352: [03] jaatadivaseyeva ^a^M7.0249^ea^ panassa ekaa aakaasacaarinii  kare.nukaa abhima"ngalasammata.m sabbaseta.m hatthipotaka.m aanetvaa  ma"ngalahatthi.t.thaane .thapetvaa pakkaami. tassa mahaasatta.m paccaya.m katvaa  uppannattaa ``paccayo''tveva naama.m kari.msu. ta.m divasameva amaccagehesu  sa.t.thisahassakumaarakaa jaayi.msu. raajaa mahaasattassa atidiighaadidose  vivajjetvaa alambathaniyo madhurakhiiraayo catusa.t.thi dhaatiyo upa.t.thaapesi.  tena saddhi.m jaataana~nca sa.t.thidaarakasahassaana.m ekekaa dhaatiyo  upa.t.thaapesi. so sa.t.thisahassehi daarakehi saddhi.m mahantena parivaarena  va.d.dhati. athassa raajaa satasahassagghanaka.m kumaarapi.landhana.m kaaraapesi.  so catuppa~ncavassikakaale ta.m ^a^P6.0486^ea^ omu~ncitvaa  dhaatiina.m datvaa puna taahi diiyamaanampi na ga.nhi. taa ra~n~no  aarocayi.msu. raajaa ta.m sutvaa ``mama puttena dinna.m brahmadeyyameva  hotuu''ti aparampi kaaresi. kumaaro tampi adaasiyeva. iti  daarakakaaleyeva dhaatiina.m nava vaare pi.landhana.m adaasi.
text.12353: [03] a.t.thavassikakaale pana paasaadavaragato sirisayanapi.t.the nisinnova  cintesi ``aha.m baahirakadaanameva demi, ta.m ma.m na paritoseti,  ajjhattikadaana.m daatukaamomhi, sace ma.m koci siisa.m yaaceyya, siisa.m  chinditvaa tassa dadeyya.m. sacepi ma.m koci hadaya.m yaaceyya, ura.m  bhinditvaa hadaya.m niiharitvaa dadeyya.m. sace akkhiini yaaceyya,  akkhiini uppaa.tetvaa dadeyya.m. sace ^a^V7.0235^ea^ sariirama.msa.m yaaceyya,  sakalasariirato ma.msa.m chinditvaa dadeyya.m. sacepi ma.m koci rudhira.m  yaaceyya, rudhira.m gahetvaa dadeyya.m. atha vaapi koci `daaso me  hohii'ti vadeyya, attaanamassa saavetvaa daasa.m katvaa dadeyya''nti.  tasseva.m sabhaava.m cintentassa catunahutaadhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalaa  aya.m mahaapathavii mattavaravaara.no viya gajjamaanaa kampi.  sinerupabbataraajaa suseditavetta"nkuro viya onamitvaa  jetuttaranagaraabhimukho a.t.thaasi. pathavisaddena devaa gajjanto  kha.nikavassa.m vassi, akaalavijjulataa nicchari.msu, saagaro sa"nkhubhi.  sakko devaraajaa appho.tesi, mahaabrahmaa saadhukaaramadaasi.  pathavitalato pa.t.thaaya yaava brahmalokaa ekakolaahala.m ahosi.
text.12356: [22] tadaa nisajja paasaade, daana.m daatu.m vicintayi.m..
text.12358: [22] dadeyya.m kaaya.m saavetvaa, yadi koci yaacaye mama.m..
text.12361: [03] bodhisatto so.lasavassikakaaleyeva sabbasippesu nipphatti.m  paapu.ni. athassa pitaa rajja.m daatukaamo maataraa saddhi.m mantetvaa  maddaraajakulato maatuladhiitara.m maddi.m naama raajaka~n~na.m aanetvaa so.lasanna.m  itthisahassaana.m je.t.thika.m aggamahesi.m katvaa mahaasatta.m rajje abhisi~nci.  mahaasatto rajje pati.t.thitakaalato pa.t.thaaya devasika.m cha satasahassaani  vissajjento mahaadaana.m pavattesi. aparabhaage maddidevii putta.m ^a^P6.0487^ea^  vijaayi. ta.m ka~ncanajaalena sampa.ticchi.msu, tenassa  ``jaaliikumaaro''tveva naama.m kari.msu. tassa padasaa gamanakaale dhiitara.m  vijaayi. ta.m ka.nhaajinena sampa.ticchi.msu, tenassaa  ``ka.nhaajinaa''tveva naama.m kari.msu. mahaasatto maasassa chakkhattu.m  ala"nkatahatthikkhandhavaragato cha daanasaalaayo olokesi. tadaa  kaali"ngara.t.the dubbu.t.thikaa ahosi, sassaani na sampajji.msu, manussaana.m  mahanta.m chaatabhaya.m pavatti. manussaa jiivitu.m asakkontaacorakamma.m  karonti. dubbhikkhapii.litaa jaanapadaa raaja"nga.ne sannipatitvaa raajaana.m  upakkosi.msu ^a^V7.0236^ea^. ta.m sutvaa ra~n~naa ``ki.m, taataa''ti vutte  tamattha.m aarocayi.msu. raajaa ``saadhu, taataa, deva.m vassaapessaamii''ti  te uyyojetvaa samaadinnasiilo uposathavaasa.m vasantopi deva.m vassaapetu.m  naasakkhi. so naagare sannipaatetvaa ``aha.m samaadinnasiilo sattaaha.m  uposathavaasa.m vasantopi deva.m vassaapetu.m naasakkhi.m, ki.m nu kho  kaatabba''nti pucchi. sace, deva, deva.m vassaapetu.m na sakkosi, esa  jetuttaranagare sa~njayassa ra~n~no putto vessantaro naama daanaabhirato.  tassa.m kira sabbaseto ma"ngalahatthii atthi, tassa gatagata.t.thaane ^a^M7.0251^ea^  devo vassi. braahma.ne pesetvaa ta.m hatthi.m yaacaapetu.m va.t.tati,  aa.naapethaati.
text.12362: [03] so ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa braahma.ne sannipaatetvaa tesu  gu.nava.n.nasampanne a.t.tha jane vicinitvaa tesa.m paribbaya.m datvaa ``gacchatha,  tumhe vessantara.m hatthi.m yaacitvaa aanethaa''ti pesesi. braahma.naa  anupubbena jetuttaranagara.m gantvaa daanagge bhatta.m paribhu~njitvaa attano  sariira.m rajopariki.n.na.m pa.msumakkhita.m katvaa pu.n.namadivase raajaana.m hatthi.m  yaacitukaamaa hutvaa ra~n~no daanagga.m aagamanakaale paaciinadvaara.m agama.msu.  raajaapi ``daanagga.m olokessaamii''ti paatova nhatvaa  naanaggarasabhojana.m bhu~njitvaa ala"nkaritvaa ala"nkatahatthikkhandhavaragato  paaciinadvaara.m agamaasi. braahma.naa tatthokaasa.m alabhitvaa dakkhi.nadvaara.m  gantvaa unnatapadese .thatvaa ra~n~no paaciinadvaare daanagga.m oloketvaa  dakkhi.nadvaaraagamanakaale hatthe pasaaretvaa ``jayatu bhava.m vessantaro''ti  tikkhattu.m aaha.msu. mahaasatto te braahma.ne disvaa hatthi.m tesa.m .thita.t.thaana.m  pesetvaa hatthikkhandhe nisinno pa.thama.m gaathamaaha --
text.12365: [22] paggayha dakkhi.na.m baahu.m, ki.m ma.m yaacanti braahma.naa''ti..
text.12371: [03] ta.m sutvaa mahaasatto ``aha.m siisa.m aadi.m katvaa ajjhattikadaana.m  daatukaamomhi, ime pana ^a^V7.0237^ea^ ma.m baahirakadaanameva yaacanti,  puuressaami tesa.m manoratha''nti cintetvaa hatthikkhandhavaragato tatiya.m  gaathamaaha --
text.12373: [21] ``dadaami na vikampaami, ya.m ma.m yaacanti braahma.naa.
text.12379: [03] tattha ^b^opavayha^eb^nti raajavaahana.m. ^b^caagaadhimaanaso^eb^ti  caagena adhikamaanaso raajaa. ^b^braahma.naana.m adaa daana^eb^nti so  vaara.nassa anala"nkata.t.thaana.m olokanattha.m tikkhattu.m padakkhi.na.m katvaa  anala"nkata.t.thaana.m adisvaa kusumamissakasugandhodakapuurita.m suva.n.nabhi"ngaara.m  gahetvaa ``ito ethaa''ti vatvaa ala"nkatarajatadaamasadisa.m hatthiso.n.da.m  gahetvaa tesa.m hatthe .thapetvaa udaka.m paatetvaa ala"nkatavaara.na.m braahma.naana.m  adaasi.
text.1238: [21] ``bhavanti mittaani atho na honti, ~naatiisu mittesu  karonti pema.m.
text.12380: [03] tassa catuusu paadesu ala"nkaaro cattaari satasahassaani agghati,  ubhosu passesu ala"nkaaro dve satasahassaani, he.t.thaa udare kambala.m  satasahassa.m, pi.t.thiya.m muttajaala.m ma.nijaala.m ka~ncanajaalanti tii.ni  jaalaani tii.ni satasahassaani, ubhosu ka.n.nesu ala"nkaaro dve  satasahassaani, pi.t.thiya.m atthara.nakambala.m satasahassa.m, kumbhaala"nkaaro  satasahassa.m, tayo va.ta.msakaa tii.ni satasahassaani, ka.n.nacuu.laala"nkaaro dve  satasahassaani, dvinna.m dantaana.m ala"nkaaro dve satasahassaani, so.n.daaya  sovatthikaala"nkaaro satasahassa.m, na"ngu.t.thaala"nkaaro satasahassa.m,  aaroha.nanisse.ni satasahassa.m, bhu~njanaka.taaha.m satasahassa.m, .thapetvaa anaggha.m  bha.n.da.m kaayaaru.lhapasaadhana.m dvaaviisati satasahassaani ^a^P6.0489^ea^.  eva.m taava ettaka.m dhana.m catuviisatisatasahassaani agghati.  chattapi.n.diya.m pana ma.ni, cuu.laama.ni, muttaahaare ma.ni, a"nkuse ma.ni,  hatthika.n.the ve.thanamuttaahaare ma.ni, hatthikumbhe ma.niiti imaani cha  anagghaani, hatthiipi anagghoyevaati hatthinaa saddhi.m satta anagghaaniiti  sabbaani taani braahma.naana.m adaasi. tathaa hatthino paricaarakaani  pa~nca kulasataani hatthime.n.dahatthigopakehi saddhi.m adaasi. saha  daanenevassa he.t.thaa vuttanayeneva bhuumikampaadayo ahesu.m. tamattha.m  pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.12388: [21] ``samaakula.m pura.m aasi, ghoso ca vipulo mahaa.
text.1239: [22] aya~nca jammo kissa vaa nivi.t.tho, yo neva jaanaati  `kutomhi aagato'..
text.12390: [03] tattha ^b^tadaasii^eb^ti tadaa aasi. ^b^hatthinaage^eb^ti  hatthisa"nkhaate naage. ^b^khubhittha nagara.m tadaa^eb^ti tadaa jetuttaranagara.m  sa"nkhubhita.m ahosi.
text.12391: [03] braahma.naa kira dakkhi.nadvaare hatthi.m labhitvaa hatthipi.t.the  nisiiditvaa mahaajanaparivaaraa nagaramajjhena paayi.msu. mahaajano te  disvaa ``ambho braahma.naa, amhaaka.m hatthi.m aaru.lhaa kuto vo hatthii  laddhaa''ti aaha. braahma.naa ``vessantaramahaaraajena no hatthii dinno,  ke tumhe''ti mahaajana.m hatthavikaaraadiihi gha.t.tentaa nagaramajjhena gantvaa  uttaradvaarena nikkhami.msu. naagaraa devataava.t.tanena bodhisattassa kuddhaa  raajadvaare sannipatitvaa mahanta.m upakkosamaka.msu. tena vutta.m --
text.12392: [21] ``samaakula.m pura.m aasi, ghoso ca vipulo mahaa.
text.12398: [03] tattha ^b^ghoso^eb^ti upakkosanasaddo pattha.tattaa ^b^vipulo,^eb^  uddha.m gatattaa ^b^mahaa. siviina.m ra.t.thava.d.dhane^eb^ti sivira.t.thassa vuddhikare.
text.12399: [03] athassa ^a^V7.0239^ea^ ^a^P6.0490^ea^ daanena  sa"nkhubhitacittaa hutvaa nagaravaasino ra~n~no aarocesu.m. tena vutta.m --
text.12401: [21] ``uggaa ^a^M7.0254^ea^ ca raajaputtaa ca,  vesiyaanaa ca braahma.naa.
text.12405: [22] disvaa naaga.m niiyamaana.m, te ra~n~no pa.tivedayu.m..
text.12407: [21] ``vidhama.m deva te ra.t.tha.m, putto vessantaro tava.
text.12408: [22] katha.m no hatthina.m dajjaa, naaga.m ra.t.thassa puujita.m..
text.12418: [03] tattha ^b^uggaa^eb^ti uggataa pa~n~naataa. ^b^nigamo^eb^ti  negamaku.tumbikajano. ^b^vidhama.m deva te ra.t.tha^eb^nti deva, tava ra.t.tha.m  vidhama.m. ^b^katha.m no hatthina.m dajjaa^eb^ti kena kaara.nena amhaaka.m  hatthina.m abhima"ngalasammata.m kaali"ngara.t.thavaasiina.m braahma.naana.m dadeyya.  ^b^khetta~n~nu.m sabbayuddhaana^eb^nti sabbayuddhaana.m khettabhuumisiisajaananasamattha.m.  ^b^danti^eb^nti manoramadantayutta.m. ^b^savaalabiijani^eb^nti  sahavaalabiijani.m. ^b^saupaadheyya^eb^nti saatthara.na.m.  ^b^saathabbana^eb^nti sahatthivejja.m. ^b^sahatthipa^eb^nti  hatthiparicaarakaana.m pa~ncanna.m kulasataana.m hatthime.n.dahatthigopakaana~nca vasena  sahatthipa.m.
text.12422: [22] eta.m kho daana.m patiruupa.m, eta.m kho braahma.naaraha.m..
text.12425: [22] katha.m vessantaro putto, gaja.m bhaajeti sa~njaya..
text.12427: [21] ``sace ^a^M7.0255^ea^ tva.m na karissasi, siviina.m  vacana.m ida.m.
text.12428: [22] ma~n~ne ta.m saha puttena, sivii hatthe karissare''ti..
text.12429: [03] tattha ^b^va.msaraajaa^eb^ti pave.niyaa aagato mahaaraajaa.  ^b^bhaajetii^eb^ti deti. ^b^sivii hatthe karissare^eb^ti  sivira.t.thavaasino saha puttena ta.m attano hatthe karissantiiti.
text.12430: [03] ta.m ^a^P6.0491^ea^ sutvaa raajaa ``ete vessantara.m maaraapetu.m  icchantii''ti sa~n~naaya aaha --
text.12434: [22] pabbaajeyya.m sakaa ra.t.thaa, putto hi mama oraso..
text.12438: [22] pabbaajeyya.m sakaa ra.t.thaa, putto hi mama atrajo..
text.1244: [21] ``sace tuva.m dakkhasi brahmacaari.m, sace tuva.m sallape  brahmacaarinaa.
text.12440: [21] ``na caaha.m tasmi.m dubbheyya.m, ariyasiilavato hi so.
text.12441: [27] asilokopi me assa, paapa~nca pasave bahu.m.
text.12443: [03] tattha ^b^maasii^eb^ti maa aasi, maa hotuuti attho.  ^b^ariyasiilavato^eb^ti ariyena siilavatena ariyaaya ca  aacaarasampattiyaa samannaagato. ^b^ghaatayaamase^eb^ti ghaatayissaama.
text.12446: [21] ``maa ^a^V7.0241^ea^ na.m da.n.dena satthena, na hi so  bandhanaaraho.
text.12447: [22] pabbaajehi ca na.m ra.t.thaa, va"nke vasatu pabbate''ti..
text.12448: [03] tattha ^b^maa na.m da.n.dena satthenaa^eb^ti deva, tumhe ta.m da.n.dena vaa  satthena vaa maa ghaatayittha. ^b^na hi so bandhanaaraho^eb^ti so  bandhanaarahopi na hotiyeva.

text.1315: [03] tattha ^b^pu.n.namaase^eb^ti pu.n.nacandaaya rattiyaa.  ^b^migamandalocanaa^eb^ti ka.n.dasantaasena palaayitvaa vanantare .thatvaa  ludda.m olokentiyaa migiyaa viya mandaani ^a^M5.0227^ea^  locanaani assaati migamandalocanaa. ^b^upaavisii^eb^ti  padumava.n.nena karatalena pupphaani khipitvaa ma.m olokentii vaatapaane  nisiidi. ^b^pu.n.dariikattaca"ngii^eb^ti rattapadumava.n.nasariiraa. ^b^dve  pu.n.namaayo^eb^ti aha.m tadahu tasmi.m cha.nadivase ta.m  paaraavatapaadasamaanava.n.narattavatthanivattha.m disvaa tassaa mukhasobha.m  olokento ekassa paaciinalokadhaatuto ekassa abhipaarakassa  senaapatino nivesaneti dvinna.m pu.n.nacandaana.m uggatattaa dve pu.n.namaayo  ama~n~ni.m. ^b^a.laarapamhehii^eb^ti visaalapakhumehi. ^b^subhehii^eb^ti  parisuddhehi. ^b^vaggubhii^eb^ti madhuraakaarehi. ^b^udikkhatii^eb^ti  evaruupehi nettehi yasmi.m kha.ne oloketi. ^b^pabbate^eb^ti yathaa  himavantapabbate supupphitavane vii.na.m aadaaya tantissarena attano sara.m  sa.msandantii kimpurisii kimpurisassa mana.m harati, eva.m harateva me  manoti vippalapati.
text.13150: [22] atho pitaa arogo me, siviina~nca anaamaya.m..
text.1316: [03] ^b^brahatii^eb^ti u.laaraa. ^b^saamaa^eb^ti suva.n.nava.n.nasaamaa.  ^b^ekaccavasanaa^eb^ti ekaccikavasanaa, ekavatthanivatthaati attho.  ^b^bhantaavudikkhatii^eb^ti sa.nhakesaa puthunalaa.taa aayatabhamuu visaalakkhii  tu"nganaasaa ratto.t.thaa setadantaa tikhi.nadaa.thaa suva.t.titagiivaa sutanubaahu  susa.n.thitapayodharaa karamitamajjhaa visaalaso.nii suva.n.nakadalisamaanoru  saa uttamitthii tasmi.m kha.ne ma.m udikkhantii bhayena vana.m pavisitvaa  puna nivattitvaa ludda.m udikkhantii bhantaa migiiva ma.m udikkhatiiti  vadati. ^b^baahaamuduu^eb^ti mudubaahaa. ^b^sannatadhiirakuttiyaa^eb^ti  suphusitachekakara.naa. ^b^upa~n~nissati^eb^ ^a^V5.0205^ea^ ^b^ma^eb^nti saa subhaa naarii kadaa  nu ma.m tehi tambanakhehi siisato pa.t.thaaya sannatena dhiirena kara.nena  paritosessatiiti patthento vilapati.

text.13164: [03] tattha ^b^tasmi.m me^eb^ti tasmi.m kaara.ne mayha.m sivayo kuddhaa.  ^b^upahatomano^eb^ti upahatacitto kuddhova ^a^V7.0275^ea^ ma.m ra.t.thaa  pabbaajesi. ^b^yatthaa^eb^ti yasmi.m vane maya.m vaseyyaama, tattha  vasanokaasa.m jaanaathaati.
text.1317: [03] ^b^ka~ncanajaaluracchadaa^eb^ti ka~ncanamayauracchadaala"nkaaraa.  ^b^vilaggamajjhaa^eb^ti vilaggasariiraa tanumajjhimaa. ^b^brahaavane^eb^ti  mahaavane. ^b^laakhaarasarattasucchavii^eb^ti  hatthapaadatalaagganakhao.t.thama.msesu laakhaarasarattama.nipavaalava.n.naa.  ^b^bindutthanii^eb^ti udakapupphu.laparima.n.dalatthanii. ^b^tato^eb^ti yadaa  ta.m ti.t.thanti.m addasa.m, tato pa.t.thaaya. ^b^sakassa cittassaa^eb^ti attano  cittassa anissaro jaatomhiiti adhippaayo. ^b^ka~ncina^eb^nti  ka~nci ``aya.m asuko naamaa''ti na jaanaami, ummattako jaatomhiiti  vadati. ^b^da.t.thaa^eb^ti disvaa. ^b^na supaamii^eb^ti neva ratti.m, na  divaa nidda.m labhaami. ^b^so ca labbhethaa^eb^ti ya.m me sakko vara.m  dadeyya, so ca me varo labbhetha, labheyyaaha.m ta.m varanti attho.

text.13178: [03] tattha ^a^M7.0287^ea^ ^b^pa.tiggahita^eb^nti sabbameta.m tumhehi  dinna.m mayaa ca pa.tiggahitameva hotu, sabbassa tumhehi mayha.m agghiya.m  nivedana.m kata.m. raajaa pana ma.m avaruddhasi ra.t.thaa pabbaajesi, tasmaa  va"nkameva gamissaami, tasmi.m me ara~n~ne vasana.t.thaana.m jaanaathaati.
text.1318: [03] atha ^a^M5.0228^ea^ te amaccaa abhipaarakassapi  aarocayi.msu -- ``saami raajaa, nagara.m padakkhi.na.m karonto tumhaaka.m  gharadvaara.m patvaa nivattitvaa ^a^P5.0217^ea^ paasaada.m abhiruhii''ti.  so attano geha.m gantvaa ummaadanti.m aamantetvaa ``bhadde, kacci  ra~n~no attaana.m dassesii''ti pucchi. ``saami, eko mahodaro  mahaadaa.thiko rathe .thatvaa aagato puriso atthi, aha.m ta.m raajaa vaa  araajaa vaati na jaanaami, eko issaroti pana vutte vaatapaane .thatvaa  pupphaani khipi.m, so taavadeva nivattitvaa gato''ti. so ta.m sutvaa  ``naasitomhi tayaa''ti punadivase paatova raajanivesana.m aaruyha  sirigabbhadvaare .thatvaa ra~n~no ummaadanti.m nissaaya vippalaapa.m sutvaa  ``aya.m ummaadantiyaa pa.tibaddhacitto jaato, ta.m alabhanto marissati,  ra~n~no ca mama ca agu.na.m mocetvaa imassa mayaa jiivita.m daatu.m  va.t.tatii''ti attano nivesana.m gantvaa eka.m da.lhamanta.m upa.t.thaaka.m  pakkosaapetvaa, ``taata, asuka.t.thaane susiracetiyarukkho atthi, tva.m  ka~nci ajaanaapetvaa attha"ngate suuriye tattha gantvaa antorukkhe  nisiida, aha.m tattha balikamma.m karonto ta.m .thaana.m patvaa devataa  namassanto, `saami devaraaja, amhaaka.m raajaa nagaramhi cha.ne vattamaane  akii.litvaa sirigabbha.m pavisitvaa vippalapantova nipanno, maya.m tattha  kaara.na.m na jaanaama, raajaa devataana.m bahuupakaaro, anusa.mvacchara.m sahassa.m  vissajjetvaa balikamma.m karoti, ida.m naama nissaaya raajaa  vippalapatiiti aacikkhatha, ra~n~no no jiivitadaana.m dethaa'ti  yaacissaami, tva.m tasmi.m kha.ne sadda.m parivattitvaa, `senaapati, tumhaaka.m  ra~n~no byaadhi naama natthi, so pana tava bhariyaaya ummaadantiyaa  pa.tibaddhacitto. sace na.m labhissati, jiivissati, no ce, marissati.  sace ^a^V5.0206^ea^ tassa jiivita.m icchasi, ummaadantimassa dehii'ti  vadeyyaasii''ti eva.m ta.m ugga.nhaapetvaa uyyojesi.

text.1319: [03] so gantvaa tasmi.m rukkhe nisiiditvaa punadivase senaapatinaa  amaccaga.naparivutena ta.m .thaana.m gantvaa yaacito tathaa abhaasi. senaapati  ``saadhuu''ti vatvaa devata.m vanditvaa amacce jaanaapetvaa nagara.m  pavisitvaa raajanivesana.m aaruyha sirigabbhadvaara.m aako.tesi. raajaa  sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa ^a^P5.0218^ea^ ``ko eso''ti pucchi. aha.m,  deva, abhipaarakoti. athassa raajaa dvaara.m vivari. so pavisitvaa  raajaana.m vanditvaa gaathamaaha --

text.13222: [03] eva.m mahaasatto anekapariyaayena yaacitopi rajja.m na icchi.  athassa te cetaraajaano mahanta.m sakkaara.m kari.msu. so nagara.m pavisitu.m  na icchi. atha na.m saalameva ala"nkaritvaa saa.niyaa parikkhepa.m katvaa  mahaasayana.m pa~n~naapetvaa sabbe aarakkha.m kari.msu. so ekaratti.m tehi  sa"ngahitaarakkho saalaaya.m sayitvaa punadivase paatova nhatvaa  naanaggarasabhojana.m bhu~njitvaa tehi parivuto nikkhami. sa.t.thisahassaa  khattiyaa tena saddhi.m pannarasayojanamagga.m gantvaa ^a^P6.0518^ea^  vanadvaare .thatvaa purato pannarasayojanamagga.m aacikkhantaa aaha.msu --
text.13228: [22] yattha tva.m saha puttehi, saha bhariyaaya cacchasi..

text.13266: [03] tattha ^b^raajisii^eb^ti raajaano hutvaa pabbajitaa.  ^b^samaahitaa^eb^ti ekaggacittaa. ^b^esaa^eb^ti dakkhi.nahattha.m  ukkhipitvaa iminaa pabbatapaadena gacchathaati aacikkhantaa vadanti.  ^b^acchasii^eb^ti ^a^P6.0519^ea^ vasissasi. ^b^aapaga^eb^nti  udakavaahanadiaava.t.ta.m. ^b^girigabbhara^eb^nti giriina.m kucchito pavatta.m.  ^b^madhupipphala^eb^nti madhuraphala.m. ^b^rammake^eb^ti rama.niiye.  ^b^kimpurisaayuta^eb^nti kimpurisehi aayuta.m pariki.n.na.m.  ^b^setasogandhiikehi caa^eb^ti naanappakaarehi setuppalehi ceva  sogandhikehi ca sa~nchanno. ^b^siihovaamisapekkhiivaa^eb^ti aamisa.m  pekkhanto siiho viya.
text.13267: [03] ^b^bindussaraa^eb^ti sampi.n.ditassaraa. ^b^vagguu^eb^ti  madhurassaraa. ^b^kuujantamupakuujantii^eb^ti pa.thama.m kuujamaana.m pakkhi.m  pacchaa upakuujanti. ^b^utusa.mpupphite dume^eb^ti utusamaye pupphite dume  niliiyitvaa kuujanta.m upakuujanti. ^b^so dakkhisii^eb^ti so tva.m  passissasiiti attho. ^b^kara~njakakudhaayuta^eb^nti kara~njarukkhehi ca  kakudharukkhehi ca sampariki.n.na.m. ^b^appa.tigandhiya^eb^nti  pa.tikuulagandhavirahita.m madhurodakapariki.n.na.mnaanappakaarapadumuppalaadiihi  sa~nchanna.m. ^b^pa.n.nasaala.m amaapayaa^eb^ti pa.n.nasaala.m maapeyyaasi.  ^b^amaapetvaa^eb^ti maapetvaa. ^b^u~nchaacariyaaya iihathaa^eb^ti atha  tumhe, deva, u~nchaacariyaaya yaapentaa appamattaa iihatha, aaraddhaviiriyaa  hutvaa vihareyyaathaati attho.
text.13268: [01] eva.m te raajaano tassa pannarasayojanamagga.m aacikkhitvaa  ta.m uyyojetvaa vessantarassa antaraayabhayassa vinodanattha.m ``maa  kocideva paccaamitto okaasa.m labheyyaa''ti cintetvaa eka.m byatta.m  susikkhita.m cetaputta.m aamantetvaa ``tva.m gacchante ca aagacchante ca  parigga.nhaahii''ti vanadvaare aarakkha.natthaaya .thapetvaa sakanagara.m gami.msu.  vessantaropi saputtadaaro gandhamaadanapabbata.m patvaa, ta.m divasa.m tattha  vasitvaa tato uttaraabhimukho vepullapabbatapaadena gantvaa, ketumatiyaa  naama nadiyaa tiire nisiiditvaa vanacarakena dinna.m madhuma.msa.m khaaditvaa  tassa suva.n.nasuuci.m datvaa ^a^M7.0291^ea^ tattha ^a^V7.0280^ea^ nhatvaa  pivitvaa pa.tippassaddhadaratho nadito uttaritvaa saanupabbatasikhare  .thitassa nigrodhassa muule thoka.m nisiiditvaa nigrodhaphalaani khaaditvaa  u.t.thaaya gacchanto naa.lika.m naama pabbata.m patvaa ta.m pariharanto  mucalindasara.m gantvaa sarassa tiirena pubbuttaraka.n.na.m patvaa,  ekapadikamaggena vanagha.ta.m pavisitvaa ta.m atikkamma girividuggaana.m  nadippabhavaana.m purato catura.msapokkhara.ni.m paapu.ni.
text.13269: [01] tasmi.m kha.ne sakko aavajjento ``mahaasatto himavanta.m  pavi.t.tho''ti ~natvaa ``tassa vasana.t.thaana.m laddhu.m va.t.tatii''ti cintetvaa  vissakamma.m ^a^P6.0520^ea^ pakkosaapetvaa ``gaccha, taata, tva.m  va"nkapabbatakujhacchimhi rama.niiye .thaane assamapada.m maapetvaa ehii''ti  pesesi. so ``saadhu, devaa''ti devalokato otaritvaa tattha dve  pa.n.nasaalaayo dve ca"nkame ratti.t.thaanadivaa.t.thaanaani ca maapetvaa  ca"nkamako.tiya.m tesu tesu .thaanesu naanaaphaladhare rukkhe ca kadalivanaani  ca dassetvaa sabbe pabbajitaparikkhaare pa.tiyaadetvaa ``ye keci  pabbajitukaamaa, te ime ga.nhantuu''ti akkharaani likhitvaa amanusse  ca bheravasadde migapakkhino ca pa.tikkamaapetvaa saka.t.thaanameva gato.
text.1327: [22] bhuso ca tyassa manaso vighaato, datvaa piya.m  ummadanti.m ada.t.thaa''ti..
text.13270: [03] mahaasatto ekapadikamagga.m disvaa ``pabbajitaana.m vasana.t.thaana.m  bhavissatii''ti maddi~nca putte ca assamapadadvaare .thapetvaa assamapada.m  pavisitvaa akkharaani oloketvaa ``sakkenamhi di.t.tho''ti ~natvaa  pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa khagga~nca dhanu~nca apanetvaa saa.take omu~ncitvaa  rattavaakaciira.m nivaasetvaa ajinacamma.m a.mse katvaa ja.taama.n.dala.m bandhitvaa  isivesa.m gahetvaa kattarada.n.da.m aadaaya pa.n.nasaalato nikkhamitvaa  pabbajitasiri.m samubbahanto ``aho sukha.m, aho sukha.m, pabbajjaa me  adhigataa''ti udaana.m udaanetvaa ca"nkama.m aaruyha aparaapara.m ca"nkamitvaa  paccekabuddhasadisena upasamena puttadaaraana.m santika.m agamaasi. maddiipi  mahaasattassa paadesu patitvaa roditvaa teneva saddhi.m assamapada.m  pavisitvaa attano pa.n.nasaala.m gantvaa isivesa.m ga.nhi. pacchaa puttepi  taapasakumaarake kari.msu. cattaaro khattiyaa va"nkapabbatakucchimhi vasi.msu.  atha maddii mahaasatta.m vara.m yaaci ``deva, tumhe phalaaphalatthaaya vana.m  agantvaa putte gahetvaa idheva hotha, aha.m phalaaphala.m aaharissaamii''ti.  tato pa.t.thaaya saa ara~n~nato phalaaphalaani aaharitvaa tayo jane  pa.tijaggati.
text.13271: [03] bodhisattopi ^a^M7.0292^ea^ ta.m vara.m yaaci ``bhadde, maddi  maya.m ito pa.t.thaaya pabbajitaa naama, itthii ca naama brahmacariyassa mala.m,  ito pa.t.thaaya akaale mama santika.m maa aagacchaahii''ti. saa  ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchi. mahaasattassa mettaanubhaavena samantaa  tiyojane sabbe tiracchaanaapi a~n~nama~n~na.m ^a^V7.0281^ea^ mettacitta.m  pa.tilabhi.msu. maddiideviipi paatova u.t.thaaya paaniiyaparibhojaniiya.m  upa.t.thaapetvaa mukhodaka.m aaharitvaa dantaka.t.tha.m datvaa assamapada.m sammajjitvaa  dve putte pitu santike .thapetvaa pacchikha.nittia"nkusahatthaa ara~n~na.m  ^a^P6.0521^ea^ pavisitvaa vanamuulaphalaaphalaani aadaaya pacchi.m  puuretvaa saayanhasamaye ara~n~nato aagantvaa pa.n.nasaalaaya phalaaphala.m  .thapetvaa nhatvaa putte nhaapesi. atha cattaaropi janaa pa.n.nasaalaadvaare  nisiiditvaa phalaaphala.m paribhu~njanti. tato maddii putte gahetvaa attano  pa.n.nasaala.m paavisi. iminaa niyaamena te pabbatakucchimhi satta  maase vasi.msuuti.

text.13890: [03] juujakopi accutataapasena kathitamaggena gacchanto  caturassapokkhara.ni.m patvaa cintesi ``ajja atisaayanho, idaani  maddii ara~n~nato aagamissati. maatugaamo hi naama daanassa  antaraayakaro hoti, sve tassaa ara~n~na.m gatakaale assama.m gantvaa  vessantara.m upasa"nkamitvaa daarake yaacitvaa taaya anaagataaya te ^a^M7.0319^ea^  gahetvaa pakkamissaamii''ti. athassa aviduure eka.m  saanupabbata.m aaruyha ekasmi.m phaasuka.t.thaane nipajji. ta.m pana ratti.m  paccuusakaale maddii supina.m addasa. evaruupo supino ahosi -- eko  puriso ka.nho dve kaasaayaani paridahitvaa dviisu ka.n.nesu rattamaala.m  pi.landhitvaa aavudhahattho tajjento aagantvaa pa.n.nasaala.m pavisitvaa maddi.m  ja.taasu gahetvaa aaka.d.dhitvaa bhuumiya.m uttaanaka.m paatetvaa viravantiyaa  tassaa dve akkhiini uppaa.tetvaa baahaani chinditvaa ura.m bhinditvaa  paggharantalohitabindu.m hadayama.msa.m aadaaya pakkaamiiti. saa pabujjhitvaa  bhiitatasitaa ``paapako supino me di.t.tho, supinapaa.thako pana  vessantarena ^a^V7.0310^ea^ sadiso naama natthi, pucchissaami na''nti  cintetvaa ^a^P6.0541^ea^ pa.n.nasaala.m gantvaa mahaasattassa  pa.n.nasaaladvaara.m aako.tesi. mahaasatto ``ko eso''ti aaha.  ``aha.m deva, maddii''ti. ``bhadde, amhaaka.m katikavatta.m bhinditvaa  kasmaa akaale aagataasii''ti. ``deva, naaha.m kilesavasena  aagacchaami, apica kho pana me paapako supino di.t.tho''ti. ``tena  hi kathehi, maddii''ti. saa attanaa di.t.thaniyaameneva kathesi.
text.13891: [03] mahaasattopi supina.m parigga.nhitvaa ``mayha.m daanapaaramii  puurissati, sve ma.m yaacako aagantvaa putte yaacissati, maddi.m  assaasetvaa uyyojessaamii''ti cintetvaa ``maddi, tava  dussayanadubbhojanehi citta.m aalu.lita.m bhavissati, maa bhaayii''ti  sa.mmohetvaa assaasetvaa uyyojesi. saa vibhaataaya rattiyaa sabba.m  kattabbakicca.m katvaa dve putte aali"ngitvaa siise cumbitvaa ``taataa,  ajja me dussupino di.t.tho, appamattaa bhaveyyaathaa''ti ovaditvaa  ``deva, tumhe dviisu kumaaresu appamattaa hothaa''ti mahaasatta.m putte  pa.ticchaapetvaa pacchikha.nittiaadiini aadaaya assuuni pu~nchantii  muulaphalaaphalatthaaya vana.m paavisi. tadaa juujakopi ``idaani maddii  ara~n~na.m gataa bhavissatii''ti saanupabbataa oruyha ekapadikamaggena  assamaabhimukho paayaasi. mahaasattopi pa.n.nasaalato nikkhamitvaa  pa.n.nasaaladvaare paasaa.naphalake suva.n.napa.timaa viya nisinno ``idaani  yaacako aagamissatii''ti pipaasito viya suraaso.n.do  tassaagamanamagga.m olokentova nisiidi. puttaapissa paadamuule  kii.lanti. so magga.m olokento braahma.na.m aagacchanta.m disvaa satta  maase nikkhitta.m daanadhura.m ukkhipanto viya `ehi, tva.m bho  braahma.naa''ti somanassajaato jaalikumaara.m aamantento ima.m gaathamaaha --
