text.3342: [03] tattha ^b^naaha^eb^nti aha.m, mahaaraaja, kaayikacetasikena dukkhena  phu.t.thopi ta.m na jahaami. ^b^anariyasa.myutte^eb^ti mittadubbhiihi  ahirikehi kattabbataaya anariyabhaavena sa.myutte. ^b^kamme^eb^ti ta.m  jahitvaa pakkamanakamme. ^b^sakumaaro^eb^ti samaanakumaaro,  ekadivaseneva pa.tisandhi.m gahetvaa ekadivase a.n.dakosa.m padaaletvaa  ekato va.d.dhitakumaaroti attho. ^b^sakhaatyasmii^eb^ti aha.m te  dakkhi.nakkhisamo piyasahaayo. ^b^sacitte^eb^ti tava sake citte aha.m  .thito tava vase vattaami, tayi jiivante jiivaami, na jiivante na  jiivaamiiti attho. ``sa.mcitte''tipi paa.tho, tava citte aha.m sa.n.thito  su.t.thu .thitoti attho. ^b^~naato^eb^ti sabbaha.msaana.m antare pa~n~naato.  ^b^vikattissa^eb^nti ``kuhi.m ha.msaraajaa''ti pucchito aha.m kinti  kathessaami. ^b^ki.m te vakkhaamii^eb^ti te tava pavatti.m pucchante  ha.msaga.ne ki.m vakkhaami.
text.3343: [03] eva.m sumukhena catuuhi gaathaahi siihanaade nadite tassa gu.na.m  pakaasento mahaasatto aaha --
text.3345: [21] ``eso hi dhammo sumukha, ya.m tva.m ariyapathe .thito.
text.3346: [22] yo bhattaara.m sakhaara.m ma.m, na pariccattumussahe..
text.3348: [21] ``ta~nhi ^a^V5.0356^ea^ ^a^P5.0361^ea^ me pekkhamaanassa, bhaya.m na  tveva jaayati.
text.3350: [03] tattha ^b^eso dhammo^eb^ti esa poraa.nakapa.n.ditaana.m sabhaavo.  ^b^bhattaara.m sakhaara.m ma^eb^nti saamika~nca sahaaya~nca ma.m. ^b^bhaya^eb^nti  cittutraaso mayha.m na jaayati, cittakuu.tapabbate ha.msaga.namajjhe .thito viya  homi. ^b^mayha^eb^nti mama jiivita.m tva.m labhaapessasi.
text.3351: [03] eva.m ^a^M5.0384^ea^ tesa.m kathentaana~n~neva luddaputto sarapariyante .thito ha.mse tiihi  khandhehi palaayante disvaa ``ki.m nu kho''ti paasa.t.thaana.m olokento  bodhisatta.m paasaya.t.thiya.m olambanta.m disvaa sa~njaatasomanasso kaccha.m  da.lha.m bandhitvaa muggara.m gahetvaa kappu.t.thaanaggi viya avattharamaano  pa.nhiyaa akkantakalale uparisiisena gantvaa purato patante vegena  upasa"nkami. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.3357: [22] a.t.thaasi purato ra~n~no, ha.mso vissaasaya.m byatha.m..
text.3359: [21] ``maa bhaayi patata.m se.t.tha, na hi bhaayanti taadisaa.
text.336: [22] a"ngiirasa.m ^a^P5.0144^ea^ gotama.m he.thayitvaa, khanti.m  tapassi.m cirabrahmacaari.m..
text.3362: [03] tattha ^b^ariyavuttina^eb^nti ariyaacaare vattamaanaana.m.  ^b^bhusa^eb^nti da.lha.m balava.m. ^b^atibruuhayii^eb^ti anantaragaathaaya  aagata.m ``maa bhaayii''ti vacana.m vadanto atibruuhesi mahaasadda.m  nicchaaresi. ^b^a.t.thaasii^eb^ti sace nesaado raajaana.m paharissati, aha.m  pahaara.m sampa.ticchissaamiiti jiivita.m pariccajitvaa purato a.t.thaasi.  ^b^vissaasaya^eb^nti vissaasento assaasento. ^b^byatha^eb^nti  byathita.m bhiita.m raajaana.m ``maa bhaayii''ti iminaa vacanena vissaasento.  ^b^taadisaa^eb^ti tumhaadisaa ~naa.naviiriyasampannaa. ^b^yoga^eb^nti  ~naa.naviiriyayoga.m. ^b^yutta^eb^nti anucchavika.m.  ^b^dhammuupasa~nhita^eb^nti kaara.nanissita.m. ^b^tena pariyaapadaanenaa^eb^ti  tena mayaa payuttena yogena parisuddhena. ^b^pamokkhasii^eb^ti  muccissasi.
text.3363: [03] eva.m ^a^V5.0357^ea^ sumukho mahaasatta.m assaasetvaa luddaputtassa santika.m gantvaa  madhura.m maanusi.m vaaca.m nicchaarento, ``samma, tva.m konaamosii''ti  ^a^P5.0362^ea^ pucchitvaa ``suva.n.nava.n.naha.msaraaja, aha.m khemako  naamaa''ti vutte, ``samma khemaka, `tayaa o.d.ditavaalapaase yo vaa so  vaa ha.mso baddho'ti sa~n~na.m maa kari, navutiyaa ha.msasahassaana.m pavaro  dhatara.t.thaha.msaraajaa te paase ^a^M5.0385^ea^ baddho, ~naa.nasiilaacaarasampanno sa"ngaahakapakkhe  .thito, na ta.m maaretu.m yutto, aha.m tava iminaa kattabbakicca.m karissaami,  ayampi suva.n.nava.n.no, ahampi tatheva, aha.m etassatthaaya attano  jiivita.m pariccajissaami, sace tva.m etassa pattaani ga.nhitukaamosi,  mama pattaani ga.nha, athopi cammama.msanhaarua.t.thiinama~n~natara.m  ga.nhitukaamosi, mameva sariirato ga.nha, atha na.m kii.laaha.msa.m  kaatukaamosi, ma~n~neva kara, jiivantameva vikki.nitvaa sace dhana.m  uppaadetukaamosi, ma.m jiivantameva vikki.nitvaa dhana.m uppaadehi, maa eta.m  ~naa.naadigu.nasa.myutta.m ha.msaraajaana.m avadhi, sace hi na.m vadhissasi,  nirayaadiihi na muccissasii''ti ta.m nirayaadibhayena santajjetvaa attano  madhurakatha.m ga.nhaapetvaa puna bodhisattassa santika.m gantvaa ta.m assaasento  a.t.thaasi. nesaado tassa katha.m sutvaa ``aya.m tiracchaanagato samaano  manussehipi kaatu.m asakku.neyya.m evaruupa.m mittadhamma.m karoti, manussaapi  eva.m mittadhamme .thaatu.m na sakkonti, aho esa ~naa.nasampanno madhurakatho  dhammiko''ti sakalasariira.m piitisomanassaparipu.n.na.m katvaa paha.t.thalomo  da.n.da.m cha.d.detvaa sirasi a~njali.m pati.t.thapetvaa suuriya.m namassanto viya  sumukhassa gu.na.m kittento a.t.thaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.3368: [21] ``na me suta.m vaa di.t.tha.m vaa, bhaasanto maanusi.m dijo.
text.3369: [22] ariya.m bruvaano vakka"ngo, cajanto maanusi.m gira.m..
text.3371: [21] ``ki.m nu taaya.m dijo hoti, mutto baddha.m upaasasi.
text.3372: [22] ohaaya saku.naa yanti, ki.m eko avahiiyasii''ti..
text.3373: [03] tattha ^a^P5.0363^ea^ ^b^a~njalissa pa.naamayii^eb^ti a~njali.m  assa upanaamayi, ``na me''ti gaathaayassa thuti.m karoti. tattha  ^b^maanusi^eb^nti manussavaaca.m. ^b^ariya^eb^nti sundara.m niddosa.m.  ^b^cajanto^eb^ti vissajjento. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- samma, tva.m dijo  samaano ajja mayaa saddhi.m maanusi.m vaaca.m bhaasanto niddosa.m   ^a^V5.0358^ea^ bruvaano maanusi.m gira.m cajanto paccakkhato di.t.tho, ito pubbe pana ida.m  acchariya.m mayaa ^a^M5.0386^ea^ neva suta.m na di.t.thanti. ^b^ki.m nu taaya^eb^nti ya.m  eta.m tva.m upaasasi, ki.m nu te aya.m hoti.
text.3374: [03] eva.m tu.t.thacittena nesaadena pu.t.tho sumukho ``aya.m muduko jaato,  idaanissa bhiyyosomattaaya mudubhaavattha.m mama gu.na.m dassesaamii''ti  cintetvaa aaha --
text.3379: [21] ``mahaaga.naaya bhattaa me, maa eko byasana.m agaa.
text.338: [21] ``yo kha.n.daso pabbajita.m achedayi, khanti.m vadanta.m  sama.na.m aduusaka.m.
text.3380: [22] tathaa ta.m samma nesaada, bhattaaya.m abhito rame''ti..
text.3381: [03] tattha ^b^nussahe^eb^ti na samatthomhi. ^b^mahaaga.naayaa^eb^ti  mahato ha.msaga.nassa. ^b^maa eko^eb^ti maadise sevake vijjamaane maa  ekako byasana.m agaa. ^b^tathaa ta^eb^nti yathaa aha.m vadaami, tatheva ta.m.  ^b^sammaa^eb^ti vayassa. ^b^bhattaaya.m abhito rame^eb^ti bhattaa aya.m  mama, ahamassa abhito rame santike ramaami na ukka.n.thaamiiti.
text.3382: [03] nesaado ta.m tassa dhammanissita.m madhurakatha.m sutvaa  somanassappatto paha.t.thalomo ``sacaaha.m eta.m siilaadigu.nasa.myutta.m  ha.msaraajaana.m vadhissaami, catuuhi apaayehi na muccissaami, raajaa ma.m  yadicchati, ta.m karotu, ahameta.m sumukhassa daaya.m katvaa  vissajjessaamii''ti cintetvaa gaathamaaha --
text.3385: [22] cajaami te ta.m bhattaara.m, gacchathuubho yathaasukha''nti..
text.3386: [03] tattha ^b^ariyavattasii^eb^ti mittadhammarakkha.nasa"nkhaatena  aacaaraariyaana.m vattena samannaagatosi. ^b^pi.n.damapacaayasii^eb^ti bhattu  santikaa laddha.m pi.n.da.m senaapati.t.thaana.m puujesi. ^b^gacchathuubho^eb^ti dvepi  janaa assumukhe ~naatisa"nghe haasayamaanaa yathaasukha.m gacchathaati.
text.3387: [03] eva.m ^a^V5.0359^ea^ ^a^P5.0364^ea^ vatvaa nesaado muducittena mahaasatta.m  upasa"nkamitvaa ya.t.thi.m onaametvaa pa"nkapi.t.the nisiidaapetvaa paasaya.t.thiyaa  mocetvaa ta.m ukkhipitvaa sarato niiharitvaa taru.nadabbati.napi.t.the  nisiidaapetvaa paade baddhapaasa.m ^a^M5.0387^ea^ sa.nika.m mocetvaa mahaasatte balavasineha.m  paccupa.t.thaapetvaa mettacittena udaka.m aadaaya lohita.m dhovitvaa punappuna.m  parimajji, athassa mettaanubhaavena siraaya siraa, ma.msena ma.msa.m, cammena  camma.m gha.tita.m, paado paakatiko ahosi, itarena nibbiseso.  bodhisatto sukhappatto hutvaa pakatibhaavena nisiidi. sumukho attaana.m  nissaaya ra~n~no sukhitabhaava.m disvaa sa~njaatasomanasso cintesi --  ``iminaa amhaaka.m mahaaupakaaro kato, amhehi etassa kato upakaaro  naama natthi, sace esa raajaraajamahaamattaana.m atthaaya amhe ga.nhi, tesa.m  santika.m netvaa bahu.m dhana.m labhissati, sace attano atthaaya ga.nhi,  amhe vikki.nitvaa dhana.m labhissateva, pucchissaami taava na''nti.  atha na.m upakaara.m kaatukaamataaya pucchanto aaha --
text.339: [22] kalaabuviici.m upapajja paccati, mahaapataapa.m ka.tuka.m bhayaanaka.m..
text.3394: [03] tattha ^b^sace^eb^ti, samma nesaada, sace tayaa attano payogena  attano atthaaya ha.msaana~nceva sesapakkhiina~nca paaso ohito.  ^b^anissaro^eb^ti anissaro hutvaa amhe mu~ncanto yenaasi aa.natto,  tassasantaka.m ga.nhanto theyya.m kayiraasi.
text.3395: [03] ta.m sutvaa nesaado ``naaha.m tumhe attano atthaaya ga.nhi.m,  baaraa.nasira~n~naa pana sa.myamena ga.nhaapitomhii''ti vatvaa deviyaa  di.t.thasupinakaalato pa.t.thaaya yaava ra~n~naa tesa.m aagatabhaava.m sutvaa, ``samma  khemaka, eka.m vaa dve vaa ha.mse ga.nhitu.m vaayama, mahanta.m te yasa.m  dassaamii''ti vatvaa paribbaya.m datvaa uyyojitabhaavo, taava sabba.m  pavatti.m aarocesi. ta.m sutvaa sumukho ``iminaa nesaadena attano  jiivita.m aga.netvaa amhe vissajjentena ^a^P5.0365^ea^ dukkara.m kata.m,  sace maya.m ito cittakuu.ta.m gamissaama, neva dhatara.t.thara~n~no pa~n~naanubhaavo,  na mayha.m mittadhammo paaka.to bhavissati, na luddaputto mahanta.m yasa.m  lacchati, na raajaa pa~ncasu siilesu pati.t.thahissati, na deviyaa  manoratho matthaka.m paapu.nissatii''ti cintetvaa ^a^M5.0388^ea^, ``samma, eva.m sante  amhe vissajjetu.m na ^a^V5.0360^ea^ labhasi, ra~n~no no dassehi, so amhe yathaaruci.m  karissatii''ti imamattha.m pakaasento gaathamaaha --
text.3397: [21] ``yassa tva.m bhatako ra~n~no, kaama.m tasseva paapaya.
text.3399: [03] tattha ^b^tassevaa^eb^ti tasseva santika.m nehi. ^b^tatthaa^eb^ti  tasmi.m raajanivesane. ^b^yathaabhi~n~na^eb^nti yathaadhippaaya.m yathaaruci.m.
text.3400: [03] ta.m sutvaa nesaado ``maa vo bhaddante raajadassana.m ruccittha,  raajaano naama sappa.tibhayaa, kii.laaha.mse vaa vo kareyyu.m maareyyu.m vaa''ti  aaha. atha na.m sumukho, ``samma luddaka maa amhaaka.m cintayi, aha.m  taadisassa kakkha.lassa dhammakathaaya maddava.m janesi.m, ra~n~no ki.m na  janessaami, raajaano hi pa.n.ditaa subhaasitadubbhaasita~n~nu, khippa.m no  ra~n~no santika.m nehi, nayanto ca maa bandhanena nayi, pupphapa~njare pana  nisiidaapetvaa nehi, pupphapa~njara.m karonto dhatara.t.thassa mahanta.m  setapadumasa~nchanna.m, mama khuddaka.m rattapadumasa~nchanna.m katvaa dhatara.t.tha.m purato,  mama.m pacchato niicatara.m katvaa aadaaya khippa.m netvaa ra~n~no dassehii''ti  aaha. so tassa vacana.m sutvaa ``sumukho raajaana.m disvaa mama  mahanta.m yasa.m daatukaamo bhavissatii''ti sa~njaatasomanasso muduuhi  lataahi pa~njare katvaa padumehi chaadetvaa vuttanayeneva te gahetvaa  agamaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.3408: [03] eva.m ^a^M5.0389^ea^ luddassa te aadaaya pakkamanakaale dhatara.t.tho paakaha.msaraajadhiitara.m  attano bhariya.m saritvaa sumukha.m aamantetvaa kilesavasena vilapi.  tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.341: [21] ``etaani ^a^V5.0138^ea^ sutvaa nirayaani pa.n.dito, a~n~naani  paapi.t.thataraani cettha.
text.3416: [03] tattha ^b^bhaayaamii^eb^ti mara.nato bhaayaami. ^b^saamaayaa^eb^ti  suva.n.nava.n.naaya. ^b^lakkha.nuuruyaa^eb^ti lakkha.nasampannauuruyaa.  ^b^vacama~n~naayaa^eb^ti vadha.m jaanitvaa ``mama piyasaamiko maarito''ti  sa~n~nii hutvaa. ^b^vadhissatii^eb^ti ki.m me piyasaamike mate  jiivitenaati marissati. ^b^paakaha.msaa^eb^ti paakaha.msaraajadhiitaa.  ^b^suhemaa^eb^ti eva.mnaamikaa. ^b^hemasuttacaa^eb^ti hemasadisasundaratacaa.  ^b^rucchatii^eb^ti yathaa lo.nisa"nkhaata.m samudda.m otaritvaa mate  patimhi ko~ncii saku.nikaa kapa.naa rodati, eva.m nuuna saa  rodissatiiti.
text.3417: [03] ta.m sutvaa sumukho ``aya.m ha.msaraajaa a~n~ne ovaditu.m yutto  maatugaama.m nissaaya kilesavasena vilapati, udakassa aadittakaalo  viya vatiyaa u.t.thaaya kedaarakhaadanakaalo viya ca jaato, ya.mnuunaaha.m  attano balena maatugaamassa dosa.m pakaasetvaa eta.m sa~n~naapeyya''nti  cintetvaa gaathamaaha --
text.343: [03] tattha ^b^kisa^eb^nti appama.msalohitattaa kisasariira.m.  ^b^avakiriyaa^eb^ti avakiritvaa ni.t.thubhanadantaka.t.thapaatanena tassa sariire  kali.m pavaahetvaa. ^b^ucchinnamuulo^eb^ti ^a^M5.0152^ea^  ucchinnamuulo hutvaa. ^b^sajano^eb^ti sapariso. ^b^kukku.lanaame  nirayamhii^eb^ti yojanasatappamaa.ne kappasa.n.thite u.nhachaarikaniraye.  ^b^phuli"ngaanii^eb^ti viitaccita"ngaaraa. tassa kira tattha u.nhakukku.le  nimuggassa navahi va.namukhehi u.nhaa chaarikaa pavisanti, siise  mahantamahantaa a"ngaaraa patanti. tesa.m pana patanakaale sakalasariira.m  diiparukkho viya jalati, balavavedanaa vattanti. so adhivaasetu.m  asakkonto mahaavirava.m ravati. sarabha"ngasatthaa pathavi.m bhinditvaa ta.m  tattha tathaapaccamaana.m dassesi, mahaajano bhayasantaasamaapajji. tassa  ativiya bhiitabhaava.m ~natvaa mahaasatto ta.m niraya.m antaradhaapesi.
text.3431: [21] ``maayaa ^a^V5.0362^ea^ cetaa mariicii ca, sokaa rogaa cupaddavaa.
text.3432: [27] kharaa ca bandhanaa cetaa, maccupaasaa guhaasayaa.
text.3433: [22] taasu yo vissase poso, so naresu naraadhamo''ti..
text.3434: [03] tattha ^b^mahanto^eb^ti mahanto samaano. ^b^lokassaa^eb^ti  ha.msalokassa. ^b^appameyyo^eb^ti gu.nehi pametu.m asakku.neyyo.  ^b^mahaaga.nii^eb^ti mahantena ga.nena samannaagato ga.nasatthaa.  ^b^ekitthi^eb^nti ya.m evaruupo bhava.m eka.m itthi.m anusoceyya, ida.m  anusocana.m na pa~n~navata.m iva, tenaaha.m ajja ta.m baaloti ma~n~naamiiti  adhippaayenevamaaha.
text.3435: [03] ^b^aadetii^eb^ti ga.nhaati. ^b^chekapaapaka^eb^nti sundaraasundara.m.  ^b^aamakapakka^eb^ti aamaka~nca pakka~nca. ^b^lolo^eb^ti rasalolo.  ida.m vutta.m hoti -- mahaaraaja, yathaa naama vaato padumasaraadiini  paharitvaa sugandhampi sa"nkaara.t.thaanaadiini paharitvaa duggandhampiiti ubhaya.m  chekapaapaka.m gandha.m aadiyati, yathaa ca baalo kumaarako ambajambuuna.m  he.t.thaa nisinno hattha.m pasaaretvaa patitapatita.m aamakampi pakkampi phala.m  gahetvaa khaadati, yathaa ca rasalolo andho bhatte upaniite ya.mki~nci  samakkhikampi nimmakkhikampi aamisa.m aadiyati, eva.m itthiyo  naama kilesavasena a.d.dhampi duggatampi kuliinampi akuliinampi  abhiruupampi viruupampi ga.nhanti bhajanti, taadisaana.m paapadhammaana.m  itthiina.m ki.mkaara.naa vippalapasi, mahaaraajaati.
text.3436: [03] ^b^atthesuu^eb^ti kaara.naakaara.nesu. ^b^mando^eb^ti andhabaalo.  ^b^pa.tibhaasi ma^eb^nti mama upa.t.thaasi. ^b^kaalapariyaaya^eb^nti  evaruupa.m mara.nakaala.m patto ``imasmi.m kaale ida.m kattabba.m, ida.m  nakattabba.m, ida.m vattabba.m, ida.m na vattabba''nti na jaanaasi devaati.  ^b^a.d.dhummatto^eb^ti a.d.dhummattako ma~n~ne hutvaa. ^b^udiiresii^eb^ti  yathaa sura.m pivitvaa naatimatto puriso ya.m vaa ta.m vaa palapati, eva.m  palapasiiti attho. ^b^seyyaa^eb^ti varaa uttamaa.
text.3437: [03] ``maayaa caa''tiaadiisu, deva, itthiyo naametaa va~ncana.t.thena  ^b^maayaa,^eb^ agayhupaga.t.thena ^b^mariicii,^eb^ sokaadiina.m paccayattaa  ^b^sokaa, rogaa,^eb^ anekappakaaraa ^b^upaddavaa,^eb^ kodhaadiihi  thaddhabhaaveneva ^b^kharaa^eb^. taa hi nissaaya ^a^M5.0391^ea^ andubandhanaadiihi  bandhanato ^b^bandhanaa cetaa,^eb^ itthiyo naama sariiraguhaasayavaseneva  maccu naama etaa, devaati. ``kaamahetu, kaamanidaana.m, kaamaadhikara.na.m,  kaamaanameva hetu raajaano cora.m gahetvaa''ti (ma0 ni0 1.168-169)  suttenapesa attho diipetabbo.
text.3438: [03] tato ^a^V5.0363^ea^ ^a^P5.0368^ea^ dhatara.t.tho maatugaame pa.tibaddhacittataaya  ``tva.m maatugaamassa gu.na.m na jaanaasi, pa.n.ditaa eva eta.m jaananti, na  hetaa garahitabbaa''ti diipento aaha --
text.344: [03] ^b^dhamma.m bha.nante^eb^ti dasakusalakammapathadhamma.m bhaasante.  ^b^sama.ne^eb^ti samitapaape. ^b^aduusake^eb^ti niraparaadhe.  ^b^naa.likera^eb^nti eva.mnaamaka.m raajaana.m. ^b^paratthaa^eb^ti paraloke  niraye nibbatta.m. ^b^sa"ngammaa^eb^ti ito cito ca samaagantvaa  chinditvaa mahantamahantaa sunakhaa khaadanti. tasmi.m kira kali"ngara.t.the  dantapuranagare naa.likere naama ra~n~ne rajja.m kaarayamaane eko mahaataapaso  pa~ncasatataapasaparivuto himavantaa aagamma raajuyyaane vaasa.m kappetvaa  mahaajanassa dhamma.m desesi. ``dhammikataapaso uyyaane vasatii''ti  ra~n~nopi aarocayi.msu. raajaa pana adhammiko adhammena rajja.m kaaresi.  so amaccesu taapasa.m pasa.msantesu ``ahampi dhamma.m su.nissaamii''ti  uyyaana.m gantvaa taapasa.m vanditvaa nisiidi. taapaso ra~n~naa saddhi.m  pa.tisanthaara.m karonto ``ki.m, mahaaraaja, dhammena rajja.m kaaresi, jana.m na  pii.lesii''ti aaha. so tassa kujjhitvaa ``aya.m kuu.taja.tilo ettaka.m  kaala.m naagaraana.m santike mama~n~neva agu.na.m kathesi ma~n~ne, hotu  jaanissaamii''ti cintetvaa ``sve amhaaka.m gharadvaara.m aagaccheyyaathaa''ti  nimantetvaa punadivase puraa.naguuthassa caa.tiyo paripuuraapetvaa taapasesu  aagatesu tesa.m bhikkhaabhaajanaani guuthassa puuraapetvaa dvaara.m pidahaapetvaa  musalaani ca lohada.n.de ca gaahaapetvaa ^a^P5.0145^ea^ isiina.m  siisaani bhindaapetvaa ja.taasu gaahaapetvaa ka.d.dhaapetvaa sunakhehi  khaadaapetvaa tattheva bhinna.m pathavi.m pavisitvaa sunakhamahaaniraye  nibbattati, tatrassa tigaavutappamaa.nasariira.m ^a^M5.0153^ea^ ahosi.  atha na.m mahantamahantaa mahaahatthippamaa.naa pa~ncava.n.naa sunakhaa  anubandhitvaa .da.msitvaa navayojanaaya jalitaayapathaviyaa paatetvaa  mukhapuura.m lu~ncantaa vipphandamaana.m khaadi.msu. mahaasatto pathavi.m dvidhaa  bhinditvaa ta.m niraya.m dassetvaa mahaajanassa bhiitabhaava.m ~natvaa  antaradhaapesi.
text.3444: [27] biijaani tyaasu ruuhanti, yadida.m sattaa pajaayare.
text.3445: [22] taasu ko nibbide poso, paa.namaasajja paa.nibhi..
text.3448: [22] tassa tyajja bhaye jaate, bhiite na jaayate mati..
text.345: [03] ^b^athajjuno^eb^ti ^a^V5.0139^ea^ sahassabaahuraajaa. ^b^a"ngiirasa^eb^nti  a"ngehi ra.msiina.m nicchara.nato eva.mladdhanaama.m. ^b^he.thayitvaa^eb^ti  vihe.thetvaa visapiitaka.n.dena vijjhitvaa jiivitakkhaya.m paapetvaa. so  kira ajjuno naama raajaa mahisakara.t.the ketakaraajadhaaniya.m rajja.m kaarento  migava.m gantvaa mige vadhitvaa a"ngaarapakkama.msa.m khaadanto vicari.  athekadivasa.m migaana.m aagamana.t.thaane ko.t.thaka.m katvaa mige olokayamaano  a.t.thaasi. tadaa so taapaso tassa ra~n~no aviduure eka.m kaararukkha.m  abhiruhitvaa phalaani ocinanto ocinitaphalasaakha.m mu~nci. tassaa  vissa.t.thaaya saddena ta.m.thaana.m pattaa migaa palaayi.msu. raajaa kujjhitvaa  taapasa.m visamissitena sallena vijjhi. so parigalitvaa patanto  matthakena khadirakhaa.nuka.m aasaadetvaa suulaggeyeva kaalamakaasi. raajaa  ta"nkha.neyeva dvidhaa bhinna.m pathavi.m pavisitvaa sattisuulaniraye nibbatti,  tigaavutappamaa.na.m sariira.m ahosi. tatra ta.m nirayapaalaa jalitehi  aavudhehi ko.t.tetvaa jalita.m ayapabbata.m aaropenti. pabbatamatthake  .thitakaale vaato paharati, so vaatappahaarena parigalitvaa patati.  tasmi.m kha.ne he.t.thaa navayojanaaya jalitaayapathaviyaa  mahaataalakkhandhappamaa.na.m jalita.m ayasuula.m u.t.thahati. so  suulaggamatthakeyeva aasaadetvaa suulaavuto ti.t.thati. tasmi.m kha.ne pathavii  jalati, suula.m jalati, tassa sariira.m jalati. so tattha mahaarava.m  ravanto paccati. mahaasatto pathavi.m dvidhaa katvaa ta.m niraya.m dassetvaa  mahaajanassa bhiitabhaava.m ~natvaa antaradhaapesi.
text.3450: [21] ``sabbo hi sa.msaya.m patto, bhaya.m bhiiruu titikkhati.
text.3451: [22] pa.n.ditaa ca mahantaano, atthe yu~njanti duyyuje..
text.3456: [21] ``maa no ajja vikanti.msu, ra~n~no suudaa mahaanase.
text.3457: [22] tathaa hi va.n.no pattaana.m, phala.m ve.lu.mva ta.m vadhi..
text.3459: [21] ``muttopi na icchi u.d.detu.m, saya.m bandha.m upaagami.
text.346: [03] ^b^kha.n.daso^eb^ti cattaaro hatthapaade ka.n.nanaasa~nca kha.n.daakha.n.da.m  katvaa. ^b^aduusaka^eb^nti niraparaadha.m. tathaa chedaapetvaa dviihi  kasaahi pahaarasahassehi taa.laapetvaa ja.taasu gahetvaa aaka.d.dhaapetvaa  pa.tikujja.m nipajjaapetvaa ^a^M5.0154^ea^ pi.t.thiya.m pa.nhiyaa paharitvaa  mahaadukkhasamappita.m akaasi. ^b^kalaabuviici^eb^nti kalaabu aviici.m.  ^b^ka.tuka^eb^nti tikhi.navedana.m, evaruupa.m niraya.m upapajjitvaa channa.m  jaalaana.m antare paccati. vitthaarato pana kalaabura~n~no vatthu  ^b^khantivaadijaatake^eb^ (jaa0 1.4.49-52) kathitameva.  ^b^a~n~naani paapi.t.thataraani cetthaa^eb^ti etehi nirayehi paapi.t.thataraani  ca a~n~naani nirayaani sutvaa. ^b^dhamma.m care^eb^ti, sakka devaraaja,  pa.n.dito kulaputto na kevala.m eteyeva cattaaro nirayaa, eteyeva ca  raajaano nerayikaa, atha kho a~n~nepi nirayaa, a~n~nepi ca raajaano  nirayesu uppannaati viditvaa  catupaccayadaanadhammikaarakkhaavara.nasa.mvidhaanasa"nkhaata.m sama.nabraahma.nesu  dhamma.m careyyaati.
text.3460: [22] sopajja sa.msaya.m patto, attha.m ga.nhaahi maa mukha''nti..
text.3461: [03] tattha ^b^ya^eb^nti ya.m maatugaamasa"nkhaata.m vatthu pa~n~naavuddhehi ~naata.m,  tesameva paaka.ta.m, na baalaana.m. ^b^mahaabhuutaa^eb^ti mahaagu.naa mahaanisa.msaa.  ^b^udapajjisu^eb^nti pa.thamakappikakaale ^a^M5.0392^ea^ itthili"ngasseva pa.thama.m  paatubhuutattaa pa.thama.m nibbattaati attho. ^b^tyaasuu^eb^ti sumukha taasu  itthiisu kaayavaciikhi.d.daa ca ^b^pa.nihitaa^eb^ ohitaa .thapitaa,  kaamagu.narati ca pati.t.thitaa. ^b^biijaanii^eb^ti  buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasaavakacakkavattiaadibiijaani ^a^V5.0364^ea^ taasu ruhanti.  ^b^yadida^eb^nti ye ete sabbepi sattaa. ^b^pajaayare^eb^ti sabbe  taasa~n~neva kucchimhi sa.mvaddhaati diipeti. ^b^nibbide^eb^ti  nibbindeyya. ^b^paa.namaasajja paa.nibhii^eb^ti attano paa.nehipi taasa.m  paa.na.m aasaadetvaa attano jiivita.m cajantopi taa labhitvaa ko  nibbindeyyaati attho.
text.3462: [03] ^b^na~n~no^eb^ti na a~n~no, sumukha, mayaa cittakuu.tatale  ha.msaga.namajjhe nisinnena ta.m adisvaa ``kaha.m nu sumukho''ti vutte  ``esa maatugaama.m gahetvaa ka~ncanaguhaaya.m uttamarati.m anubhotii''ti  vadanti, eva.m tvameva thiina.m atthesu ^b^yu~njasi^eb^ yuttapayutto hosi, na  ^a^P5.0369^ea^ a~n~noti attho. ^b^tassa tyajjaa^eb^ti tassa te  ajja mara.nabhaye jaate iminaa bhiitena mara.nabhayena bhiito ma~n~ne, aya.m  maatugaamassa dosadassane nipu.naa mati jaayateti adhippaayenevamaaha.
text.3463: [03] ^b^sabbo hii^eb^ti yo hi koci. ^b^sa.msaya.m patto^eb^ti  jiivitasa.msayappatto. ^b^bhiiruu^eb^ti bhiiruu hutvaapi bhaya.m adhivaaseti.  ^b^mahantaano^eb^ti ye pana pa.n.ditaa ca honti mahante ca .thaane  .thitaa mahantaano, te duyyuje atthe yu~njanti gha.tenti vaayamanti, tasmaa  ``maa bhaayi, dhiiro hohii''ti ta.m ussaahento evamaaha.  ^b^aapada^eb^nti saamino aagata.m aapada.m esa suuro pa.tibaahati,  etadatthaaya suura.m mantina.m icchanti. ^b^attapariyaaya^eb^nti attano  parittaa.nampi ca kaatu.m sakkotiiti adhippaayo.
text.3464: [03] ^b^vikanti.msuu^eb^ti chindi.msu. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- samma  sumukha, tva.m mayaa attano anantare .thaane .thapito, tasmaa yathaa ajja  ra~n~no suudaa amhe ma.msatthaaya na vikanti.msu, tathaa karohi, taadiso  hi amhaaka.m pattava.n.no. ^b^ta.m vadhii^eb^ti svaaya.m va.n.no yathaa naama  ve.lu.m nissaaya jaata.m phala.m ve.lumeva vadhati, tathaa maa ta.m vadhi, ta~nca  ma~nca maa vadhiiti adhippaayenevamaaha.
text.3465: [03] ^b^muttopii^eb^ti ^a^M5.0393^ea^ yathaasukha.m cittakuu.tapabbata.m gacchaati eva.m  luddaputtena mayaa saddhi.m mutto vissajjito samaanopi u.d.ditu.m na icchi.  ^b^saya^eb^nti raajaana.m da.t.thukaamo hutvaa sayameva bandha.m upagatoti  evamida.m amhaaka.m bhaya.m ta.m nissaaya aagata.m. ^b^sopajjaa^eb^ti sopi  ajja jiivitasa.msaya.m patto. ^b^attha.m ga.nhaahi maa mukha^eb^nti idaani  amhaaka.m mu~ncanakaara.na.m ga.nha, yathaa muccaama, tathaa vaayama, ``vaatova  gandhamaadetii''tiaadiini vadanto itthigarahatthaaya mukha.m maa pasaarayi.
text.3466: [03] eva.m ^a^V5.0365^ea^ mahaasatto maatugaama.m va.n.netvaa sumukha.m appa.tibhaa.na.m katvaa  tassa anattamanabhaava.m viditvaa idaani na.m pagga.nhanto gaathamaaha --
text.347: [03] eva.m ^a^P5.0146^ea^ mahaasattena catunna.m raajuuna.m nibbatta.t.thaane  dassite tayo raajaano nikka"nkhaa ahesu.m. tato sakko avasese  cattaaro pa~nhe pucchanto gaathamaaha --
text.3470: [03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ti, samma sumukha, so tva.m. ^b^ta.m yoga^eb^nti  ya.m pubbe ``aha.m yoga.m payu~njissa.m, yutta.m dhammuupasa.mhita''nti avacaasi,  ta.m idaani payu~njassu. ^b^tava pariyaapadaanenaa^eb^ti tava tena yogena  parisuddhena. ``pariyodaatenaa''tipi paa.tho, parittaa.nenaati attho,  tayaa katattaa tava santakena parittaa.nena mama jiivitapariyesana.m caraati  adhippaayo.
text.3471: [03] atha ^a^P5.0370^ea^ sumukho ``aya.m ativiya  mara.nabhayabhiito mama ~naa.nabala.m na jaanaati, raajaana.m disvaa thoka.m katha.m  labhitvaa jaanissaami, assaasessaami taava na''nti cintetvaa  gaathamaaha --
text.3473: [21] ``maa bhaayi patata.m se.t.tha, na hi bhaayanti taadisaa.
text.3477: [01] iti tesa.m saku.nabhaasaaya kathentaana.m luddaputto na ki~nci  a~n~naasi, kevala.m pana te kaajenaadaaya baaraa.nasi.m paavisi.  acchariyabbhutajaatena a~njalinaa mahaajanena anuggacchamaano so  raajadvaara.m patvaa attano aagatabhaava.m ra~n~no aarocaapesi. tamattha.m  pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.3481: [03] tattha ^b^pa.tivedetha ma^eb^nti khemako aagatoti eva.m ma.m ra~n~no  nivedetha. ^b^dhatara.t.thaaya^eb^nti aya.m dhatara.t.tho aagatoti pa.tivedetha.
text.3482: [03] dovaariko ^a^V5.0366^ea^ gantvaa pa.tivedesi. raajaa sa~njaatasomanasso  ``khippa.m aagacchatuu''ti vatvaa amaccaga.naparivuto samussitasetacchatte  raajapalla"nke nisinno khemaka.m ha.msakaaja.m aadaaya mahaatala.m abhiru.lha.m  disvaa suva.n.nava.n.ne ha.mse oloketvaa ``sampu.n.no me manoratho''ti  tassa kattabbakicca.m amacce aa.naapesi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha  --
text.3489: [03] tattha ^b^pu~n~nasa"nkaase^eb^ti attano pu~n~nasadise.  ^b^lakkha.nasammate^eb^ti se.t.thasammate abhi~n~naate. ^b^khaluu^eb^ti  nipaato, tassa ``te khalu disvaa''ti purimapadena sambandho.  ^b^``dethaa''^eb^tiaadiini raajaa pasannaakaara.m karonto aaha. tattha  ^b^kaama.mkaro hira~n~nassaa^eb^ti ^a^P5.0371^ea^ hira~n~na.m assa  kaamakiriyaa atthu. ^b^yaavanto^eb^ti yattaka.m esa icchati, tattaka.m  hira~n~namassa dethaati attho.
text.349: [21] ``subhaasita.m ^a^V5.0140^ea^ te anumodiyaana, a~n~na.m ta.m pucchaami  tadi"ngha bruuhi.
text.3490: [01] eva.m pasannaakaara.m kaaretvaa piitisomanassaasamussahito  ``gacchatha na.m ala"nkaritvaa aanethaa''ti aaha. atha na.m amaccaa  raajanivesanaa otaaretvaa kappitakesamassu.m nhaataanulitta.m  sabbaala"nkaarapa.tima.n.dita.m katvaa ra~n~no dassesu.m. athassa raajaa  sa.mvacchare satasahassu.t.thaanake dvaadasa gaame aaja~n~nayutta.m ratha.m  ala"nkatamahaageha~ncaati mahanta.m yasa.m daapesi. so mahanta.m yasa.m  labhitvaa attano kamma.m pakaasetu.m ``na te, deva, mayaa yo vaa so vaa  ha.mso aaniito, aya.m pana navutiyaa ha.msasahassaana.m raajaa dhatara.t.tho naama,  aya.m senaapati sumukho naamaa''ti aaha ^a^M5.0395^ea^. atha na.m raajaa ``katha.m te,  samma, ete gahitaa''ti pucchi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.3493: [22] yadyaaya.m samma khemaka, pu.n.naa ha.msehi ti.t.thati..
text.3497: [03] tattha ^a^V5.0367^ea^ ^b^pasannatta^eb^nti pasannabhaava.m somanassappatta.m.  ^b^yadyaaya^eb^nti, samma khemaka, yadi aya.m amhaaka.m pokkhara.nii  navutiha.msasahassehi pu.n.naa ti.t.thati. ^b^katha.m rucimajjhagata^eb^nti eva.m  sante tva.m tesa.m ruciina.m piyadassanaana.m ha.msaana.m majjhagata.m eta.m  ~naatisa"nghehi oki.n.na.m. ^b^nimmajjhima^eb^nti neva majjhima.m neva  kani.t.tha.m uttama.m ha.msaraajaana.m katha.m paasahattho upaagami katha.m ga.nhiiti.
text.350: [27] katha.mvidha.m siilavanta.m vadanti, katha.mvidha.m pa~n~navanta.m  vadanti.
text.3504: [22] tatthaaha.m odahi.m paasa.m, eva.m ta.m dijamaggahi''nti..
text.3505: [03] tattha ^a^P5.0372^ea^ ^b^adanaanii^eb^ti aadaanaani,  gocaraggaha.na.t.thaanaaniiti attho, ayameva vaa paa.tho. ^b^upaasato^eb^ti  upagacchantassa. ^b^pada^eb^nti gocarabhuumiya.m akkantapada.m.  ^b^gha.tassito^eb^ti caa.tipa~njare nissito hutvaa. ^b^athassaa^eb^ti  atha cha.t.the divase etassa adanesana.m carantassa pada.m addakkhi.m.  ^b^eva.m ta^eb^nti eva.m ta.m dija.m aggahinti sabba.m gahitopaaya.m  aacikkhi.
text.3506: [03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa ``aya.m dvaare .thatvaa pa.tivedentopi  dhatara.t.thassevaagamana.m pa.tivedesi, idaanipi eta.m ekameva ga.nhinti  vadati, ki.m nu kho ettha kaara.na''nti cintetvaa gaathamaaha --
text.3508: [21] ``ludda dve ime saku.naa, atha ekoti bhaasasi.
text.3509: [22] citta.m nu te vipariyatta.m, adu ki.m nu jigiisasii''ti..
text.351: [22] katha.mvidha.m sappurisa.m vadanti, katha.mvidha.m no siri no  jahaatii''ti..
text.3510: [03] tattha ^a^M5.0396^ea^ ^b^vipariyatta^eb^nti vipallattha.m. ^b^adu ki.m nu  jigiisasii^eb^ti udaahu ki.m nu cintesi, ki.m itara.m gahetvaa a~n~nassa  daatukaamo hutvaa cintesiiti pucchati.
text.3511: [03] tato luddo ``na me, deva, citta.m vipallattha.m, naapi aha.m itara.m  a~n~nassa daatukaamo, apica kho pana mayaa ohite paase ekova  baddho''ti aavi karonto aaha --
text.3514: [22] ura.m sa.mhacca ti.t.thanti, so me bandha.m upaagami..
text.3517: [22] ariya.m bruvaano a.t.thaasi, cajanto maanusi.m gira''nti..
text.3518: [03] tattha ^b^lohitakaa^eb^ti rattava.n.naa. ^b^laataa^eb^ti raajiyo.  ^b^ura.m sa.mhaccaa^eb^ti ura.m aahacca. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- mahaaraaja,  yassetaa rattasuva.n.nasappa.tibhaagaa tisso lohitakaa raajiyo giiva.m  parikkhipitvaa ura.m aahacca ti.t.thanti, so ekova mama paase bandha.m  upaagatoti. ^b^bhassaro^eb^ti parisuddho pabhaasampanno.  ^b^aatura^eb^nti gilaana.m dukkhita.m a.t.thaasiiti.
text.3519: [03] atha dhatara.t.thassa baddhabhaava.m ~natvaa nivattitvaa eta.m samassaasetvaa  mamaagamanakaale ca paccuggamana.m katvaa aakaaseyeva mayaa saddhi.m  madhurapa.tisanthaara.m katvaa manussabhaasaaya dhatara.t.thassa gu.na.m kathento  a.t.thaasi, mama hadaya.m muduka.m ^a^P5.0373^ea^ katvaa puna etasseva  purato a.t.thaasi. athaaha.m, deva, sumukhassa subhaasita.m sutvaa  pasannacitto dhatara.t.tha.m vissajjesi.m, iti dhatara.t.thassa paasato mokkho,  ime ha.mse aadaaya mama idhaagamana~nca sumukheneva katanti. eva.m so  sumukhassa gu.nakatha.m kathesi. ta.m sutvaa raajaa sumukhassa dhammakatha.m  sotukaamo ahosi. luddaputtassa sakkaara.m karontasseva suuriyo  attha"ngato, diipaa pajjalitaa, bahuu khattiyaadayo sannipatitaa, khemaa  deviipi vividhanaa.takaparivaaraa ra~n~no dakkhi.napasse nisiidi. tasmi.m  kha.ne raajaa sumukha.m kathaapetukaamo gaathamaaha --
text.352: [01] tattha ^b^katha.mvidha.m no siri no jahaatii^eb^ti katha.mvidha.m  nu purisa.m pa.tiladdhasirii na jahaatiiti.
text.3521: [21] ``atha ki.m daani sumukha, hanu.m sa.mhacca ti.t.thasi.
text.3522: [22] adu me parisa.m patto, bhayaa bhiito na bhaasasii''ti..
text.3523: [03] tattha ^a^M5.0397^ea^ ^b^hanu.m sa.mhaccaa^eb^ti madhurakatho kira tva.m, atha kasmaa  idaani mukha.m pidhaaya ti.t.thasi. ^b^aduu^eb^ti kacci. ^b^bhayaa  bhiito^eb^ti parisasaarajjabhayena bhiito hutvaa.
text.3524: [03] ta.m sutvaa sumukho abhiitabhaava.m dassento gaathamaaha --
text.3527: [22] naaha.m bhayaa na bhaasissa.m, vaakya.m atthasmi.m taadise''ti..
text.3528: [03] tattha ^b^taadise^eb^ti apica kho pana tathaaruupe atthe uppanne  vaakya.m bhaasissaamiiti vacanokaasa.m olokento nisinnomhiiti attho.
text.3529: [03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa tassa katha.m va.d.dhetukaamataaya parihaasa.m karonto  aaha --
text.353: [03] athassa vissajjento mahaasatto catasso gaathaayo abhaasi --
text.3531: [21] ``na te abhisara.m passe, na rathe napi pattike.
text.3532: [22] naassa camma.mva kii.ta.m vaa, vammite ca dhanuggahe..
text.3534: [21] ``na hira~n~na.m suva.n.na.m vaa, nagara.m vaa sumaapita.m.
text.3536: [22] yattha pavi.t.tho sumukha, bhaayitabba.m na bhaayasii''ti..
text.3537: [03] tattha ^a^V5.0370^ea^ ^b^abhisara^eb^nti rakkha.natthaaya parivaaretvaa .thita.m  aavudhahattha.m parisa.m te na passaami. ^b^naassaa^eb^ti ettha  ^b^assaa^eb^ti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^camma^eb^nti saraparittaa.nacamma.m.  ^b^kii.ta^eb^nti kii.ta.m caa.tikapaalaadi vuccati. caa.tikapaalahatthaapi te  santike natthiiti diipeti. ^b^vammite^eb^ti cammasannaddhe. ^b^na  hira~n~na^eb^nti ya.m nissaaya na bhaayasi, ta.m hira~n~nampi te na passaami.
text.3538: [03] eva.m ^a^P5.0374^ea^ ra~n~naa ``ki.m te abhaayanakaara.na''nti  vutte ta.m kathento aaha --
text.3548: [03] tattha ^b^abhisarenaa^eb^ti aarakkhaparivaarena. ^b^attho^eb^ti  etena mama kicca.m natthi. kasmaa? yasmaa ^b^apathena^eb^  tumhaadisaana.m amaggena patha.m maapetvaa yaama, aakaasacaarino mayanti.  ^b^pa.n.ditaa tyamhaa^eb^ti pa.n.ditaati tayaa sutaamhaa, teneva kaara.nena  amhaaka.m santikaa dhamma.m sotukaamo kira no gaahaapesi. ^b^sacce  cassaa^eb^ti sace pana tva.m sacce pati.t.thito assa, atthavati.m  kaara.nanissita.m vaaca.m bhaaseyyaama. ^b^asaccassaa^eb^ti  vaciisaccarahitassa tava subhaasita.m mu.n.dassa dantasuuci viya ki.m  karissati.
text.3549: [03] ta.m sutvaa raajaa ``kasmaa ma.m musaavaadii anariyoti vadasi,  ki.m mayaa kata''nti aaha. atha na.m sumukho ``tena hi, mahaaraaja,  su.naahii''ti vatvaa aaha --
text.355: [21] ``kaayena vaacaaya ca yodha sa~n~nato, manasaa ca ki~nci  na karoti paapa.m.
text.3552: [22] abhaya~nca tayaa ghu.t.tha.m, imaayo dasadhaa disaa..
text.3555: [22] pahuuta.m caadana.m tattha, ahi.msaa cettha pakkhina.m..
text.3558: [22] te te baddhasma paasena, eta.m te bhaasita.m musaa..
text.356: [22] na attahetuu alika.m bha.neti, tathaavidha.m siilavanta.m vadanti..
text.3562: [03] tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti tva.m. ^b^khema^eb^nti eva.mnaamika.m pokkhara.ni.m.  ^b^ghu.t.tha^eb^nti catuusu ka.n.nesu .thatvaa ghosaapita.m. ^b^dasadhaa^eb^ti  imaasu dasadhaa .thitaasu disaasu tayaa abhaya.m ghu.t.tha.m. ^b^ogayhaa^eb^ti  ogaahetvaa aagataana.m santikaa. ^b^pahuuta.m caadana^eb^nti pahuuta~nca  padumapupphasaaliaadika.m adana.m. ^b^ida.m sutvaanaa^eb^ti ^a^P5.0375^ea^  tesa.m ta.m pokkhara.ni.m ogaahetvaa aagataana.m santikaa ida.m  abhaya.m sutvaa ^b^tavantike^eb^ tava samiipe tayaa kaaritapokkhara.ni.m  aagataamhaati attho. ^b^te te^eb^ti te maya.m tava paasena baddhaa.  ^b^purakkhatvaa^eb^ti purato katvaa ^a^M5.0399^ea^. ^b^icchaalobha^eb^nti  icchaasa"nkhaata.m paapaka.m lobha.m. ^b^ubhosandhi^eb^nti ubhaya.m devaloke ca  manussaloke ca pa.tisandhi.m ime paapadhamme purato katvaa caranto puggalo  sugatipa.tisandhi.m atikkamitvaa asaata.m niraya.m upapajjatiiti.
text.3563: [03] eva.m ^a^V5.0371^ea^ parisamajjheyeva raajaana.m lajjaapesi. atha na.m raajaa  ``naaha.m, sumukha, tumhe maaretvaa ma.msa.m khaaditukaamo ga.nhaapesi.m,  pa.n.ditabhaava.m pana vo sutvaa subhaasita.m sotukaamo ga.nhaapesi''nti  pakaasento aaha --
text.3569: [22] tathaa ta.m samma nesaado, vutto sumukha maggahii''ti..
text.3570: [03] tattha ^b^naaparajjhaamaa^eb^ti maarento aparajjhati naama, maya.m na  maarema. ^b^lobhaava maggahi^eb^nti ma.msa.m khaaditukaamo hutvaa lobhaava  tumhe naaha.m aggahi.m. ^b^pa.n.ditaatyatthaa^eb^ti pa.n.ditaati sutaa attha.  ^b^atthacintakaa^eb^ti pa.ticchannaana.m atthaana.m cintakaa.  ^b^atthavati^eb^nti kaara.nanissita.m. ^b^tathaa^eb^ti tena kaara.nena.  ^b^vutto^eb^ti mayaa vutto hutvaa. ^b^sumukha, maggahii^eb^ti,  sumukhaati aalapati, ^b^ma^eb^-kaaro padasandhikaro. ^b^aggahii^eb^ti  dhamma.m desetu.m tumhe ga.nhi.
text.3571: [01] ta.m sutvaa sumukho ``subhaasita.m sotukaamena ayutta.m te  kata.m, mahaaraajaa''ti vatvaa aaha --
text.3576: [21] ``yo migena miga.m hanti, pakkhi.m vaa pana pakkhinaa.
text.3577: [22] sutena vaa suta.m ki.nyaa, ki.m anariyatara.m tato..
text.3580: [22] ubho so dha.msate lokaa, idha ceva parattha ca..
text.3582: [21] ``na ^a^M5.0400^ea^ majjetha yasa.m patto, na byaadhe pattasa.msaya.m.
text.3586: [22] idha dhamma.m caritvaana, eva.mte tidiva.m gataa..
text.359: [22] kaalaagata.m atthapada.m na ri~ncati, tathaavidha.m pa~n~navanta.m  vadanti..
text.3590: [03] tattha ^b^upaniitasmi^eb^nti mara.nasantika.m upaniite.  ^b^kaalapariyaaya^eb^nti mara.nakaalavaara.m sampattaa samaanaa na bhaasissaama.  na hi dhammakathika.m bandhitvaa mara.nabhayena tajjetvaa dhamma.m su.nanti,  ayutta.m te katanti. ^b^migenaa^eb^ti su.t.thu sikkhaapitena diipakamigena.  ^b^hantii^eb^ti hanati. ^b^pakkhinaa^eb^ti diipakapakkhinaa.  ^b^sutenaa^eb^ti khema.m nibbhayanti vissutena diipakamigapakkhisadisena  padumasarena. ^b^suta^eb^nti ``pa.n.dito citrakathii''ti eva.m suta.m  dhammakathika.m. ^b^ki.nyaa^eb^ti ``dhamma.m sossaamii''ti paasabandhanena  yo ki.neyya hi.mseyya baadheyya. ^b^tato^eb^ti tesa.m kiriyato uttari  a~n~na.m anariyatara.m naama kimatthi.
text.3591: [03] ^b^ariyaruda^eb^nti mukhena ariyavacana.m sundaravacana.m bhaasati.  ^b^anariyadhammavassito^eb^ti kammena anariyadhamma.m avassito.  ^b^ubho^eb^ti devalokaa ca manussalokaa caati ubhayamhaa. ^b^idha  cevaa^eb^ti idha uppannopi parattha uppannopi evaruupo dviihi  sugatilokehi dha.msitvaa nirayameva upapajjati. ^b^pattasa.msaya^eb^nti  jiivitasa.msayamaapannampi dukkha.m patvaa na kilameyya. ^b^sa.mvare  vivaraani caa^eb^ti attano chiddaani dvaaraani sa.mvareyya pidaheyya.  ^b^vuddhaa^eb^ti gu.navuddhaa pa.n.ditaa. ^b^abbhatikkantaa^eb^ti ima.m  manussaloka.m atikkantaa. ^b^kaalapariyaaya^eb^nti mara.nakaalapariyaaya.m  pattaa hutvaa. ^b^eva.mte^eb^ti eva.m ete. ^b^ida^eb^nti ida.m mayaa vutta.m  atthanissita.m vacana.m. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti pave.niyadhammampi  sucaritadhammampi.
text.3598: [22] yo sukhe sukhito ra~n~no, dukkhite hoti dukkhito..
text.3603: [01] ra~n~no vacana.m sutvaa tesa.m aasanaani aaharitvaa tattha  nisinnaana.m gandhodakena paade dhovitvaa satapaakena telena abbha~nji.msu.  tamattha.m ^a^P5.0377^ea^ pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.361: [21] ``yo ve kata~n~nuu katavedi dhiiro, kalyaa.namitto  da.lhabhatti ca hoti.
text.3613: [03] tattha ^b^ma.t.tha^eb^nti kara.naparini.t.thita.m. ^b^kaasikamatthanna^eb^nti  kaasikavatthena atthata.m. ^b^koccha^eb^nti majjhe sa.mkhitta.m.  ^b^veyyagghaparisibbita^eb^nti byagghacammaparisibbita.m ma"ngaladivase  aggamahesiyaa nisinnapii.tha.m. ^b^ka~ncanapattehii^eb^ti suva.n.nabhaajanehi.  ^b^puthuu^eb^ti bahuu janaa. ^b^kaasiyo^eb^ti kaasira.t.thavaasino.  ^b^abhihaaresu^eb^nti upanaamesu.m. ^b^aggara~n~no pavaasita^eb^nti  a.t.thasatapalasuva.n.napaatiparikkhitta.m ha.msara~n~no pa.n.naakaaratthaaya kaasira~n~naa  pesita.m naanaggarasabhojana.m.
text.3614: [03] eva.m upaniite pana tasmi.m kaasiraajaa tesa.m sampaggahattha.m saya.m  suva.n.napaati.m gahetvaa upanaamesi. te tato madhulaaje khaaditvaa  madhurodaka~nca pivi.msu. atha mahaasatto ra~n~no abhihaara~nca pasaada~nca  disvaa pa.tisanthaaramakaasi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.362: [22] dukhitassa sakkacca karoti kicca.m, tathaavidha.m sappurisa.m  vadanti..
text.3625: [21] ``kacci bhoto amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati.
text.3626: [22] kacci ca te tavatthesu, naavaka"nkhanti jiivita.m..
text.3628: [21] ``athopi me amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati.
text.364: [21] ``etehi sabbehi gu.nehupeto, saddho muduu sa.mvibhaagii  vada~n~nuu.
text.365: [22] sa"ngaahaka.m sakhila.m sa.nhavaaca.m, tathaavidha.m no siri no  jahaatii''ti..
text.366: [03] tattha ^a^P5.0147^ea^ ^b^``kaayenaa''^eb^tiaadiini padaani  tividhasucaritadvaaravasena vuttaani. ^b^na attahetuu^eb^ti  desanaasiisameveta.m, attahetu vaa parahetu vaa yasahetu vaa dhanahetu vaa  laabhahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa alika.m na kathetiiti attho.  kaama~ncesa attho ``vaacaaya sa~n~nato''ti iminaava siddho,  musaavaadino pana akattabba.m paapa.m naama natthiiti garubhaavadiipanattha.m puna  evamaahaati veditabbo. ta.m puggala.m siilavanta.m vadanti.
text.3666: [03] tattha ^b^disvaa^eb^ti ta.m bahu.m aggapaanabhojana.m disvaa.  ^b^pesita^eb^nti aaharaapetvaa upaniita.m. ^b^khattadhammaana^eb^nti  pa.thamakaara.nesu pa.tisanthaaradhammaana.m. ^b^tato pucchi anantaraa^eb^ti  tasmi.m kaale ``kacci nu, bhoto''ti anupa.tipaa.tiyaa pucchi. taa  panetaa cha gaathaa he.t.thaa vuttatthaayeva. ^b^anuppii.la^eb^nti kacci  ra.t.thavaasino yante ucchu.m viya na pii.lesiiti pucchati.  ^b^akutociupaddava^eb^nti kutoci anupaddava.m. ^b^dhammena samena  manusaasasii^eb^ti kacci tava ra.t.tha.m dhammena samena anusaasasi.  ^b^santo^eb^ti siilaadigu.nasa.myuttaa sappurisaa. ^b^nira.mkatvaa^eb^ti  cha.d.detvaa. ^b^naanaagata.m diigha^eb^nti anaagata.m attano jiivitapavatti.m  ``kacci diigha''nti na samavekkhasi, aayusa"nkhaaraana.m parittabhaava.m  jaanaasiiti pucchati. ^b^madaniiye^eb^ti madaarahe ruupaadiaaramma.ne.  ^b^na santasii^eb^ti na bhaayasi. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- kacci  ruupaadiisu kaamagu.nesu amatto appamatto hutvaa daanaadiina.m kusalaana.m  katattaa paraloka.m na bhaayasiiti.
text.3667: [03] ^b^dasasuu^eb^ti dasasu raajadhammesu. daanaadiisu dasavatthukaa  cetanaa ^b^daana.m,^eb^ pa~ncasiiladasasiilaani ^b^siila.m^eb^ ^a^V5.0376^ea^, deyyadhammacaago  ^a^P5.0379^ea^ ^b^pariccaago,^eb^ ujubhaavo ^b^ajjava.m,^eb^ mudubhaavo  ^b^maddava.m,^eb^ uposathakamma.m ^b^tapo,^eb^ mettaapubbabhaago ^b^akkodho,^eb^  karu.naapubbabhaago ^b^avihi.msaa,^eb^ adhivaasanaa ^b^khanti,^eb^ avirodho  ^b^avirodhana.m. acintetvaa^eb^ti mama ima.m gu.nasampatti.m acintetvaa.  ^b^bhaavadosa^eb^nti cittadosa.m. ^b^ana~n~naayaa^eb^ti ajaanitvaa.  asmaaka~nhi cittadoso ^a^M5.0404^ea^ naama natthi, yamesa jaaneyya, ta.m ajaanitvaava  pharusa.m kakkha.la.m gira.m vissajjesi. ^b^ayoniso^eb^ti anupaayena.  ^b^yaanasmesuu^eb^ti yaani vajjaani amhesu na vijjanti, taani vadati.  ^b^nayida^eb^nti tasmaassa ida.m vacana.m pa~n~navata.m iva na hoti,  tenesa mama na pa.n.dito viya upa.t.thaati.
text.3668: [03] ta.m sutvaa sumukho ``mayaa gu.nasampannova raajaa apasaadito,  so me kuddho, khamaapessaami na''nti cintetvaa aaha --
text.367: [03] ^b^gambhiirapa~nha^eb^nti atthato ca paa.lito ca gambhiira.m gu.lha.m  pa.ticchanna.m ^b^sattubhastajaataka-^eb^ (jaa0 1.7.46 aadayo)  ^b^sambhavajaataka-^eb^ (jaa0 1.16.138 aadayo)  ^b^mahaauma"ngajaatakesu^eb^ (jaa0 2.22.590 aadayo) aagatasadisa.m  pa~nha.m. ^b^manasaabhicintaya^eb^nti manasaa abhicintento attha.m  pa.tivijjhitvaa candasahassa.m suuriyasahassa.m u.t.thaapento viya paaka.ta.m katvaa  yo kathetu.m sakkotiiti ^a^V5.0141^ea^ attho. ^b^naaccaahita^eb^nti na atiahita.m,  hitaatikkanta.m ludda.m pharusa.m saahasikakamma~nca yo na karotiiti attho.  imassa panatthassa aavibhaavattha.m --
text.3671: [22] dhatara.t.the ca baddhasmi.m, dukkha.m me vipula.m ahu..
text.3675: [03] tattha ^b^atisaara^eb^nti pakkhalita.m. ^b^vegenaa^eb^ti aha.m eta.m  katha.m kathento vegena sahasaa kathesi.m. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti cetasika.m  dukkha.m mama vipula.m ahosi, tasmaa kodhavasena ya.m mayaa vutta.m, ta.m me  khamatha, mahaaraajaati. ^b^puttaana^eb^nti tva.m amhaaka.m puttaana.m pitaa  viya. ^b^dhara.niirivaa^eb^ti paa.nabhuutaana.m pati.t.thaa pathavii viya tva.m  amhaaka.m avassayo. ^b^adhipannaana^eb^nti dosena aparaadhena  ajjhottha.taana.m khamassuuti ida.m so aasanaa oruyha pakkhehi a~njali.m  katvaa aaha.
text.3676: [01] atha na.m raajaa aali"ngitvaa aadaaya suva.n.napii.the  nisiidaapetvaa accayadesana.m pa.tigga.nhanto aaha --
text.3678: [21] ``eta.m te anumodaama, ya.m bhaava.m na niguuhasi.
text.368: [21] ``na ^a^M5.0156^ea^ pa.n.ditaa attasukhassa hetu,  paapaani kammaani samaacaranti.
text.3680: [03] tattha ^a^V5.0377^ea^ ^b^anumodaamaa^eb^ti eta.m te dosa.m khamaama. ^b^ya^eb^nti  yasmaa tva.m attano cittapa.ticchannabhaava.m na niguuhasi. ^b^khila^eb^nti  cittakhila.m cittakhaa.nuka.m.
text.3681: [01] ida~nca pana vatvaa raajaa mahaasattassa dhammakathaaya  sumukhassa ca ujubhaave pasiiditvaa ``pasannena naama pasannaakaaro  kaatabbo''ti ubhinnampi tesa.m attano rajjasiri.m niyyaadento aaha --
text.3688: [22] eta.m dadaami vo vitta.m, issara.m vissajaami vo''ti..
text.3689: [03] tattha ^b^muttaa^eb^ti viddhaaviddhamuttaa. ^b^ma.nayo^eb^ti  ma.nibha.n.dakaani. ^b^sa"nkhamuttaa caa^eb^ti dakkhi.naava.t.tasa"nkharatana~nca  aamalakava.t.tamuttaratana~nca. ^b^vatthaka^eb^nti sukhumakaasikavatthaani.  ^b^ajina^eb^nti ajinamigacamma.m. ^b^loha.m kaa.laayasa^eb^nti  tambaloha~nca kaa.laloha~nca. ^b^issara^eb^nti ka~ncanamaalena  setacchattena saddhi.m dvaadasayojanike baaraa.nasinagare rajja.m.
text.369: [22] dukkhena phu.t.thaa pi.litaapi santaa, chandaa dosaa ca na  jahanti dhamma''nti.. --
text.3690: [03] eva~nca pana vatvaa ubhopi te setacchattena puujetvaa rajja.m  pa.ticchaapesi. atha mahaasatto ra~n~naa saddhi.m sallapanto aaha --
text.3693: [22] dhammesu vattamaanaana.m, tva.m no aacariyo bhava..
text.3697: [03] tattha ^b^dhammesuu^eb^ti kusalakammapathadhammesu.  ^b^aacariyo^eb^ti tva.m amhehi byattataro, tasmaa no aacariyo hoti,  apica dasanna.m raajadhammaana.m kathitattaa sumukhassa dosa.m dassetvaa  accayapa.tiggaha.nassa ^a^V5.0378^ea^ katattaapi tva.m amhaaka.m aacariyova, tasmaa  idaanipi no aacaarasikkhaapanena aacariyo bhavaati aaha.  ^b^passemurindamaa^eb^ti passemu arindama.
text.3698: [03] so tesa.m gamana.m anujaani, bodhisattassapi dhamma.m kathentasseva  aru.na.m u.t.thahi. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.3702: [03] tattha ^b^yathaakatha^eb^nti ya.mki~nci attha.m tehi saddhi.m cintetabba.m  mantetabba~nca, sabba.m ta.m cintetvaa ca mantetvaa caati attho.  ^b^anu~n~naasii^eb^ti gacchathaati anu~n~naasi.
text.3703: [03] eva.m ^a^M5.0406^ea^ tena anu~n~naato bodhisatto raajaana.m ``appamatto dhammena  rajja.m kaarehii''ti ovaditvaa pa~ncasu siilesu pati.t.thaapesi. raajaa tesa.m  ka~ncanabhaajanehi ^a^P5.0381^ea^ madhulaaja~nca madhurodaka~nca  upanaametvaa ni.t.thitaahaarakicce gandhamaalaadiihi puujetvaa bodhisatta.m  suva.n.naca"nko.takena saya.m ukkhipi, khemaa devii sumukha.m ukkhipi.  atha ne siihapa~njara.m ugghaa.tetvaa suuriyuggamanavelaaya ``gacchatha  saamino''ti vissajjesu.m. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.3708: [03] tesu mahaasatto suva.n.naca"nko.takato uppatitvaa aakaase .thatvaa  ``maa cindayi, mahaaraaja, appamatto amhaaka.m ovaade vatteyyaasii''ti  raajaana.m samassaasetvaa sumukha.m aadaaya cittakuu.tameva gato. taanipi  kho navuti ha.msasahassaani ka~ncanaguhato nikkhamitvaa pabbatatale  nisinnaani te aagacchante disvaa paccuggantvaa parivaaresu.m. te  ~naatiga.naparivutaa cittakuu.tatala.m pavisi.msu. tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa  aaha --
text.371: [03] ^b^kaalaagata^eb^nti ettha daana.m daatabbakaale, siila.m rakkha.nakaale,  uposatha.m upavaasakaale, sara.nesu pati.t.thaanakaale, pabbajitakaale,  sama.nadhammakara.nakaale, vipassanaacaarasmi.m yu~njanakaale caati imaani  daanaadiini sampaadento kaalaagata.m atthapada.m na ri~ncati na haapeti na  ga.laapeti naama. ^b^tathaavidha^eb^nti sakka sabba~n~nubuddhaa ca paccekabuddhaa  ca bodhisattaa ca pa~n~navanta.m kathentaa evaruupa.m puggala.m kathenti.
text.3715: [03] eva.m parivaaretvaa ca pana te ha.msaa ``katha.m muttosi,  mahaaraajaa''ti pucchi.msu. mahaasatto sumukha.m nissaaya muttabhaava.m  sa.myamaraajaluddaputtehi katakamma~nca kathesi. ta.m sutvaa tu.t.thaa ha.msaga.naa  ``sumukho senaapati ca raajaa ca luddaputto ca sukhitaa niddukkhaa  cira.m jiivantuu''ti aaha.msu. tamattha.m ^a^P5.0382^ea^ pakaasento  satthaa aaha --
text.372: [03] ^b^``yo ve''^eb^ti gaathaaya parena attano katagu.na.m jaanaatiiti  ^b^kata~n~nuu^eb^. eva.m ~natvaa pana yenassa gu.no kato, tassa gu.na.m  pa.tikaronto ^b^katavedii^eb^ naama. ^b^dukhitassaa^eb^ti attano  sahaayassa dukkhappattassa dukkha.m attani aaropetvaa yo tassa  uppannakicca.m sahatthena sakkacca.m karoti, buddhaadayo evaruupa.m sappurisa.m  naama kathenti. apica sappurisaa naama kata~n~nuu katavedino hontiiti  ^b^satapattajaataka-^eb^ (jaa0 1.3.85-87) ^b^cuu.laha.msajaataka-^eb^  (jaa0 1.15.133 aadayo) ^b^mahaaha.msajaatakaadiini^eb^ (jaa0  2.21.89 aadayo) kathetabbaani. ^b^etehi sabbehii^eb^ti sakka yo  etehi he.t.thaa vuttehi siilaadiihi sabbehipi gu.nehi upeto.  ^b^saddho^eb^ti okappanasaddhaaya samannaagato. ^b^muduu^eb^ti piyabhaa.nii.  ^b^sa.mvibhaagii^eb^ti siilasa.mvibhaagadaanasa.mvibhaagaabhiratattaa sa.mvibhaagii.  yaacakaana.m vacana.m ~natvaa daanavasena ^b^vada~n~nuu^eb^. catuuhi  sa"ngahavatthuuhi tesa.m tesa.m sa"nga.nhanato ^b^sa"ngaahaka.m,^eb^ madhuravacanataaya  ^b^sakhila.m,^eb^ ma.t.thavacanataaya ^b^sa.nhavaaca.m^eb^ tathaavidha.m nu puggala.m  adhigatayasasobhaggasa"nkhaataa sirii no jahaati, naassa sirii  vinassatiiti.
text.3720: [03] satthaa ^a^M5.0407^ea^ ima.m dhammadesana.m aaharitvaa ``na, bhikkhave, idaaneva,  pubbepi aanando mamatthaaya attano jiivita.m pariccajii''ti vatvaa  jaataka.m samodhaanesi ``tadaa luddaputto channo ahosi, khemaa devii,  khemaa bhikkhunii, raajaa saariputto, sumukho aanando, sesaparisaa  buddhaparisaa, dhatara.t.thaha.msaraajaa pana ahameva ahosi''nti.
text.3723: [03] ^b^neva ki.naami napi vikki.naamii^eb^ti ida.m satthaa jetavane  viharanto eka.m daanajjhaasaya.m bhikkhu.m aarabbha kathesi. so kira  saavatthiya.m eko kulaputto hutvaa satthu dhammakatha.m sutvaa pasannacitto  pabbajitvaa siilesu paripuurakaarii dhuta"ngagu.nasamannaagato sabrahmacaariisu  pavattamettacitto divasassa tikkhattu.m buddhadhammasa"nghupa.t.thaane appamatto  aacaarasampanno daanajjhaasayo ahosi. saara.niiyadhammapuurako attanaa  laddha.m pa.tiggaahakesu vijjamaanesu chinnabhatto hutvaapi detiyeva, tasmaa  ^a^V5.0380^ea^ tassa daanajjhaasayadaanaabhiratabhaavo bhikkhusa"nghe paaka.to ahosi.  athekadivasa.m bhikkhuu dhammasabhaaya.m katha.m samu.t.thaapesu.m, ``aavuso, asuko  naama bhikkhu daanajjhaasayo daanaabhirato attanaa laddha.m  pasatamattapaaniiyampi lobha.m chinditvaa sabrahmacaariina.m deti,  bodhisattassevassa ajjhaasayo''ti. satthaa ta.m katha.m dibbaaya  sotadhaatuyaa sutvaa gandhaku.tito nikkhamitvaa aagantvaa ``kaaya nuttha,  bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa''ti pucchitvaa ``imaaya  naamaa''ti vutte ``aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pubbe adaanasiilo maccharii  ti.naggena telabindumpi adaataa ahosi, atha na.m aha.m dametvaa  nibbisevana.m katvaa daanaphala.m va.n.netvaa daane pati.t.thaapesi.m, so  `pasatamatta.m udakampi labhitvaa adatvaa na pivissaamii'ti mama  santike vara.m aggahesi, tassa phalena daanajjhaasayo daanaabhirato  jaato''ti vatvaa tehi yaacito atiita.m aahari.
text.3724: [03] atiite baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadatte rajja.m kaarente eko gahapati a.d.dho  ahosi asiitiko.tivibhavo. athassa raajaa se.t.thi.t.thaana.m adaasi ^a^M5.0408^ea^. so  raajapuujito naagarajaanapadapuujito hutvaa ekadivasa.m attano sampatti.m  oloketvaa cintesi -- ``aya.m yaso mayaa atiitabhave neva  niddaayantena, na kaayaduccaritaadiini karontena laddho, sucaritaani pana  ^a^P5.0383^ea^ puuretvaa laddho, anaagatepi mayaa mama pati.t.tha.m kaatu.m  va.t.tatii''ti. so ra~n~no santika.m gantvaa ``deva, mama ghare  asiitiko.tidhana.m atthi, ta.m ga.nhaahii''ti vatvaa ``na mayha.m tava  dhanenattho, bahu.m me dhana.m, itopi yadicchasi, ta.m ga.nhaahii''ti vutte  ``ki.m nu, deva, mama dhana.m daatu.m labhaamii''ti aaha. atha ra~n~naa  ``yathaaruci karohii''ti vutte catuusu nagaradvaaresu nagaramajjhe  nivesanadvaare caati cha daanasaalaayo kaaretvaa devasika.m  chasatasahassapariccaaga.m karonto mahaadaana.m pavattesi. so yaavajiiva.m  daana.m datvaa ``ima.m mama daanava.msa.m maa upacchindathaa''ti putte  anusaasitvaa jiivitapariyosaane sakko hutvaa nibbatti. puttopissa  tatheva daana.m datvaa cando hutvaa nibbatti, tassa putto suuriyo hutvaa  nibbatti, tassa putto maatali hutvaa nibbatti, tassa putto  pa~ncasikho hutvaa nibbatti, tassa pana putto cha.t.tho se.t.thi.t.thaana.m laddhaa  macchariyakosiyo naama ahosi asiitiko.tivibhavoyeva. so  ``mama pitupitaamahaa baalaa ahesu.m, dukkhena sambhata.m dhana.m cha.d.desu.m, aha.m  pana dhana.m rakkhissaami, kassaci ki~nci na dassaamii''ti cintetvaa  daanasaalaa viddha.msetvaa agginaa jhaapetvaa thaddhamaccharii ahosi.
text.3725: [03] athassa gehadvaare yaacakaa sannipatitvaa baahaa paggayha,  ``mahaase.t.thi, maa attano pitupitaamahaana.m daanava.msa.m naasayi, daana.m  dehii''ti mahaasaddena paridevi.msu. ta.m sutvaa mahaajano  ``macchariyakosiyena ^a^V5.0381^ea^ attano daanava.mso upacchinno''ti ta.m garahi.  so lajjito nivesanadvaare yaacakaana.m aagataagata.t.thaana.m nivaaretu.m aarakkha.m  .thapesi. te nippaccayaa hutvaa puna tassa gehadvaara.m na olokesu.m. so  tato pa.t.thaaya dhanameva sa.mharati, neva attanaa paribhu~njati, na  puttadaaraadiina.m deti, ka~njikabila"ngadutiya.m saku.n.dakabhatta.m bhu~njati,  muulaphalamattatantaani thuulavatthaani nivaaseti, pa.n.nachatta.m matthake dhaaretvaa  jaraggo.nayuttena jajjararathakena yaati. iti tassa asappurisassa  tattaka.m ^a^P5.0384^ea^ dhana.m sunakhena laddha.m naa.likera.m viya  ahosi.
text.3726: [03] so ^a^M5.0409^ea^ ekadivasa.m raajuupa.t.thaana.m gacchanto ``anuse.t.thi.m aadaaya  gamissaamii''ti tassa geha.m agamaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne anuse.t.thi  puttadhiitaadiihi parivuto navasappipakkamadhusakkharacu.n.nehi sa"nkhata.m  paayaasa.m bhu~njamaano nisinno hoti. so macchariyakosiya.m disvaa  aasanaa vu.t.thaaya ``ehi, mahaase.t.thi, imasmi.m palla"nke nisiida, paayaasa.m  bhu~njissaamaa''ti aaha. tassa paayaasa.m disvaava mukhe khe.laa uppajji,  bhu~njitukaamo ahosi, eva.m pana cintesi -- ``sacaaha.m bhu~njissaami,  anuse.t.thino mama geha.m aagatakaale pa.tisakkaaro kaatabbo bhavissati, eva.m  me dhana.m nassissati, na bhu~njissaamii''ti. atha punappuna.m  yaaciyamaanopi ``idaani me bhutta.m, suhitosmii''ti na icchi.  anuse.t.thimhi bhu~njante pana olokento mukhe sa~njaayamaanena khe.lena  nisiiditvaa tassa bhattakiccaavasaane tena saddhi.m raajanivesana.m gantvaa  raajaana.m passitvaa raajanivesanato otaritvaa attano geha.m anuppatto  paayaasata.nhaaya pii.liyamaano cintesi -- ``sacaaha.m `paayaasa.m  bhu~njitukaamomhii'ti vakkhaami, mahaajano bhu~njitukaamo bhavissati, bahuu  ta.n.dulaadayo nassissanti, na kassaci kathessaamii''ti. so  rattindiva.m paayaasameva cintento viitinaametvaapi dhananaasanabhayena  kassaci akathetvaava pipaasa.m adhivaasesi, anukkamena adhivaasetu.m  asakkonto uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaato ahosi. eva.m santepi  dhananaasanabhayena akathento aparabhaage dubbalo hutvaa sayana.m upaguuhitvaa  nipajji.
text.3727: [03] atha na.m bhariyaa upagantvaa hatthena pi.t.thi.m parimajjamaanaa ``ki.m  te, saami, aphaasuka''nti pucchi. ``taveva sariire aphaasuka.m  karohi, mama aphaasuka.m natthii''ti. ``saami,  uppa.n.duppa.n.dukajaatosi, ki.m nu te kaaci cintaa atthi, udaahu raajaa  te kupito, adu puttehi avamaano kato, atha vaa pana kaaci ta.nhaa  uppannaa''ti? ``aama, ta.nhaa me uppannaa''ti. ``kathehi,  saamii''ti? ``kathessaami, sakkhissasi na.m rakkhitu''nti.  ``rakkhitabbayuttakaa ce, rakkhissaamii''ti. evampi ^a^P5.0385^ea^  dhananaasanabhayena kathetu.m na ussahi. taaya punappuna.m  pii.liyamaano kathesi -- ``bhadde, aha.m ekadivasa.m anuse.t.thi.m  navasappimadhusakkharacu.n.nehi sa"nkhata.m ^a^V5.0382^ea^ paayaasa.m bhu~njanta.m disvaa tato  pa.t.thaaya taadisa.m paayaasa.m bhu~njitukaamo jaato''ti. ``asappurisa, ki.m  tva.m duggato, sakalamaaraa.nasivaasiina.m pahonaka.m paayaasa.m pacissaamii''ti.  athassa siise da.n.dena pahara.nakaalo ^a^M5.0410^ea^ viya ahosi. so tassaa  kujjhitvaa ``jaanaamaha.m tava mahaddhanabhaava.m, sace te kulagharaa aabhata.m  atthi, paayaasa.m pacitvaa naagaraana.m dehii''ti aaha. ``tena hi  ekaviithivaasiina.m pahonaka.m katvaa pacaamii''ti. ``ki.m te etehi,  attano pana santaka.m khaadantuu''ti? ``tena hi ito cito ca  sattasattagharavaasiina.m pahonaka.m katvaa pacaamii''ti. ``ki.m te  etehii''ti. ``tena hi imasmi.m gehe parijanassaa''ti. ``ki.m te  etenaa''ti? ``tena hi bandhujanasseva pahonaka.m katvaa pacaamii''ti.  ``ki.m te etenaa''ti? ``tena hi tuyha~nca mayha~nca pacaami  saamii''ti. ``kaasi tva.m, na tuyha.m va.t.tatii''ti? ``tena hi  ekasseva te pahonaka.m katvaa pacaamii''ti. ``mayha~nca tva.m maa paci,  gehe pana pacante bahuu paccaasiisanti, mayha.m pana pattha.m ta.n.dulaana.m catubhaaga.m  khiirassa acchara.m sakkharaaya kara.n.daka.m sappissa kara.n.daka.m madhussa  eka~nca pacanabhaajana.m dehi, aha.m ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa tattha pacitvaa  bhu~njaamii''ti. saa tathaa akaasi. so ta.m sabba.m ce.takena gaahaapetvaa  ``gaccha asuka.t.thaane ti.t.thaahii''ti ta.m purato pesetvaa ekakova  ogu.n.thika.m katvaa a~n~naatakavesena tattha gantvaa nadiitiire ekasmi.m  gacchamuule uddhana.m kaaretvaa daarudaka.m aaharaapetvaa ``tva.m gantvaa ekasmi.m  magge .thatvaa ka~ncideva disvaa mama sa~n~na.m dadeyyaasi, mayaa  pakkositakaaleva aagaccheyyaasii''ti ta.m pesetvaa aggi.m katvaa paayaasa.m  paci.
text.3728: [03] tasmi.m kha.ne sakko devaraajaa dasasahassayojana.m ala"nkatadevanagara.m,  sa.t.thiyojana.m ^a^P5.0386^ea^ suva.n.naviithi.m, yojanasahassubbedha.m  vejayanta.m, pa~ncayojanasatika.m sudhammasabha.m, sa.t.thiyojana.m  pa.n.dukambalasilaasana.m, pa~ncayojanaava.t.ta.m ka~ncanamaalasetacchatta.m,  a.d.dhateyyako.tisa"nkhaa devaccharaa, ala"nkatapa.tiyatta.m attabhaavanti ima.m  attano siri.m oloketvaa ``ki.m nu kho katvaa mayaa aya.m yaso  laddho''ti cintetvaa baaraa.nasiya.m se.t.thibhuutena pavattita.m daana.m addasa.  tato ``mama puttaadayo kuhi.m nibbattaa''ti olokento ``putto me  cando devaputto hutvaa nibbatti, tassa putto suuriyo, tassa putto,  maatali, tassa putto, pa~ncasikho''ti sabbesa.m nibbatti.m disvaa  ``pa~ncasikhassa putto kiidiso''ti olokento attano va.msassa  upacchinnabhaava.m passi. athassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m asappuriso  maccharii hutvaa neva attanaa paribhu~njati ^a^M5.0411^ea^, na paresa.m deti, mama va.mso  tena upacchinno, kaala.m katvaa niraye nibbattissati, ovaadamassa  datvaa mama va.msa.m pati.t.thaapetvaa etassa imasmi.m devanagare nibbattanaakaara.m  karissaamii''ti. so candaadayo pakkosaapetvaa ``etha manussapatha.m  gamissaama, macchariyakosiyena amhaaka.m va.mso upacchinno ^a^V5.0383^ea^, daanasaalaa  jhaapitaa, neva attanaa paribhu~njati, na paresa.m deti, idaani pana  paayaasa.m bhu~njitukaamo hutvaa `ghare paccante a~n~nassapi paayaaso daatabbo  bhavissatii'ti ara~n~na.m pavisitvaa ekakova pacati, eta.m dametvaa  daanaphala.m jaanaapetvaa aagamissaama, apica kho pana amhehi sabbehi  ekato yaaciyamaano tattheva mareyya. mama pa.thama.m gantvaa paayaasa.m  yaacitvaa nisinnakaale tumhe braahma.nava.n.nena pa.tipaa.tiyaa aagantvaa  yaaceyyaathaa''ti vatvaa saya.m taava braahma.nava.n.nena ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa  ``bho, kataro baaraa.nasigamanamaggo''ti pucchi. atha na.m  macchariyakosiyo ``ki.m ummattakosi, baaraa.nasimaggampi na  jaanaasi, ki.m ito esi, etto yaahii''ti aaha.
text.3729: [03] sakko tassa vacana.m sutvaa asu.nanto viya ``ki.m kathesii''ti  ta.m upagacchateva. sopi, ``are ^a^P5.0387^ea^, badhira braahma.na,  ki.m ito esi, purato yaahii''ti viravi. atha na.m sakko, ``bho,  kasmaa viravasi, dhuumo pa~n~naayati, aggi pa~n~naayati, paayaaso paccati,  braahma.naana.m nimantana.t.thaanena bhavitabba.m, ahampi braahma.naana.m bhojanakaale  thoka.m labhissaami, ki.m ma.m nicchubhasii''ti vatvaa ``natthettha  braahma.naana.m nimantana.m, purato yaahii''ti vutte ``tena hi kasmaa  kujjhasi, tava bhojanakaale thoka.m labhissaamii''ti aaha. atha na.m  so ``aha.m te ekasitthampi na dassaami, thoka.m ida.m mama  yaapanamattameva, mayaapi ceta.m yaacitvaava laddha.m, tva.m a~n~nato aahaara.m  pariyesaahii''ti vatvaa bhariya.m yaacitvaa laddhabhaava.m sandhaayeva vatvaa  gaathamaaha --
text.373: [03] eva.m ^a^P5.0148^ea^ mahaasatto gaganatale pu.n.nacanda.m  u.t.thaapento viya cattaaro pa~nhe vissajjesi. tato para.m sesapa~nhaana.m  pucchaa ca vissajjana~nca hoti --
text.3731: [21] ``neva ki.naami napi vikki.naami, na caapi me  sannicayo ca atthi.
text.3732: [22] sukiccharuupa.m vatida.m paritta.m, patthodano naalamaya.m  duvinna''nti..
text.3733: [03] ta.m ^a^M5.0412^ea^ sutvaa sakko ``ahampi te madhurasaddena eka.m siloka.m  kathessaami, ta.m su.naahii''ti vatvaa ``na me tava silokena attho''ti  tassa vaarentasseva gaathaadvayamaaha --
text.3738: [21] ``ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.
text.3740: [03] tattha ^a^V5.0384^ea^ ^b^anumajjhato majjhaka^eb^nti appamattakampi majjhe  chetvaa dve ko.t.thaase karitvaa eka.m ko.t.thaasa.m datvaa tato avasesato  anumajjhatopi puna majjhe chetvaa eko ko.t.thaaso daatabboyeva.  ^b^adaana.m nuupapajjatii^eb^ti appa.m vaa bahu.m vaa dinna.m hotu, adaana.m naama  na hoti, tampi daanameva mahapphalameva.
text.3741: [03] so ^a^P5.0388^ea^ tassa vacana.m sutvaa ``manaapa.m te,  braahma.na, kathita.m, paayaase pakke thoka.m labhissasi, nisiidaahii''ti aaha.  sakko ekamante nisiidi. tasmi.m nisinne cando teneva niyaamena  upasa"nkamitvaa tatheva katha.m pavattetvaa tassa vaarentasseva gaathaadvayamaaha  --
text.3744: [22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, eko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
text.3746: [21] ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.
text.3749: [03] so tassa vacana.m sutvaa kicchena kasirena ``tena hi nisiida,  thoka.m labhissasii''ti aaha. so gantvaa sakkassa santike nisiidi.  tato suuriyo teneva nayena upasa"nkamitvaa tatheva katha.m pavattetvaa  tassa vaarentasseva gaathaadvayamaaha --
text.375: [21] ``subhaasita.m ^a^V5.0142^ea^ ^a^M5.0157^ea^ te anumodiyaana,  a~n~na.m ta.m pucchaami tadi"ngha bruuhi.
text.3752: [22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, neko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
text.3754: [21] ``ta.m ^a^M5.0413^ea^ ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.
text.3756: [03] tassapi vacana.m sutvaa kicchena kasirena ``tena hi nisiida,  thoka.m labhissasii''ti aaha. so gantvaa candassa santike nisiidi.  atha na.m maatali teneva nayena upasa"nkamitvaa tatheva katha.m pavattetvaa  tassa vaarentasseva imaa gaathaa abhaasi --
text.376: [22] siila.m siri~ncaapi sata~nca dhamma.m, pa~n~na~nca ka.m se.t.thatara.m  vadanti..
text.3761: [21] ``atra cassa huta.m hoti, atra cassa samiihita.m.
text.3762: [22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, neko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
text.3764: [21] ``ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.
text.3766: [03] taasa.m attho -- yo puriso ``naagayakkhaadiina.m balikamma.m  karomii''ti samuddaso.n.dipokkhara.niiaadiisu ya.m ki~nci sara~nca  upagantvaa juhati, tattha balikamma.m karoti ^a^P5.0389^ea^, tathaa  bahukaaya nadiyaa gayaaya pokkhara.niyaa do.nanaamake ca timbarunaamake  ca titthe siighasote mahante vaarivahe. ^b^atra cassaa^eb^ti yadi  atraapi etesu saraadiisu assa purisassa huta~nceva samiihita~nca hoti,  saphala.m sukhudraya.m sampajjati. atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m neko  bhu~njati bhojana.m, ettha vattabbameva natthi, tena ta.m vadaami -- kosiya,  daanaani ca dehi, saya~nca bhu~nja, ariyaana.m daanaabhirataana.m buddhaadiina.m  magga.m abhiruha. na hi ekaasii ekova bhu~njamaano sukha.m naama  labhatiiti.
text.3767: [03] so tassapi vacana.m sutvaa pabbatakuu.tena ottha.to viya kicchena  kasirena ``tena hi nisiida, thoka.m labhissasii''ti aaha. maatali  gantvaa suuriyassa santike nisiidi. tato pa~ncasikho teneva nayena  upasa"nkamitvaa tatheva katha.m pavattetvaa tassa vaarentasseva gaathaadvayamaaha  --
text.3770: [22] atithismi.m yo nisinnasmi.m, eko bhu~njati bhojana.m..
text.3772: [21] ``ta.m ta.m vadaami kosiya, dehi daanaani bhu~nja ca.
text.3774: [03] macchariyakosiyo ta.m sutvaa dukkhavedano nitthunanto ``tena  hi nisiida, thoka.m labhissasii''ti aaha. pa~ncasikho gantvaa  maatalissa santike nisiidi. iti tesu pa~ncasu braahma.nesu  ^a^V5.0386^ea^ nisinnamattesveva paayaaso pacci. atha na.m kosiyo uddhanaa  otaaretvaa ``tumhaaka.m pattaani aaharathaa''ti aaha. te anu.t.thaaya  yathaanisinnaava hatthe pasaaretvaa himavantato maaluvapattaani aahari.msu.  kosiyo taani disvaa ``tumhaaka.m etesu pattesu daatabbapaayaaso  natthi, khadiraadiina.m pattaani aaharathaa''ti aaha. te taanipi  aahari.msu. ekeka.m patta.m yodhaphalakappamaa.na.m ahosi. so sabbesa.m  dabbiyaa paayaasa.m adaasi, sabbantimassa daanakaalepi ukkhaliyaa uuna.m  na pa~n~naayi, pa~ncannampi datvaa saya.m ukkhali.m gahetvaa nisiidi.  tasmi.m kha.ne pa~ncasikho u.t.thaaya attabhaava.m vijahitvaa sunakho hutvaa  tesa.m purato passaava.m karonto agamaasi. braahma.naa attano paayaasa.m  pattena pidahi.msu. kosiyassa hatthapi.t.the passaavabindu pati. braahma.naa  ^a^P5.0390^ea^ ku.n.dikaahi udaka.m gahetvaa paayaasa.m abbhukiritvaa  bhu~njamaanaa viya ahesu.m. kosiyo ``mayhampi udaka.m detha, hattha.m  dhovitvaa bhu~njissaamii''ti aaha. ``tava udaka.m aaharitvaa hattha.m  dhovaa''ti. ``mayaa tumhaaka.m paayaaso dinno, mayha.m thoka.m udaka.m  dethaa''ti. ``maya.m pi.n.dapa.tipi.n.dakamma.m naama na karomaa''ti.  ``tena hi ima.m ukkhali.m oloketha, hattha.m dhovitvaa  aagamissaamii''ti nadi.m otari. tasmi.m kha.ne sunakho ukkhali.m  passaavassa puuresi. so ta.m passaava.m karonta.m disvaa mahanta.m  da.n.damaadaaya ta.m tajjento aagacchi. so assaajaaniiyamatto hutvaa ta.m  anubandhanto naanaava.n.no ahosi, kaa.lopi hoti setopi  suva.n.nava.n.nopi kabaropi uccopi niicopi, eva.m naanaava.n.no hutvaa  macchariyakosiya.m anubandhi. so mara.nabhayabhiito braahma.ne upasa"nkami.  tepi uppatitvaa aakaase .thitaa. so tesa.m ta.m iddhi.m disvaa  gaathamaaha --
text.3776: [21] ``u.laarava.n.naa ^a^M5.0415^ea^ vata braahma.naa ime, aya~nca vo sunakho  kissa hetu.
text.3777: [03] uccaavaca.m va.n.nanibha.m vikubbati, akkhaatha no braahma.naa ke nu  tumhe''ti..
text.378: [21] ``pa~n~naa hi se.t.thaa kusalaa vadanti, nakkhattaraajaariva  taarakaana.m.
text.3780: [21] ``cando ca suuriyo ca ubho idhaagataa, aya.m pana  maatali devasaarathi.
text.3781: [22] sakkohamasmi tidasaanamindo. eso ca kho  pa~ncasikhoti vuccatii''ti..
text.3782: [03] gaatha.m vatvaa tassa yasa.m va.n.nento gaathamaaha --
text.3786: [03] so tassa vacana.m sutvaa ``sakka, evaruupa.m dibbasampatti.m kinti  katvaa labhasii''ti pucchi. sakko ``adaanasiilaa taava paapadhammaa  maccharino devaloka.m na gacchanti, niraye nibbattantii''ti dassento  --
text.3789: [22] idheva nikkhippa sariiradeha.m, kaayassa bhedaa niraya.m  vajantii''ti.. --
text.379: [22] siila.m sirii caapi sata~nca dhammo, anvaayikaa pa~n~navato  bhavanti..
text.3790: [25] ima.m gaatha.m vatvaa dhamme .thitaana.m devalokapa.tilaabha.m dassetu.m  gaathamaaha --
text.3793: [22] idheva nikkhippa sariiradeha.m, kaayassa bhedaa sugati.m  vajantii''ti..
text.3794: [03] tattha ^b^aasamaanaa^eb^ti aasiisantaa. ye keci sugati.m  aasiisanti, sabbe te sa.myamasa"nkhaate dasasiiladhamme sa.mvibhaagasa"nkhaate  daanadhamme ca .thitaa ^a^M5.0416^ea^ hutvaa idha sariirasa"nkhaata.m deha.m nikkhipitvaa tassa  kaayassa bhedaa sugati.m vajantiiti attho.
text.3795: [03] eva.m vatvaa ca pana, ``kosiya, na maya.m tava santike  paayaasatthaaya aagataa, kaaru~n~nena pana ta.m anukampamaanaa aagataamhaa''ti  tassa pakaasetu.m aaha --
text.3797: [21] ``tva.m nosi ~naati purimaasu jaatisu, so maccharii  rosako paapadhammo.
text.3798: [22] taveva atthaaya idhaagatamhaa, maa paapadhammo niraya.m  gamitthaa''ti..
text.3799: [03] tattha ^b^so^eb^ti so tva.m. ^b^maa paapadhammo^eb^ti aya.m  amhaaka.m ~naati paapadhammo maa niraya.m agamaati etadattha.m aagatamhaati  attho.
text.3800: [03] ta.m sutvaa kosiyo ``atthakaamaa kira me, ete ma.m nirayaa  uddharitvaa sagge pati.t.thaapetukaamaa''ti tu.t.thacitto aaha --
text.3802: [21] ``addhaa ^a^V5.0388^ea^ ma.m vo hitakaamaa, ya.m ma.m samanusaasatha.
text.3803: [22] soha.m tathaa karissaami, sabba.m vutta.m hitesibhi..
text.3805: [21] ``esaahamajjeva uparamaami, na caaha.m ki~nci kareyya  paapa.m.
text.3806: [22] na ^a^P5.0392^ea^ caapi me ki~nci adeyyamatthi,  na caapidatvaa udaka.m pivaami..
text.3808: [21] ``eva~nca me dadato sabbakaala.m, bhogaa ime vaasava  khiiyissanti.
text.3809: [22] tato aha.m pabbajissaami sakka, hitvaana kaamaani  yathodhikaanii''ti..
text.381: [21] ``subhaasita.m te anumodiyaana, a~n~na.m ta.m pucchaami  tadi"ngha bruuhi.
text.3810: [03] tattha ^b^ma^eb^nti mama. ^b^vo^eb^ti tumhe. ^b^ya.m ma^eb^nti  yena ma.m samanusaasatha, tena me tumhe hitakaamaa. ^b^tathaa^eb^ti yathaa  vadatha, tatheva karissaami. ^b^uparamaamii^eb^ti maccharibhaavato  uparamaami. ^b^adeyyamatthii^eb^ti ito pa.t.thaaya ca mama aalopato  upa.d.dhampi adeyya.m naama natthi, ^b^na caapidatvaa^eb^ti udakapasatampi ^a^M5.0417^ea^  caaha.m labhitvaa adatvaa na pivissaami. ^b^khiiyissantii^eb^ti  vikkhiiyissanti. ^b^yathodhikaanii^eb^ti vatthukaamakilesakaamavasena  yathaa.thitako.t.thaasaaniyeva.
text.3811: [03] sakko macchariyakosiya.m dametvaa nibbisevana.m katvaa daanaphala.m  jaanaapetvaa dhammadesanaaya pa~ncasu siilesu pati.t.thaapetvaa saddhi.m tehi  devanagarameva gato. macchariyakosiyopi nagara.m pavisitvaa raajaana.m  anujaanaapetvaa ``gahitagahitabhaajanaani puuretvaa ga.nhantuu''ti yaacakaana.m  dhana.m datvaa tasmi.m khii.ne nikkhamma himavantato dakkhi.napasse ga"ngaaya  ceva ekassa ca jaatassarassa antare pa.n.nasaala.m katvaa pabbajitvaa  vanamuulaphalaahaaro tattha cira.m vihaasi, jara.m paapu.ni. tadaa sakkassa  aasaa saddhaa sirii hiriiti catasso dhiitaro honti. taa bahu.m  dibbagandhamaala.m aadaaya udakakii.lanatthaaya anotattadaha.m gantvaa tattha  kii.litvaa manosilaatale nisiidi.msu. tasmi.m kha.ne naarado naama  braahma.nataapaso taavati.msabhavana.m divaavihaaratthaaya gantvaa  nandanavanacittalataavanesu divaavihaara.m katvaa paaricchattakapuppha.m chatta.m  viya chaayatthaaya dhaarayamaano manosilaatalamatthakena attano vasana.t.thaana.m  ka~ncanaguha.m gacchati. atha taa tassa hatthe ta.m puppha.m disvaa yaaci.msu.  tamattha.m ^a^P5.0393^ea^ pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.3816: [21] ``suci.m ^a^V5.0389^ea^ sugandha.m tidasehi sakkata.m, pupphuttama.m amaravarehi  sevita.m.
text.3817: [22] aladdha maccehiva daanavehi vaa, a~n~natra devehi tadaaraha.m  hida.m..
text.3819: [21] ``tato ^a^M5.0418^ea^ catasso kanakattacuupamaa, u.t.thaaya naariyo  pamadaadhipaa muni.m.
text.382: [27] katha.mkaro kintikaro kimaacara.m, ki.m sevamaano labhatiidha  pa~n~na.m.
text.3820: [22] aasaa ca saddhaa ca sirii tato hirii, iccabravu.m  naaradadeva braahma.na.m..
text.3822: [21] ``sace anuddi.t.tha.m tayaa mahaamuni, puppha.m ima.m paarichattassa  bramhe.
text.3823: [22] dadaahi no sabbaa gati te ijjhatu, tuvampi no hohi  yatheva vaasavo..
text.3826: [22] na mayhamatthatthi imehi koci na.m, yaayeva vo seyyasi  saa pi.landhathaa''ti..
text.3827: [03] tattha ^b^girivare^eb^ti purimassa vevacana.m.  ^b^devavaraabhipaalitaa^eb^ti sakkena rakkhitaa. ^b^sabbalokaguu^eb^ti  devaloke ca manussaloke ca sabbattha gamanasamattho.  ^b^dumavarasaakhamaadiyaa^eb^ti saakhaaya jaatattaa dumavarasaakhanti  laddhanaama.m puppha.m gahetvaa. ^b^sakkata^eb^nti katasakkaara.m.  ^b^amaravarehii^eb^ti sakka.m sandhaaya vutta.m. ^b^a~n~natra devehii^eb^ti  .thapetvaa deve ca iddhimante ca a~n~nehi manussehi vaa yakkhaadiihi vaa  aladdha.m. ^b^tadaaraha.m hida^eb^nti tesa.myeva hi ta.m araha.m anucchavika.m.  ^b^kanakattacuupamaa^eb^ti kanakuupamaa tacaa. ^b^u.t.thaayaa^eb^ti ayyo  maalaagandhavilepanaadipa.tivirato puppha.m na pi.landhissati, ekasmi.m  padese cha.d.dessati, etha ta.m yaacitvaa puppha.m pi.landhissaamaati hatthe  pasaaretvaa yaacamaanaa ekappahaareneva u.t.thahitvaa. ^b^pamadaadhipaa^eb^ti  pamadaana.m uttamaa. ^b^muni^eb^nti isi.m.
text.3828: [01] ^b^anuddi.t.tha^eb^nti ``asukassa naama dassaamii''ti na  uddi.t.tha.m. ^b^sabbaa gati te ijjhatuu^eb^ti sabbaa te cittagati ijjhatu,  patthitapatthitassa ^a^P5.0394^ea^ laabhii hohiiti tassa thulima"ngala.m  vadanti. ^b^yatheva vaasavo^eb^ti yathaa amhaaka.m pitaa vaasavo  icchiticchita.m deti, tatheva no tvampi hohiiti. ^b^ta^eb^nti ta.m  puppha.m. ^b^abhisamekkhaa^eb^ti disvaa. ^b^sa.mkalaha^eb^nti naanaagaaha.m  kalahava.d.dhana.m katha.m udiirayi. ^b^imehii^eb^ti imehi pupphehi naama  mayha.m attho natthi, pa.tivirato aha.m ^a^M5.0419^ea^ maalaadhaara.natoti diipeti.  ^b^yaayeva vo seyyasii^eb^ti yaa tumhaaka.m antare je.t.thikaa. ^b^saa  pi.landhathaa^eb^ti saa eta.m pi.landhatuuti attho.
text.3829: [03] taa ^a^V5.0390^ea^ catassopi tassa vacana.m sutvaa gaathamaaha.msu --
text.383: [22] pa~n~naaya daanippa.tipada.m vadehi, katha.mkaro pa~n~navaa hoti  macco..
text.3832: [22] yassaa hi no naarada tva.m padassasi, saayeva no hehiti  se.t.thasammataa''ti..
text.3833: [03] tattha ^b^tva.m nottamevaa^eb^ti uttamamahaamuni tvameva no  upadhaarehi. taasa.m vacana.m sutvaa naarado taa aalapanto gaathamaaha --
text.3835: [21] ``akallameta.m vacana.m sugatte, ko braahma.no sa.mkalaha.m  udiiraye.
text.3836: [22] gantvaana bhuutaadhipameva pucchatha, sace na jaanaatha  idhuttamaadhame''nti..
text.3837: [03] tassattho -- bhadde sugatte, ida.m tumhehi vutta.m vacana.m mama ayutta.m,  eva~nhi sati mayaa tumhesu eka.m se.t.tha.m, sesaa hiinaa karontena kalaho  va.d.dhito bhavissati, ko baahitapaapo braahma.no kalaha.m udiiraye va.d.dheyya.  evaruupassa hi kalahava.d.dhana.m naama ayutta.m, tasmaa ito gatvaa attano  pitara.m bhuutaadhipa.m sakkameva pucchatha, sace attano uttama.m adhama~nca na  jaanaathaati.
text.3841: [22] sakaase gantvaana sahassacakkhuno, pucchi.msu bhuutaadhipa.m kaa  nu seyyasii''ti..
text.3842: [03] tattha ^a^M5.0420^ea^ ^b^paramappakopitaa^eb^ti puppha.m adadantena ativiya  kopitaa tassa kupitaa hutvaa. ^b^udiiritaa^eb^ti ``bhuutaadhipameva  pucchathaa''ti vuttaa. ^b^sahassacakkhuno^eb^ti sakkassa santika.m gantvaa.  ^b^kaa nuu^eb^ti amhaaka.m antare katamaa uttamaati pucchi.msu.
text.3845: [21] ``taa disvaa aayattamanaa purindado, iccabravii devavaro  kata~njalii.
text.3846: [22] sabbaava vo hotha sugatte saadisii, koneva bhadde kalaha.m  udiirayii''ti..
text.3847: [03] tattha ^a^V5.0391^ea^ ^b^taa disvaa^eb^ti, bhikkhave, catassopi attano  santika.m aagataa disvaa. ^b^aayattamanaa^eb^ti ussukkamanaa  byaava.tacittaa. ^b^kata~njalii^eb^ti namassamaanaahi devataahi  paggahita~njalii. ^b^saadisii^eb^ti sabbaava tumhe saadisiyo.  ^b^ko nevaa^eb^ti ko nu eva.m. ^b^kalaha.m udiirayii^eb^ti ida.m  naanaagaaha.m viggaha.m kathesi va.d.dhesi.
text.385: [21] ``sevetha vuddhe nipu.ne bahussute, uggaahako ca  paripucchako siyaa.
text.3851: [27] so nobravi girivare gandhamaadane, gantvaana bhuutaadhipameva  pucchatha.
text.3854: [03] ta.m sutvaa sakko ``imaa catassopi mayha.m dhiitarova, sacaaha.m  `etaasu ekaa gu.nasampannaa uttamaa'ti vakkhaami, sesaa kujjhissanti,  na sakkaa aya.m a.d.do vinicchinitu.m, imaa himavante kosiyataapasassa  santika.m pesesaami, so etaasa.m a.d.da.m vinicchinissatii''ti cintetvaa  ``aha.m tumhaaka.m a.d.da.m na vinicchinissaami, himavante kosiyo naama  taapaso atthi, tassaaha.m attano sudhaabhojana.m pesessaami, so parassa  adatvaa na bhu~njati, dadanto ^a^M5.0421^ea^ ca vicinitvaa gu.navantaana.m deti, yaa  tumhesu tassa hatthato bhatta.m labhissati, saa uttamaa bhavissatii''ti  aacikkhanto gaathamaaha --
text.3856: [21] ``asu brahaara~n~nacaro mahaamuni, naadatvaa bhatta.m varagatte  bhu~njati.
text.3858: [22] yassaa hi so dassati saava seyyasii''ti..
text.386: [22] su.neyya sakkacca subhaasitaani, eva.mkaro pa~n~navaa hoti  macco..
text.3860: [03] iti so taapasassa santika.m pesetvaa maatali.m pakkosaapetvaa  tassa santika.m pesento anantara.m gaathamaaha --
text.3862: [21] ``asuu ^a^V5.0392^ea^ hi yo sammati dakkhi.na.m disa.m, ga"ngaaya tiire  himavantapassani.
text.3863: [22] sa kosiyo dullabhapaanabhojano, tassa sudha.m paapaya  devasaarathii''ti..
text.3864: [01] tattha ^b^sammatii^eb^ti vasati. ^b^dakkhi.na^eb^nti  himavantassa dakkhi.naaya disaaya. ^b^passanii^eb^ti passe.
text.3867: [21] ``sa maatalii devavarena pesito, sahassayutta.m abhiruyha  sandana.m.
text.3868: [22] sukhippameva upagamma assama.m, adissamaano munino  sudha.m adaa''ti..
text.3869: [03] tattha ^b^adissamaano^eb^ti, bhikkhave, so maatali devaraajassa  vacana.m sampa.ticchitvaa ta.m assama.m gantvaa adissamaanakaayo hutvaa tassa  sudha.m adaasi, dadamaano ca ratti.m padhaanamanuyu~njitvaa paccuusasamaye aggi.m  paricaritvaa vibhaataaya rattiyaa udenta.m suuriya.m namassamaanassa .thitassa  tassa hatthe sudhaabhojanapaati.m .thapesi.
text.3874: [22] ko neva me paa.nisu ki.m sudhodahi..
text.3877: [22] adi.t.thapubba.m mama jaatu cakkhubhi, kaa devataa paa.nisu ki.m  sudhodahii''ti..
text.3878: [03] tattha ^b^udaggihutta^eb^nti udakaaggihutta.m paricaritvaa  aggisaalato nikkhamma pa.n.nasaaladvaare .thatvaa pabha"nkara.m lokatamonuda.m  uttama.m aadicca.m upati.t.thato mama sabbaani bhuutaani adhicca atikkamitvaa  vattamaano vaasavo nu kho eva.m mama paa.niisu ki.m sudha.m ki.m naameta.m  odahi. ``sa"nkhuupama''ntiaadiihi .thitakova sudha.m va.n.neti.
text.388: [21] ``sa pa~n~navaa kaamagu.ne avekkhati, aniccato dukkhato  rogato ca.
text.3881: [21] ``aha.m ^a^V5.0393^ea^ mahindena mahesi pesito, sudhaabhihaasi.m turito  mahaamuni.
text.3882: [22] jaanaasi ma.m maatali devasaarathi, bhu~njassu bhattuttama  maabhivaarayi..
text.3884: [21] ``bhuttaa ca saa dvaadasa hanti paapake, khuda.m pipaasa.m  arati.m daraklama.m.
text.3885: [22] kodhuupanaaha~nca vivaadapesu.na.m, siitu.nha tandi~nca rasuttama.m  ida''nti..
text.3886: [03] tattha ^b^sudhaabhihaasi^eb^nti ima.m sudhaabhojana.m tuyha.m abhihari.m.  ^b^jaanaasii^eb^ti jaanaahi ma.m tva.m, aha.m maatali naama devasaarathiiti  attho. ^b^maabhivaarayii^eb^ti na bhu~njaamiiti appa.tikkhipitvaa bhu~nja  maa papa~nca kari. ^b^paapake^eb^ti aya~nhi ^a^M5.0423^ea^ sudhaa bhuttaa dvaadasa  paapadhamme hanati. ^b^khuda^eb^nti pa.thama.m taava chaatabhaava.m hanati,  dutiya.m paaniiyapipaasa.m, tatiya.m ukka.n.thita.m, catuttha.m kaayadaratha.m, pa~ncama.m  kilantabhaava.m, cha.t.tha.m kodha.m, sattama.m upanaaha.m, a.t.thama.m vivaada.m, navama.m  pesu.na.m, dasama.m siita.m, ekaadasama.m u.nha.m, dvaadasama.m tandi.m aalasiyabhaava.m,  ida.m rasuttama.m uttamarasa.m sudhaabhojana.m ime dvaadasa paapadhamme hanati.
text.3887: [03] ta.m sutvaa kosiyo attano vatasamaadaana.m aavikaronto --
text.3889: [21] ``na kappatii maatali mayha bhu~njitu.m, pubbe adatvaa iti  me vatuttama.m.
text.389: [22] eva.m vipassii pajahaati chanda.m, dukkhesu kaamesu  mahabbhayesu..
text.3890: [22] na caapi ekaasnamariyapuujita.m, asa.mvibhaagii ca sukha.m na  vindatii''ti.. --
text.3891: [25] gaatha.m vatvaa, ``bhante, tumhehi parassa adatvaa bhojane  ka.m dosa.m disvaa ida.m vata.m samaadinna''nti maatalinaa pu.t.tho aaha --
text.3893: [21] ``thiighaatakaa ye cime paaradaarikaa, mittadduno ye ca  sapanti subbate.
text.3894: [22] sabbe ca te maccharipa~ncamaadhamaa, tasmaa adatvaa  udakampi naasniye..
text.3896: [21] ``sohitthiyaa ^a^P5.0398^ea^ vaa purisassa vaa  pana, dassaami daana.m vidusampava.n.nita.m.
text.3897: [22] saddhaa vada~n~nuu idha viitamaccharaa, bhavanti hete  sucisaccasammataa''ti..
text.3898: [03] tattha ^b^pubbe^eb^ti pa.thama.m adatvaa, atha vaa iti me pubbe  vatuttama.m ida.m pubbeva mayaa vata.m samaadinnanti dasseti. ^b^na caapi  ekaasnamariyapuujita^eb^nti ekakassa asana.m na ariyehi buddhaadiihi  ^a^V5.0394^ea^ puujita.m. ^b^sukha^eb^nti dibbamaanusika.m sukha.m na labhati.  ^b^thiighaatakaa^eb^ti itthighaatakaa. ^b^ye cime^eb^ti ye ca ime.  ^b^sapantii^eb^ti akkosanti. ^b^subbate^eb^ti dhammikasama.nabraahma.ne.  ^b^maccharipa~ncamaa^eb^ti maccharii pa~ncamo etesanti maccharipa~ncamaa.  ^b^adhamaa^eb^ti ime pa~nca adhamaa naama. ^b^tasmaa^eb^ti yasmaa aha.m  pa~ncamaadhamabhaavabhayena adatvaa udakampi ^b^naasniye^eb^ na ^a^M5.0424^ea^  paribhu~njissaamiiti ima.m vata.m samaadiyi.m. ^b^sohitthiyaa vaa^eb^ti so  aha.m itthiyaa vaa. ^b^vidusampava.n.nita^eb^nti viduuhi pa.n.ditehi  buddhaadiihi va.n.nita.m. ^b^sucisaccasammataa^eb^ti ete  okappaniyasaddhaaya samannaagataa vada~n~nuu viitamaccharaa purisaa sucii ceva  uttamasammataa ca hontiiti attho.
text.3899: [03] ta.m sutvaa maatali dissamaanakaayena a.t.thaasi. tasmi.m kha.ne taa  catasso devaka~n~naayo catuddisa.m a.t.tha.msu, sirii paaciinadisaaya a.t.thaasi,  aasaa dakkhi.nadisaaya, saddhaa pacchimadisaaya, hirii uttaradisaaya.  tamattha.m pakaasento satthaa aaha --
text.39: [21] ``so tva.m sabbe suhadayo, sabbesa.m rakkhito bhava.
text.3901: [21] ``ato mataa devavarena pesitaa, ka~n~naa catasso  kanakattacuupamaa.
text.3902: [22] aasaa ca saddhaa ca sirii tato hirii, ta.m assama.m  aagamu yattha kosiyo..
text.3904: [21] ``taa disvaa sabbo paramappamodito, subhena va.n.nena  sikhaarivaggino.
text.3905: [22] ka~n~naa catasso caturo catuddisaa, iccabravii maatalino  ca sammukhaa..
text.3907: [21] ``purima.m disa.m kaa tva.m pabhaasi devate, ala"nkataa  taaravaraava osadhii.
text.3908: [22] pucchaami ta.m ka~ncanavelliviggahe, aacikkha me tva.m  katamaasi devataa..
text.391: [21] ``sa viitaraago pavineyya dosa.m, metta.m citta.m bhaavaye  appamaa.na.m.
text.3911: [22] sudhaavivaadena tavantimaagataa, ta.m ma.m sudhaaya varapa~n~na  bhaajaya..
text.3913: [21] ``yassaahamicchaami sudha.m mahaamuni, so sabbakaamehi  naro pamodati.
